TextBody: Thanks Marlies – sorry we have had to pull strings so soon! We definitely aren’t going to be able to achieve an FTP of 28/6 but I will relay this information and see where we get to with this. Aldi have indicated that they would have to look at a revised launch and volumes if this was not achievable. Out of interest though – I can see we executed a fat-track printer amend for this product to move to Siva following some issues on the line (project attached). It may not change anything time-wise but just want to be sure we are all aligned in this respect.
Subject: RE: Aldi Critical Path

TextBody: Gentilissima società, Sono Monica Garofoni e faccio parte dell'ufficio acquisti della Costruzioni Generali Italia Srl. Le faccio una breve presentazione aziendale. Amministriamo sul territorio nazionale diverse strutture come: mense, attività ricettive e ristorative, Pasticcerie e laboratori di panificazione, bar, tabacchi presso importanti strutture. Siamo presenti anche nella Pubblica Amministrazione e nel portale CONSIP, quindi vantiamo una solida esperienza e una consistente schiera di Partners. Non possiamo, quindi, non rivendicare la nostra posizione di leadership in Italia. Gradirei ricevere, con cortese sollecitudine, il catalogo dei Vs prodotti e il relativo listino prezzi. Vi prego di informarmi, successivamente, di eventuali soglie di acquisto in modo tale da raggiungere una maggiore scontistica. Desidererei conoscere, inoltre, condizioni commerciali, termini di consegna della merce, eventuali assicurazioni per il trasporto, schede tecniche per prodotto che intendiamo acquistare e se vi occupate dell'assistenza alla clientela. In attesa di un Vs riscontro, Vi porgo i miei più cordiali saluti. [X] Dr.ssa Monica Garofoni Ufficio acquisti Costruzioni generali italia Srl Sede legale: Via Cremona, 71 00161 Roma Sede operativa e uffici: Via Dell'orso, 68 20121 Milano Sede logistica e magazzino: Via Galileo Galilei, 5 00012 Guidonia P.iva: 09728511008
Subject: RICHIESTA CLIENTE DIREZIONALE

TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Hello Dear , Could you please confirm the loading date of this order?
Subject: Re: WORLD FOOD BUSINESS/AG2829 - vessel-info

TextBody: Hi Paula, my first Aldi project and I already had to pull some strings ;) But happy to do so! If you want to have product in depot by 02/09, we need to load W35. I have requested they put a production into W34 to give us as much time as possible. The printer is Segers & Balcaen for Aldi, and they are closed 1 week during summer holiday + 1 week with lower capacity. This is why ideally I would work with a FTP date of 28/06/2024. This is still tight, but we can make it work! Would Aldi be able to meet this FTP date? Shorten the period is very hard, as we are in the most challenging period of the year.
Subject: RE: Aldi Critical Path

TextBody: Dear Isadora, Below you will find the reply from Maersk Antwerp. Please urgently arrange this with Maersk Brazil, goods are planned to be loaded on Friday May 30th. Without correct PU depot, we cannot ship the orders. “ Dear Sandra, I'm checking with my colleagues to see why these were released wrongly. However, please note these bookings and customer belong to Brazil, for which it is the Brazil office who needs to amend them. I suggest your customer requests the necessary amendments to the Brazil office. Please remind them as well of the correct empty container release, as these releases are being done in the wrong depot and also requested too early. In these cases, containers weren't picked up last week, so the release is cancelled for the week after.
Subject: Bookings - POs 201/24 - 416/24 - 422/24 - 424/24 -  Copacol

TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? Which country are you working in? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Dear Liesbeth, Please find the attached L/C draft for your checking and confirmation.
Subject: Contract 07052024

Merci de votre retour pour confirmation Restant à votre disposition pour toute information complémentaire Cordialement [cid:image005.png@01DAB11F.8722D380] Céline BOUYER Coordinatrice Achats 37 bis rue Saint Romain CS 52803 69373 LYON CEDEX 08 Tel : 06 20 61 81 76 Mail : celine.bouyer@lustucrufrais.fr<mailto:celine.bouyer@lustucrufrais.fr> De : Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com<mailto:sales@agristo.com>> Envoyé : mercredi 3 avril 2024 09:31 À : Bouyer, Céline <celine.bouyer@lustucrufrais.fr<mailto:celine.bouyer@lustucrufrais.fr>> Objet : [EXTERNAL] demande Agristo Bonjour Mme Bouyer, Je vous remercie pour votre intérêt. Nous avons bien reçu vos données à travers notre site web. J'aurais quand-même besoin de quelques informations supplémentaires. J'ai regardé sur votre site web et j'ai vu que vous traitez surtout des produits fraiches? Nous fournissons que des produits à base de pomme de terre surgelés. si vous traitez aussi des PDT surgelés, puis-je vous demander de voir les questions ci-dessous, s'il vous plait? je vous remercie. - Avez-vous de l'expérience avec des PDT surgelés? - comme estimation de volume, vous avez mis 2000 ton par an. De quels produits s'agit-il? Surtout des frites ou aussi des spécialités (comme p.ex dauphines, duchesses, croquettes, ...) je vous remercie d'avance. bien à vous Ine Wille

Hi All, To ensure we can continue packing skin-on fries in Harelbeke, I have developed a proposal. Attached, you will find the film without an address, but with the cooking instructions. My proposal is to use this film directly for the skin-on chips produced in Harelbeke. We will stop ordering film with the Wielsbeke address and switch to the film without an address once the current stock is depleted. The only change needed for the bag stamp is to add the country of origin, as shown in the attached example. The box label will still include the full address. Please let me know if this is acceptable for you. If not, we will not be able to produce any new skin-on chips for you. Thank you for your advise.
Subject: Redesign Sadia Gourmet Film

TextBody: Hi Tereza, My apologies for the delay. Please find the completed file on the French fries included. As explained, Double AA for retail is the same grade as our article for foodservice (Metro chef articles) I have marked this in green. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to ask.
Subject: QA Harmonization of French Fries

TextBody: Dag Rinus, ik verneem van onze masterplanning dat de initiële run inderdaad naar voor werd gebracht, en de nodige pallets dus werden geproduceerd. Op vandaag is dus geen bijkomende run in W24 meer voorzien. Kan u hiermee verder? Mvg, Michèle Michèle Vandenbroucke Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 28/05/2024 13:55 To: rinustanis@farmfrites.com Subject: RE: Next production FF 616.001 in Branded foil Dag Rinus, klopt, afgelopen weekend (25/05) stonden een 100-tal pallets op de planning. Er werden, om precies te zijn, 111 pallets geproduceerd. Mvg, Michèle Michèle Vandenbroucke Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Rinus Tanis [rinustanis@farmfrites.com] Sent: 28/05/2024 11:37 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: Next production FF 616.001 in Branded foil Hi Michele, Vorige week begreep ik van Zoe dat er nog 168T op voorraad stond bij jullie. 345 pallets = 248T, hebben jullie al een eerste productie met branded folie gedaan? Groeten, Rinus
Subject: Next production FF 616.001 in Branded foil

TextBody: Bonjour, Je suis navré pour ce retard car c’est difficile de trouver des camions en ces périodes le 1er va arriver jeudi 7x7 le 2 eme f10 vendredi. Bien cordialement [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 28 mai 2024 à 15:19, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Le camion pour votre commande n'est pas encore arrivé ici. Un autre camion est prévu pour demain. Quand arriveront-ils tous les deux ? Veuillez respecter l'heure de votre réservation. Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 24/05/2024 15:04 To: orhefir@good-eats.ma Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Bonjour Omar Pour les 7x7 le premier créneau disponible est le 28/05 à 9h00, je l'ai donc réservé pour vous. <Image_2024-05-24_14-54-30.png> Pour le 10x10, votre réservation est le vendredi 31/05 à 11:00. <Image_2024-05-24_15-02-24.png> Bon weekend et bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 24/05/2024 10:51 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Bonjour Lauren, 7x7 mm début de la semaine prochaine si possible lundi première heures, le second fin de semaine vendredi apr exemple. Pouvez-vous me dire svp par rapport la coated est ce qu’elle sera disponible pour chargement la s23. Bien à vous [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 24 mai 2024 à 09:31, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Pouvez-vous me dire quand vous voulez charger le camion 10x10 et le camion 7x7 ? Je pourrai alors réserver un créneau pour vous. Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 17:38 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Parfait. Merci [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 23 mai 2024 à 15:49, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Nous avons également du stock pour charger 7x7 a semaine prochaine. Cela signifie-t-il que nous chargerons 3 commandes la semaine prochaine ? (1 conteneur 10x10, 1 camion 10x10 et 1 camion 7x7) ? Si ce n'est pas le cas, n'hésitez pas à me dire ce que nous chargerons la semaine prochaine. Seuls le coated et le crinkle ne peuvent pas encore être chargés. Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 16:25 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Nous somme dont le besoin de la 7x7 mm coated et crinckle dans un premier temps pour la f 10 ça peut attendre merci de faire votre mieux pour nous charger au moin la 7x7 mm la semaine prochaine c urgent svp. Merci [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 23 mai 2024 à 15:14, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Veuillez envoyer tous votre mails à service@agristo.com svp. C'est avec regret que j'ai appris aujourd'hui qu'aucune production de les coated ne pourrait avoir lieu cette semaine. Il n'y a pas assez de film. Il faudra donc attendre encore quelques semaines avant que nous puissions produire les coated..... J'essaierai de vous faire savoir dès que possible la semaine exacte où ils seront prêts. Comme je vous l'ai indiqué précédemment, les 2,5 kg crinkle ne seront pas prêts à être chargés avant la semaine 25. Puisque la commande de 10 pal 7x7 + 10 pal coated ne peut être réalisée la semaine prochaine, devons-nous charger seulement le camion 10x10 + le conteneur 10x10 la semaine prochaine ? Le conteneur 10x10 a déjà une réservation. <Image_2024-05-23_16-14-10.png> Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 15:54 To: Lauren.DeBaets@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Aimable relance dites moi juste svp quand la coated et la cri Cole seront prêt pour chargement. TextBody: Hello Mohamed Our bank hasn't received the LC yet, so I don't have any further information from them yet. In the meantime I went over the LC myself and I already have the following remarks: - 59 -> Please change to AGRISTO NV (Instead of Agristo NO) - 43P: Partial Shipments -> Please change to allowed - 46A - 6. -> Inspection: These requirements are not workable for us. For other customers in Libya we do not appoint an inspection company ourselves. Please appoint an inspection company from your side that meets the necessary requirements, also please note that costs for this inspection will be for Hitun -47A 1 -> We send one set of original documents per courrier to the bank, not a set with duplicates via airmail. Please remove this line 10 -> What is meant by 3rd party documents? (is the chamber of commerce who issues the certificate of origin considered a 3rd party) 13 -> Please remove this, we do not sent original BL directly to the customer, only 2 originals to the bank Looking forward to hearing your feedback
Subject: FW: Agristo Prices February 2024

TextBody: Hello Anastasija, Below you’ll find PO for loading 8 trucks in the following next weeks. Pls try to load at least two on 30. of May. TextBody: [https://exportdir.com/covr.jpg] It is indeed our great pleasure to invite your esteemed organization to participate at our forthcoming specialized B2B trade show which is 12th Kenya Food Expo an Int'l Trade Show for the entire Food industry going to be held at Nairobi Kenya, starting from 1 - 3 September 2024. Kenya is the Gateway to reach East African Counties and it's 7th Biggest populated country in Africa. 120 Companies are Participating from 12 Countries Over 55% of visitors are potential buyers coming from: Ethiopia, Kenya, & Uganda. Product Profile:- Agro Commodities, Pulses, Flour, Food ingredients & chemicals, Food Packaging, FMCG, Beverages, Energy Drinks, Juices, Catering & Hospitality, Hygiene & Cleaning, Spices & Herbs, Home Appliances, Printing Machinery & Packaging Machinery Kenya Food Expo is a comprehensive and dynamic Food platform that celebrates the rich and diverse Food heritage of the East African region. This multifaceted initiative encompasses various components. Kenya Food Expo brings together chefs, food enthusiasts, industry professionals, and businesses from across East Africa and beyond. It showcases a vibrant array of Food experiences, from traditional dishes to modern gastronomic innovations. The expo serves as a platform for networking, knowledge exchange, and discovering the latest trends in the world. The Kenya Food Expo is an annual gathering of thought leaders, experts, and professionals. This Expo offers panel discussions, workshops, and seminars on a wide range of topics, including sustainable food practices, cultural preservation through cuisine etc. It provides a space for meaningful conversations and collaboration within the Food community. For 3 Days you will have direct access to quality attendees & a buyer profile unmatched by any other event industry. Kinya is the gateway to East African Countries and mostly neighboring landlocked countries such as Uganda, Rwanda, Burundi, Congo & Ethiopia depend on Kenya. COST OF SHELL STAND - US$ 375 sq.m 9 m2 ( 3m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 9 = US$ 3375 12 m2 ( 4m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 12 = US$ 4500 15 m2 ( 5m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 15 = US$ 5625 18 m2 ( 6m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 18 = US$ 6750 In the link you will find complete information such as; • Booking Application Form • Hotel Accommodation Packages specially designed with 4* & 5* Hotels • Useful Information & Products Profile • Floor Plan with available stand locations for your selection • Last year Participant's list • Photo Gallery enable you to understand how the stands will be look alike. Click Here To Download Booking Form <https://inexpos.us22.list-manage.com/track/click?u=741126994153c31e999db440f&id=c79711a283&e=3adc8060ec> Why to Invest in Kenya? 1. Macroeconomic Stability: Kenya is the third largest economy in Sub-Saharan Africa. Kenya's economy is projected to grow by 5.5 percent in 2023 and above 6.0 percent over the medium term. The Government's Bottom-Up Economic Transformation Agenda will reinforce this growth, which is geared toward an economic turnaround and inclusive growth. The economic stability will boost the investment climate in the country. 2. Infrastructural Development: Kenya has a well-developed physical infrastructural facility including, four international airports, an extensive road and railway network, a modern deep sea port at Mombasa and Lamu capable of handling liquidbulk and other containerized cargo, an expanding, liberalized energy sector, and digital telecommunication. 3. Availability of highly skilled human resource In Kenya, the proportion of the youth (18-34 years), constitutes 25%. The youthful skilled population economically implies, there are lots of potential workers for the future in various areas of investment and a wider market for goods meant for the youth. The flexibility and adaptability to high technological changes will easily make the goods and services produced locally highly competitive. This in turn will act as an enabler for investment because of the availability of skilled affordable labour. 5. Improved Governance: Kenya enjoys a stable political environment and investors are guaranteed repatriation of capital and profits, constitutional protection against expropriation, and investment guarantee against non-commercial risks: ICSID, MIGA, and ATIA. We look forward to welcome you at the show! For Booking & more info kindly contact: [https://www.inexpo.ae/images/direct.jpg] Mr. Inaam Salman Project Director INEXPO GROUP IN EXHIBITION ORG & MGMT LLC Dubai - UAE Mob: +971 - 55 - 5506187
Subject: Kenya Food Expo

TextBody: It has been a few months since we have had any extra pages available. We have a few discounted remnant spaces available today for the upcoming June 2024 issue focused on Top Products for Summer! What is remnant space? Remnant space is extra unassigned space we have available in our monthly digital publication. These are full page advertisements and are discounted down to $2500 from $6500. This means a full page ad in the most current issue of Food & Beverage Magazine will only cost a total of $2500. This space doesn't come with the added value other packages may come with. Don't delay! These spaces get reserved very quickly. Here is a link to our other assets, including banners, buyer guides, and geo-targeting options: https://email.cloud2.secureclick.net/c/33536?id=6395820.1472.1.c593df11a77350d407d596ca07d19973 If there is any interest or question, please email me back right away We look forward to your interest, Michael Politz
Subject: Only one Remnant Space Available June 2024 Top Products for Summer

TextBody: Hello, Thanks for connecting. I am Jean Clutch, I work as a financial investment consultant and currently represent a good Investment Group as their financial consultant. We are expanding our global presence by investing in viable projects across the globe. We will be willing to inject from $1,000,000 to $1 Billion and more in a viable project(s). We are focused on financing companies and individuals that require capital funding to expand and sustain growth. We grant our funding at a 3.95% ROI per annum for 10 years and 1months moratorium. If you have a viable project that needs funding, kindly revert back with your business plan and executive summary for our review and possible funding. I await your response. Sincerely yours Jean Clutch.
Subject: Project & Business Financial Services.

We would appreciate if you would send us your order confirmation, confirming shipping details, also, a draft copy or copies, of the EUR.1 Certificates for our review, at your earliest convenience. Just a reminder to remove any mention of Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

Ver video Cognos - ¿En qué somos los mejores?<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TlerXvwmOyk> Estoy interesada en ofrecerles nuestros servicios, principalmente Promotoría Compartida, "mercadeo de producto", te invito a ver un breve video del servicio, Ver video - Promotoría Compartida, Ver video - Promotoría Compartida<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f8rehLsAHm0>, Promotoría Compartida<https://compartida.cognosmkt.com/> Estamos en mas de 4,500 tiendas en 80 ciudades del país, todas las cadenas de autoservicios nacionales y regionales. Estamos también en las cadenas especializadas de Sodimac y The Home Depot con excelentes resultados. Servicios adicionales: * Planes de Mercadeo dedicados. * Planes de demostración, asesoría y venta. * Auditorias PDV y/o Mistery Shoper * Sampling * Centros de Canje * Actividades BTL: Edecanes y GO * Entre otros. TextBody: Hi Emeil, Good day! Actually Beau already contacted me about our requirements and other details needed for the project but is quite unresponsive for a while now and series of follow up has been made both Email and WhatsApp. Let us have an online meeting to futher discuss our inquiry although Beau was able to summarize it with me last time. Hope we can have an avenue to discuss. Our website is oleofats.com<http://oleofats.com>. You may view it in the meantime. Looking forward to hear from you soonest! Thank you and Have a nice day! Best, ANDREA NICOLE S. ANDRADA Business Development and Technical Services Head Mobile/WhatsApp/Viber: +63 998 964 4033 https://oleofats.com/ On Tue, May 21, 2024 at 3:08 PM Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com<mailto:sales@agristo.com>> wrote: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? * What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Subject: Oleo Fats Inquiry - Potential Distribution in Philippines

TextBody: 画像が表示されない場合はこちらをクリック<http://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/es?s=1673224453&e=1167093&elqTrackId=20f49e6a7ff34e609f310c9929b85f0e&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/{5a6ff22d-9a06-49b5-943e-e00a5f7cd3bd}_img-logo.gif] 【IE士 インタビュー】レゾナック その１ 二社の強みを融合させ、化学の力で社会を変える！ 株式会社レゾナック モノづくり改革推進部 グローバル改善推進グループ 国内業務推進チーム プロフェッショナル 古室 松美（こむろ しょうみ）様に、 「生産革新プロフェッショナルコース」受講の背景やご活用についてお伺いしました。 （※敬称略、所属・役職は2024年4月16日時点） [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/%7Baf3ce244-e846-414f-8dd8-e598400847fb%7D_Resonac_1.jpg] IT・IoT技術の進展により、昨今は海外の工場と国内のマザー工場をオンラインで繋ぎ、現地の困りごとを解決し得るマザー工場の改善事例や設備の姿を橋渡ししています。加えて、オンライン会議で現地から改善活動の進捗状況を報告してもらい、称賛したりコメントを送ったりしながら海外メンバーのモチベーション向上や改善活動のスキルアップを･･･ インタビュー記事はこちら 〉<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=22511&elqTrackId=58612656BB0F7825EECA90679D8A78F0&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> IE士資格取得講座 [http://img03.en25.com/EloquaImages/clients/JMAEloqua01/%7B4d1aaadc-15f2-4675-a896-dbd9712c7f7b%7D_seisan-pro_logo.png]<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=5372&elqTrackId=7F8EBFDD31ADB803CACB56EA49567F2A&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> 参加お申込み受付中！ お得な早期割引は6月28日まで！ ◆バリューチェン全体を俯瞰したものづくりを推進したい… ◆現場サイドから、デジタル化を見極め促進する人材が欲しい… ◆全社・グローバルで生産革新ができる人材を育てたい… 上記のようなお悩みや課題には、IEのプロ『IE士』育成をお勧めします！ 本コースの詳細はこちら 〉<https://jma-iepro.com/?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&elqTrackId=01B6D42635EC6B5F9FA39FC06418ABCA&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=23190> お問い合わせはこちら 〉<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=2752&elqTrackId=0F552C095661A787CF186EAB909CDD9C&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> お申込みはこちら 〉<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=2104&elqTrackId=2D7168C45FD869D504EC0C53B0FAE609&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> 本コースの特長 ①ものづくり・現場の原理原則をIEから学ぶ IEの概念論だけでなく、実践的かつベーシックな改善手法を体系的に学び直します。 現場経験のみでIEを学習したことのない方も安心してご活用いただけます。 ②単なる工程改善（部分最適）から生産革新（全体最適）の視野へと広げる 生産・製造だけでなく、開発・購買・物流などサプライチェーン全体を俯瞰した知識や、 経営・現場の管理・評価手法やマネジメント、競合との差別化等の経営戦略なども学び、 目先の現場改善ではなく、工場そして企業全体の改善活動へ視野を広げます。 ③社内のIEを指導・育成するキーパーソンに必要な教育内容を学ぶ IE基礎テクニックの教え方や、すぐに使える分析シート等を収録した IE教育の虎の巻「IEインストラクターマニュアル」は、 社内研修でも利用でき、講師としてのスキルアップが図れます。 『IE士資格』取得ができるのは、生産革新プロフェッショナルコースだけ 50年に渡る開催実績と750名以上のIE士を輩出してきた伝統あるコースです。 開 催 概 要 会 期： 2024年10月7日（月）～12月13日（金） 全7回 参加方法： 会場参加 および オンラインLIVE受講 の組み合わせ 会場参加は、日本能率協会研修室での開催を予定 ⇒ 他の参加者・講師との直接交流により、情報・視野が格段に拡がります！ オンラインLIVE受講は、Zoomを使用 ⇒ 移動・出張を伴わず、勤務先・ご自宅から参加いただけます！ ※各回の日時、参加方法は下記ご参照ください。 ⇒ https://jma-iepro.com/schedule<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=10676&elqTrackId=32D9092546C5585D4C51F0B611B771BF&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> 参加料（税込）：※お得な早期割引（6月28日まで）実施中！ 【通常料金】 日本能率協会法人会員：693,000円/人 会員外：748,000円/人 のところ 【早期割引料金（6月28日まで）】 日本能率協会法人会員：671,000円/人 会員外：726,000円/人 参加対象： ●生産・製造部門のマネジャー、リーダーとその候補者 ●社内研修講師、ものづくり教育担当 ◆このような課題・ニーズをお持ちの方がご参加しています ・現場でIEを実践できる人材を育てたい ・IEの知識を学ぶだけでなく、社内に伝えていきたい ・デジタル人材を育成する前に、ものづくりの「原理原則」を学びたい ・勘・コツ・経験の職人作業を脱し、生産体系を確立したい ・「SCM/ECMの改善・連携のヒント」を体系的に学びたい ・工場全体の目標数値や指標を見直し、改善・改革・投資の立案と実行をしたい ・IEを学び、海外拠点の生産性向上を目指したい ◆主な参加部門（実績） 生産企画、生産技術、生産管理、品質保証、品質管理、生産革新推進、 研修センター、ものづくり塾、SCM、物流、購買、資材… など ※その他の部署、また製造業以外の企業からもご参加があります ※過去の参加企業はこちら⇒ https://jma-iepro.com/program<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=8450&elqTrackId=186337B4BE60BACA04AF5A544D0A5889&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> ◆過去の参加者の声（抜粋） ・IEの各種知識・手法を自分の中で体系的に整理できたのが良かった。 ・単なる工程改善だけはなく『サプライチェーン全体で改革する』ということを学べた。 ・「現場の効率性を評価するための各ツールを学ぶ」という以上に 「マネジメントの部分で必要とされること」に多くの気づきがあった。 ・企業のトップ、これからを担う人材は絶対に受けたほうが良いと思った。 ・新しい学びを得られただけでなく、他社との人脈もできた。 『IE士』の資格認定 当研修を修了し、所定の成績を修めた方は「IE士」の資格を認定・付与されます。 さらに、参加特典として ◆オンラインセミナー無料受講つき（コース終了まで何度でも受講可） ・IE基礎テクニック習得コース（約24時間分） ご参照⇒ https://www.jma-online.com/course/course01/<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=4246&elqTrackId=9E08379C80BFA289DA1608D0BC22B030&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> ・IE基礎分析手法習得セミナー（約2.5時間分） ご参照⇒ https://www.jma-online.com/course/course14/<https://www.jma-online.com/course/course14/?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&elqTrackId=ED384DE820E69A7C587AF0AF05269449&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=23190> 本コースの詳細はこちら 〉<https://jma-iepro.com/?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&elqTrackId=10DE01F513F1098C8DB6D90F8CC4C59B&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1&elqCampaignId=23190> お問い合わせはこちら 〉<https://s1673224453.t.en25.com/e/er?utm_campaign=3618536185240529_%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A3%E3%83%97%E3%83%AD%EF%BC%9A%E3%83%AC%E3%82%BE%E3%83%8A%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF_%E3%82%A4%E3%83%B3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%93%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%201&s=1673224453&lid=2752&elqTrackId=CAA8E7CD90685977738DB17A96C1F03F&elq=6fa0d22950384ff8bece1b972f00e1d7&elqaid=36185&elqat=1> TextBody: Secure your spots with the early bird tickets today! View this email in your browser<https://mailchi.mp/iegasia/sigep-ra-eventoverview-12695223?e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/756ced41-c46c-1417-788d-5be7973fc715.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=625c833091&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/a7745531-1294-3570-b109-101344de71fb.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=0447da7a52&e=ac08d24560> Dear Moustafa Dessouki, Join us at the RAS Leadership Symposium for a day filled with insightful activities led by Will Scott, the Author & Founder of The Culture Fix®. Will has helped hundreds of businesses fulfil their corporate culture dreams. Secure your spot today with the exclusive Earlybird Promo - https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/904444396537?aff=oddtdtcreator Key in RASEARLYBIRD at checkout for 10% OFF (Valid until 31May) *Bundle pricings for 8pax (full table) and 4pax (half-table) are available. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/113c1cd3-1a79-c809-b3a6-be31bc773086.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=a7ad80ef3c&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/39f44b48-d5eb-76fa-d1e8-3489a765d2f7.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=ad0c1b1f2d&e=ac08d24560> An excellent opportunity to bring your business to new heights by building the right culture and improving the workspace environment. Learn how to: * Secure a 10X return in the first 12 months and increase your employee NPS score by 30%-50% * Understand the difference between having core values and having a valued culture * Empower everyone to handle difficult conversations and create the healthiest environment * Know how to hire and unhire™ for cultural alignment * Create the perfect culture communication tool * Teach your team to live your values and make decisions the way you would * Discover the simple joy of leading with values In great cultures, your people: ✅ Are more accountable and motivated to fight for the company’s vision; ✅ Make decisions the same way leadership would; ✅ Are more engaged and drive your profitability. We highly encourage you to sign up with your leadership team for the best results! TextBody: Hi Jeroen, In past email as attached, it was mentioned that there were stock of crinkle cut for PO 240402A and PO 240402C with BBD 11.04.2025. Please advise if you mean there’s no old stock for these 2 orders and have to wait for new production. Thank you, Joseph From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: Monday, May 27, 2024 7:53 PM To: josephtseng@glfoods.com.tw Cc: glfoods@ms45.hinet.net; glimp@glfoods.com.tw; beau.declerck@agristo.com Subject: RE: Good Land_re-revised order 240402A Hi Joseph, I have modified your order to the first option and I hope we can still adjust to these quantities. I will adjust to the other options when needed to keep the shipment on the same vessel. I must say it's difficult to change the order so close to the shipment, but we are right at the production weeks of the Rustic fries (312035) and the Crinkle Cut fries (313324), so maybe we can make it work. I'm hoping we can still deliver as requested by you. The shoestring fries are alraedy in stock, so where needed I can use these to fill the container. We currently have no stock on the Crinckle Cut fries, so I'm hoping we have enough base materials to provide the 6 pallets requested. I will keep you posted as soon as I have final production numbers.
Subject: RE: updated order 240402C

TextBody: Hello Ilse, Can you please unblock the loadings planned for May 31? Delay in payment is connected to EDI issues I mentioned this week – we don’t know yet why your invoices aren’t delivered via EDI. All these invoices need to be upload from emails in pdf form what causes a longer time for processing invoices. I’m working with IT to solve this case asap. I have confirmation from finance that all invoices will be paid as soon as they will appear in the system (this week). As loadings in May 31 are the last in location Tilburg we won’t have possibility to send trucks to load them in June. Agreement between our companies was to move all loadings to Wielsbeke from June 1st so our carriers also have new agreements from June 1st. I will appreciate your support.
Subject: Blocked orders

TextBody: Geachte heer/mevrouw, Mijn naam is Lisette Lecluse en ik ben momenteel student Bedrijfskunde aan de Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB). Ik vroeg me af of er bij Agristo mogelijkheden zijn voor een vakantiejob waar ik mijn theoretische kennis in de praktijk kan brengen. Ik heb al een diploma behaald in Global Business Management en Design Thinking and Innovation. Ik ben vooral geïnteresseerd in functies binnen uw bedrijf, met name in de afdelingen marketing, sales, supply chain, accounting & finance of R&D. Dankzij mijn opleiding en eerdere studies voel ik me bekwaam om waardevol werk te leveren. Mijn beschikbaarheid is van 22 juli tot en met 30 augustus van dit jaar. Tijdens deze periode kan ik flexibel worden ingezet en ben ik bereid verschillende taken en verantwoordelijkheden op me te nemen. Ik kijk er echt naar uit om mijn vaardigheden en kennis toe te passen binnen Agristo en bij te dragen aan uw organisatie. Graag zou ik de gelegenheid krijgen om mijn profiel persoonlijk toe te lichten. Ik geloof sterk dat ik een waardevolle bijdrage kan leveren aan uw team en ik ben enthousiast om mijn motivatie verder te bespreken. In de bijlage vindt u mijn curriculum vitae voor een gedetailleerder overzicht van mijn achtergrond en ervaringen. Ik waardeer uw tijd en overweging enorm. Met vriendelijke groet, Lisette Lecluse
Subject: Spontane sollicitatie als jobstudent

TextBody: Je hebt nog drie dagen om van onze korting (75%) te genieten! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Beste Agristo, Heb jij al onbeperkte toegang tot onze database van jobstudenten in jouw regio? Dit is jouw laatste kans om te profiteren van 75% korting! De komende dagen zijn cruciaal, want dit is hét moment dat studenten actief op zoek zijn naar een studentenjob voor de zomer. Waar wacht je nog op? Wat kunnen we voor jou betekenen? Onze (web)applicatie maakt het eenvoudig om de perfecte (job)studenten te vinden. Met ons matchingsalgoritme selecteren we de studenten die het beste aansluiten bij jullie voorkeuren. Je kan het volledige profiel bekijken, inclusief hun interesses, voorkeuren en competenties. Interessante kandidaten kan je een gepersonaliseerd contactverzoek sturen, waarna je meteen ontdekt of er een wederzijdse match is. Waarom kiezen voor onze (web)applicatie? * Directe toegang tot een grote database aan stagiairs, jobstudenten en recent afgestudeerden die klaar staan om aan de slag te gaan. * Een indrukwekkende responsgraad van 82% op onze contactverzoeken. * Meer dan de helft van de studenten beantwoordt de contactverzoeken positief en volgt er een (sollicitatie)gesprek. Wat is het aanbod? Ga voor 31/05/2024 aan de slag en ontvang 75% korting op onze licentie die maandelijks opzegbaar is! Voor slechts €75 per maand heb je onbeperkte toegang tot onze (web)applicatie. We hopen zo een win-win situatie te creëren voor zowel de studenten als jouw organisatie. Klaar om te beginnen? Maak vandaag nog jouw profiel aan en gebruik de voucher voor de korting (JMEI75). Wacht niet te lang, want deze unieke kans verdwijnt snel! Je hebt nog maar 3 dagen om te beslissen. Ga nu aan de slag!<https://wefynd.cmail19.com/t/y-l-mcdya-hlookhlu-r/>
Subject: Vind nu de perfecte jobstudent voor de zomervakantie!

TextBody: Hello Serhii Could you please send me the signed and stamped CMR by your warehouse? We need it as proof to our customs. Thank you in advance Liesbeth Soubry Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 59 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Service Request [service@agristo.com] Sent: 4/04/2024 13:17 To: sbayuka@gmail.com Subject: RE: Documents for driver Hello Serhii Attached the full set of documents, signed and stamped: - Invoice - Certificate of origin - Packing list - Export document - Health certificate Certificate of origin and Health certificate were not given to the driver. Do we need to send you the originals, or are the copies attached enough? Regarding the CMR, I don't understand. It is the same document as for the last shipment, so how come the CMR is not ok now? Unfortunately there is nothing we can do to change it. This is an automatich document.
Subject: Documents for driver

TextBody: Please find attached our purchase order PUR960502 . The purchase order can be confirmed by clicking on the following link and using the below details. Please be aware that the Vendor Self Service Portal (VSS) is not compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) or older versions. You will need to use an up-to-date browser to use our portal such as Chrome, Safari, Edge and Firefox. https://vss.jjfoodservice.com/login/PUR960502/701815 Purchase order : PUR960502 PIN: 701815 Please be aware that Fraudsters are using the name JJ Food Service to fraudulently source goods.Suppliers to JJ Food Service be especially aware. * JJ Food Service will never order goods without a period of negotiation and a formal trading agreement would be issued requiring you to supply product details etc. * Never send goods if the address is different to our published distribution sites. * Only dispatch upon receipt of a formal order and be aware that we do not collect our orders from your premises. * Only dispatch if formal confirmation of your order is sent, after using the recognised booking-in procedure, which will be given to you via the JJ Purchasing team. If in any doubt please bring to our urgent attention. Contact: 00 44 1992 701710 P.S. To open the attached file, Adobe Acrobat Reader version 7 or greater must be installed on the system. TextBody: Hi Moustafa, It will be very difficult to provide a proof of the war risk surcharges which Oh-sung is asking for. I guess the war risk surcharges are also not exact and come with an average? Over the past few months, the war surchages have evolved as well. If we need to provide evidence, then we should check with Remant if they can send us the invoice per container which they have received from the shipping company but this will be very time consuming to check this for all containers (December, January, February loadings). Can't they just accept these costs?
Subject: RE: Freight Rates / Transit Time

TextBody: Dear AGRISTO nv, I hope you're doing well. I'm reaching out to you from Stamegna Retail Management with an exciting opportunity for your company to enter or expand in the European market with focus on the mediterranean area. We invite your team to our NEW Stamegna Network - Mediterranean Food & Beverage event that will be held in the beautiful city of Athens! This event is perfect for Food & Beverage manufacturers looking to connect with key retailers and distributors in the mediterranean mass market segment. Event Details: * Date: November 10-11, 2024 * Location: Athens, Greece * Venue: 5 star Hotel (to be confirmed) Benefits of Participation: * Pre-scheduled 20-minute meetings with Mediterranean, East & Central European, North African and Middle Eastern retail and distribution leaders. * Opportunity to set up 15 to 22 tailored meetings based on your preferences. * Exclusive access to expand your brand's presence in the Mediterranean area. With over 16 years of experience, our team at Stamegna Retail Management ensures successful B2B connections. This is a unique chance to explore new opportunities and grow your business in Europe. For more details and to reserve your spot, reply to this email or contact us at this email or WhatsApp. We look forward to partnering with you at this event.
Subject: Registration is now open to join our NEW Mediterranean Food & Beverage event in November 2024

TextBody: Dear AGRISTO NV | ANUGA, Please be introduced to Trustana - a rail logistics expert based in Vietnam. Asia-Europe trade is facing the issue of container crunch and slot squeeze. Hence, Trustana Vietnam is thrilled to offer our swift and reliable rail freight solution. Here’s what sets us apart: Space commitment: Yeb, we can guarantee your cargo space on our trains to tackle the above issues Optimal transit time: Our recent train from Vietnam to Europe took only 32 days, ensuring timely delivery Stable and frequent schedule: With our frequent rail schedule, you can expect predictable departures and on-time deliveries. Door-to-door deliveries: We handle everything from pick-up to final destination with trucking and other value-added services Global cargo tracking device: Peace of mind comes from monitoring your shipment's journey. All thanks to our GPS device! Please see the attached infographic for more details. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you, – Dara Duong Marketing Team Lead | (+84) 376 573 835 dara.duong@trustana.vn | trustana.vn TRUSTANA VIET NAM CO., LTD
Subject: VIETNAM - EU | TRUSTANA | 32-Day Pure Rail Freight

TextBody: Hi Aamir, Becky, First of all apologies for the delay in getting back to you. I was in a meeting the whole morning. We have well received the updated files yesterday and this morning. We are checking them at this moment and will get back to you shortly. In the meantime I have also been able to get a closer look on the situation with the croquettes. After making the puzzle, I acutally have some goods news for you: We do no longer have stock on our article 307905, but have already produced our new article 314309. The difference between the two articles is an updated recipe (new breadcrumb). The codes did not change though, so I believe we can easily add the new article to your orders. We have 36 pallets on stock, so please do not hesitate to let me know on what order we can foresee this article. Thank you very much.
Subject: Agristo Nazareth Orders for Wisbech.xlsx

TextBody: Good morning I’m sorry, but we tried to load earlier, goods were only ready to load yesterday afternoon. We really tried to ship. What we can offer you to do if the goods are really urgent is to ship them from Zeebrugge into Hull instead of Ghent. Then we can deliver as from Friday 18h. Would that be a help for you? Met vriendelijke groeten, Salutations distinguées,
Subject: FW: Agristo Tilburg - Boroughbrigde

TextBody: Please find attached our purchase order PUR960491 . The purchase order can be confirmed by clicking on the following link and using the below details. Please be aware that the Vendor Self Service Portal (VSS) is not compatible with Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) or older versions. You will need to use an up-to-date browser to use our portal such as Chrome, Safari, Edge and Firefox. https://vss.jjfoodservice.com/login/PUR960491/900414 Purchase order : PUR960491 PIN: 900414 Please be aware that Fraudsters are using the name JJ Food Service to fraudulently source goods.Suppliers to JJ Food Service be especially aware. * JJ Food Service will never order goods without a period of negotiation and a formal trading agreement would be issued requiring you to supply product details etc. * Never send goods if the address is different to our published distribution sites. * Only dispatch upon receipt of a formal order and be aware that we do not collect our orders from your premises. * Only dispatch if formal confirmation of your order is sent, after using the recognised booking-in procedure, which will be given to you via the JJ Purchasing team. If in any doubt please bring to our urgent attention. Contact: 00 44 1992 701710 P.S. To open the attached file, Adobe Acrobat Reader version 7 or greater must be installed on the system. Many Thanks Purchase Team JJ Food Service Limited www.jjfoodservice.com<https://mandrillapp.com/track/click/31005253/www.jjfoodservice.com?p=eyJzIjoiTkFDNDNhWVdYejlmVi1oTDhoRk9TNHQ4U1BrIiwidiI6MSwicCI6IntcInVcIjozMTAwNTI1MyxcInZcIjoxLFwidXJsXCI6XCJodHRwOlxcXC9cXFwvd3d3LmpqZm9vZHNlcnZpY2UuY29tXCIsXCJpZFwiOlwiNDczMTBmMjBiMDM2NGMxMjlkYjJiZGI3ODc5OGFhNTNcIixcInVybF9pZHNcIjpbXCI3NWJiYWIxNmRhZThkODU3Y2NlMzUwNjhiMTM5OTBkZTg5NjQ0ZWNiXCJdfSJ9>

Dear Kendrik, Unfortunately, for your order GS-009922 who will be loaded next week 05.06, we have a shortage of 1 pal of item 45407432 (Single coated shoestring potato 2kg). Would it be possible to replace with 1 pallet of item 15648513 (Skin-on Crunch Potato 2,5kg) of your order GS-010034, please? Please advise, thanks in advance.
Subject: Order GS-009922 shortage material 45407432 1 pal

Merci de libérer la commande ORCUN svp. Restant à votre disposition. Met vriendelijke groeten, Salutations distinguées,

TextBody: Hello, Do you have any information for me please, about the below? Many thanks. BR Vanessa Ronsse Customer Service Officer UK & Europe P +32 56 54 11 85 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 28/05/2024 12:44 To: geral@gac.pt Subject: Order flakes + return order Hello Mrs. Callimaci, Let me introduce myself first. I'm Vanessa and I will be your dedicated customer service officer, from now on. I was informed, that goods need to come back to Agristo, as they are non-conform. Can you please advise me your order number and the total amount of PAL for the goods that need to come back? Once received, I can arrange the return order, which I would like to do this week if possible. As Agristo, we want to deliver you a good quality product. Friday 31/5 we have new production planned for you. We can load a full truck on Monday 3/6, to be delivered at your warehouse next Thursday or Friday at latest. Can I use order 222/2024 as attached for the delivery next week? Please advise. Looking forward to our cooperation.
Subject: Order flakes + return order

TextBody: Beste, Met de komende editie van beurs POTATO EUROPE 2024 in het vooruitzicht bied ik u graag onze expertise als ervaren standenbouwer met meer dan 25 jaar ervaring. Kunnen wij voor u een vrijblijvende offerte opmaken, voor het ontwerp en de realisatie van uw beursstand? Hoe wij u als standenbouwer kunnen ontlasten: 1. Creatieve en op maat gemaakte beursstanden: Van standaard tot naadloos maatwerk, ons getalenteerde ontwerpteam zet uw visie omzetten in een uniek en indrukwekkend 3D-ontwerp. 2. Korte responstijden en snelle interventies: Dankzij ons sterk team op de beursvloer kunnen wij snel reageren en indien nodig snelle interventies leveren. 3. Jarenlange ervaring op vakbeurzen in de Benelux: Wij zijn al meer dan 25 jaar actief in de standenbouw voor de B2B sector en hebben een solide reputatie opgebouwd, zowel in België, Nederland, maar ook de omliggende buurlanden. Wij kennen de hallen en hebben de nodige technische kennis voor een vlotte afhandeling. 4. Kwaliteit en professionaliteit: Ons team combineert kennis en ervaren, en zorgt ervoor dat uw stand voldoet aan de hoogste normen zodat uw bedrijf opvalt tussen de concurrentie. Ik ben ervan overtuigd dat wij met onze expertise de ideale partner zijn om voor uw bedrijf een opvallende én effectieve beursstand te bouwen. Om een creatief en vrijblijvend voorstel te kunnen samenstellen, mag u simpelweg mijn email beantwoorden met de afmetingen van uw stand en eventuele belangrijke zaken waar we rekening mee moeten houden. Dan ga ik meteen voor u aan de slag. Benieuwd naar wie we zijn en wat we doen? Neem een kijkje in ons portfolio via onze website gm-productions.be<https://gm-productions.odoo.accomodata.net/r/lmR/m/27313>. Ik sta klaar om uw vragen te beantwoorden, ideeën te bespreken en een geweldige beursstand te realiseren. PS: Onze vroegboekkorting loopt nog tot 21 juni 2024. Wilt u dus graag nog van dit voordeel genieten, reageer dan snel! :) Vriendelijke groeten, Nele T +32 (0)51 24 53 30<tel:+32%20(0)51%2024%2053%2030>
Subject: POTATO EUROPE 2024 - Uw offerte

TextBody: Bonjour, La commande 24001794 devait normalement contenir 29 palettes, mais en raison d'un problème technique avec une grue dans notre entrepôt, seulement 26 palettes ont pu être chargées (les 3 autres palettes étaient bloquées dans notre grue). Le prix de transport n'était donc plus correct, car ce prix avait été introduit pour 29 palettes. J'ai donc annulé la facture initiale (ce qui explique la note de crédit) et j'ai créé une nouvelle facture pour un prix de transport de 26 palettes. Cordialement, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 --------------- Original Message ---------------
Subject: TR: Facture 0090610207

Questa evoluzione promette di rivoluzionare il settore industriale, ponendo l’accento su una produzione che valorizza tanto l’efficienza quanto l’elemento ambientale. Caratteristiche dell'Industria 5.0 [https://47ad2.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/quedeSXkwvF4.jpg?u=2BpAyz2gMiWncgNhtz4mY3cmvauvLoshMY]<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2nfwFS2CMt1liw28XjpMmUMc/qFr4ROCdwEsD> ­ ECOSOSTENIBILITÀ ­ L’ecosostenibilità è un concetto cardine dell’Industria 5.0, che invita le imprese a minimizzare l’impatto ecologico. ­ [https://47ad2.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/AiAg6KpHvx8K.jpg?u=2BpAyz2gMiWnciGhQUNl7I4pHuj5iJfRJ4]<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2nfy8RYhfrb0AyOSLuBrZEJ8/tPtup3g--xrS> ­ ECONOMIA CIRCOLARE ­ Questo nuovo modello industriale incoraggia l’uso di risorse rinnovabili e l’adozione di un’economia circolare. ­ [https://47ad2.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/NkvPI3ytxlvM.jpg?u=2BpAyz2gMiWnck9gwzgjgWWreEXG4oSBFa]<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng01R5CyqAEd0kmA4YMLyFe/GYG-AKJ1uBmu> ­ INNOVAZIONE TECNOLOGICA ­ Le tecnologie come l’Intelligenza Artificiale, la robotica di nuova generazione, l’Internet delle Cose (IoT) e la Realtà Aumentata sono le protagoniste. ­ [https://47ad2.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/T8UDzXrirGay.jpg?u=2BpAyz2gMiWncm2gTUziFkyu0YLQRJEvC6]<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng1uQbiHojT5375yEur8iCA/fn3MQAeFwlWZ> ­ BINOMIO UOMO-MACCHINA ­ La sinergia tra l’uomo e i robot collaborativi, mira a unire la destrezza e l’intelligenza dell’uomo con la costanza e la precisione delle macchine. ­ SCOPRI DI PIU'<https://47ad2.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/7nVU1aA2ng3nQ8DanIhX5TPmPHLvS8g/Pp0Izaw7Euyi> Cerchi una soluzione personalizzata?
Subject: L'avvento dell'Industria 5.0

TextBody: Dear NV Agristo, We have received your goods ready confirmation of PO 4506216846 with the following information: Purchase Order 4506216846 The order is ready for pick up at the orignal handover date, 2024-06-07 00:00:00: Yes New handover date - requested by the supplier (if any) The order can be picked up at the address stated in the order, NL, 5047 SX, Tilburg, Heieinde 10: Yes New permanent adress (if any) Loading reference and portal (if needed) 460462 Total weight in kg 12207 Temperature control required Yes - NB! If the item is not already registered as temperature-regulated goods via Coop's VI form (Item registration form), please contact your Category Planner/Buyer to coordinate the necessary master data. Number of euro-/cheppallets Number of half pallets Number of quarter pallets Number of extra pallets (due to different batches) Number of pallet spaces 33 Loading instructions to the hauler Please contact order_ready@coop.dk for questions or comments regarding the goods ready confirmation.
Subject: We have received your goods ready confirmation of PO 4506216846

TextBody: Hello Michael We would like to remind you that we still have 45 pallets of article 312085 (the TCF 7x7 fries for Dimer). These pallets have an expiry date between August and September of 2024. Please inform us on what to do with these pallets. Will they still be ordered? Are they okay to load? We need to know.
Subject: TFC Fries Dimer

TextBody: Hi All Please see attached a new updated Tesco COP for Micro Testing. Tesco have confirmed the below Key Dates Audits that Start before 01.06.24 – Any audits before this date must be able to demonstrate that they have the policy (Attached) and have a plan to review and implement before 29.07.24 – No NC or Recommendation should be issued 01.06.24 - Any audits from this date must be able to demonstrate that they have the policy (Attached) and have a plan to review and implement before 29.07.24, actions will be as follows * Plan in place to implement but not yet actioned – Recommendation in report * No plan in place to action and or new policy not downloaded by site – Minor NC to be raised 29.07.24 – Go live, from this date you must have dome the following – Normal audit procedures will be in place that could dependant on Severity give you a Minor, Makor or Critical NC if the below are not implemented * Reviewed the procedure and implemented the increased testing into your testing matrix * All products produced on or after the 29.07.24 must be tested against the new COP * You need to have accepted the new document, by signing and returning the above I will collate a list for the relevant TM of acceptance * You need to update all your specs, however the Tesco TM`s are aware the this may not from their point all be actioned by 29.07.24 so there as is an agreement as below (in addition to the above): * Send an email with what updates required to @Joanne Surley <mailto:joanne.surley@fullersfoods.com> and Myself including the suites, tests and limits you are now operating to * @Joanne Surley <mailto:joanne.surley@fullersfoods.com> will start to work on these with the TM and we will share a plan for activation * Any audit that is due from 29.07.24 will be expected to have an updated live spec so will prioritise those with audits in July, Aug and September If you have an audit NC raised that is outside of the above please let myself or Stuart know during the audit and we can see if we can assist via the TM Please can you return the attached signed ASAP, any question please let me know Many Thanks Carl TextBody: If you are having trouble reading this email, read the online version<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/es?s=12511217&e=1875965&elqTrackId=49bd961a5a0d4c9aab8b5d9dc0d7e78f&elq=a0aad9311dcc4d85a956e35721077796&elqaid=1688085&elqat=1>. [Japan Int’l Food & Beverage Expo (JFEX)]<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=JFEX2024_Visit_Consi_Acqui_E_29_May_7_Appointment_System&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=COC4lwHnZKlu0TMu%2BkeVUfvfjXa0Llp4MKd%2F1BBp96m8OW795C33DSwPKbr6d%2FZsz4iWkEqMgYoDqiCRC38bog%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=33693&elqTrackId=2DA5EC67CC2BE34876F519A98ABD99BA&elq=a0aad9311dcc4d85a956e35721077796&elqaid=1688085&elqat=1> Jun 19-21, 2024 at Tokyo Big Sight Dear Steven, Exciting perks are coming your way! On top of the benefits you’ll get from attending this year’s JFEX<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=JFEX2024_Visit_Consi_Acqui_E_29_May_7_Appointment_System&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=COC4lwHnZKlu0TMu%2BkeVUfvfjXa0Llp4MKd%2F1BBp96m8OW795C33DSwPKbr6d%2FZsz4iWkEqMgYoDqiCRC38bog%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=33693&elqTrackId=93BE52429797A50F8A4A73317A7DDF92&elq=a0aad9311dcc4d85a956e35721077796&elqaid=1688085&elqat=1>, we’re making your show experience better with the enhanced appointment booking system. This innovation connects exhibitors and attendees with ease. To maximise your time, you can now schedule appointments with exhibitors in advance. How To Use Appointment Booking System * Search the exhibitors/exhibits * Request onsite meeting appointments with exhibitors * Send messages to exhibitors Remember, though, that the use of the appointment booking system requires a registered visitor badge. So, don’t forget to sign up and experience JFEX Summer with ease and excitement! TextBody: Hi Vanessa: First, we would like to thank you for your email, and nice to meet you. I would also like to take this opportunity to introduce myself. My name is Sérgio Gomes, and I am the General Manager of GAC. Gloria Callimaci is traveling and asked me to give you an answer. As for the attached purchase order, it must be canceled, and a new one made. Colleague Filipe Vieira, copied on this email, will place the new purchase order, and send it to you. Regarding the pallets, we have in stock of non-conforming product, there are a total of 26 pallets. We leave the caveat that there is a product that can be returned by some customers. Then we are waiting for the product to be sent according to the specifications we sent and that conformity, on Monday as stated, but, if possible, send us a photo of the production carried out and a sample of the same product by fast courier (Fedex, DHL...), for us to analyze and test. Thanks. Melhores cumprimentos/
Subject: Order flakes + return order

TextBody: Hi Wais, Olive, Could you please urgently send me a remittance for at least 93,000 GBP? We have 3 orders (PF-KOFF1389, PF-KOFF1388 and PF-KOFF1389) that are scheduled for loading tomorrow, but cannot be loaded for the moment as they are blocked by our credit control. Shall we set up a call to discuss the way forward? Personally, I have the feeling that we are constantly pushing against the limit and that this causes daily follow-up and stress. I would like to tackle this structurally, so that this is more workable for both parties and we don't have to deal with this every day. Looking forward to hearing how you feel about this. Thanks a lot!
Subject: Remittance advice

TextBody: Hello Ali In the meantime I have gone over the draft, please note my remarks: F59 -> Name and Address: AGRISTO nv Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 8710 WIELSBEKE BELGIUM Account: BE53738417044953 F41D: Available with -> bank should be KBC Belgium F43P: Should be set to allowed F44C: please change latest date of shipment to July 15th 2024 to allow us enough time to arrange the shipment F45A: Please change CFR Shanghai to CFR Karachi, as agreed F46A A. -> 8 copies of the invoice is excessive, we issue 5 as an absolute maximum, please change this B. -> please remove "Clean" and just state "Shipped on board" Freight to collect -> change to "Freight prepaid" C. -> Since insurance is not arranged by Agristo, please have this document removed from the required documents list E. 3.SHELF LIFE CERTIFICATE (a)HEALTH CERTIFICATE (b)HALAL CERTIFICATE -> what is meant by this? We issue a health certificate and a halal certificate -> is a shelf life certificate a separate document? is this really needed? F. Is it possible to remove the validty for 6 months and change it to 3 months? H. Please remove this statemen, we will not paste packing list and invoice on each pallet F47A: +1: HS code will be noted as follows: "1105200000" +6. Can the requirement about the shelf life be removed? +8. Please remove this -> we will not attached packing list and invoice to the pallets +17. Please specify the date +18. Please clarify 3rd party documents -> health certificate, certificate of origin and Halal certificate are not issued by Agristo Please let me know your feedback

TextBody: Goede namiddag Marjolein, Bedankt voor uw orders. Op dit moment hebben wij 31 pallets op stock van uw referentie 547.002. De volgende productie is voorzien in week 24. De reden hiervoor is dat wij de productie van kroketten zoveel als mogelijk bundelen, waardoor er maar om de zoveel weken kroketten kunnen geproduceerd worden. U kan order 4500099077 dus volgende week komen afhalen, maar dan met 31 pallets in plaats van 33. Order 4500099102 wenst u af te halen in week 24, maar het artikel wordt pas in die week opnieuw geproduceerd en op dit moment kon de productieplanner mij nog niet zeggen of de productie aan het begin of het einde van die week zou vallen. De productie heeft mij dus gevraagd of u uw order kan aanpassen naar laden week 25. Is dit oké voor u? Alvast bedankt voor uw begrip! Met vriendelijke groeten, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Marjolein Abbo [marjoleinabbo@farmfrites.com] Sent: 29/05/2024 09:30 To: service@agristo.com Subject: FW: Orders 547.002 Goedemorgen, Zie de bijlages voor juni. Met vriendelijke groeten, Marjolein Abbo Supply Chain Planner
Subject: Orders 547.002

TextBody: Good Afternoon Pieter, Please could you advise what our current credit limit is with Agristo ,as we are paying you in 30 days from invoice date, and you are also holding 700k on account. I have just sent across the remittances as per your request. Thanks Olive. [cid:image067169.png@10B697E8.92696AA6] Olive Tanner​​​​ Director T: 0207 720 9012 E: olive.tanner@premierfoodswholesale.com<mailto:Olive.Tanner@premierfoodswholesale.com> W: premierfoodswholesale.com<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> D36‑49 New Covent Garden Market Nine Elms Lane, Battersea, London SW8 5JJ [Facebook]<https://en-gb.facebook.com/premierfoodswholesale> [Linkedin]<https://www.linkedin.com/company/premier-fruits-ltd/?originalSubdomain=uk> [Instagram]<https://www.instagram.com/premierfoodswholesale/?hl=en> [Twitter]<https://mobile.twitter.com/PFoodsWholesale> [www.premierfoodswholesale.com]<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Date: Wednesday, 29 May 2024 at 14:34 To: Wais Mohammad <Wais.Mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com>, Olive Tanner <Olive.Tanner@premierfoodswholesale.com> Subject: Remittance advice Hi Wais, Olive, Could you please urgently send me a remittance for at least 93,000 GBP? We have 3 orders (PF-KOFF1389, PF-KOFF1388 and PF-KOFF1389) that are scheduled for loading tomorrow, but cannot be loaded for the moment as they are blocked by our credit control. Shall we set up a call to discuss the way forward? Personally, I have the feeling that we are constantly pushing against the limit and that this causes daily follow-up and stress. I would like to tackle this structurally, so that this is more workable for both parties and we don't have to deal with this every day. Looking forward to hearing how you feel about this. Thanks a lot!
Subject: Remittance advice

TextBody: We believe that our platform could greatly benefit you as it is designed to provide buyers with access to macadamias of the highest standards. View this email in your browser<https://us8.campaign-archive.com/?e=982dc5b08e&i=*|ITERATION_UNIQUE_ID|*&u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=0081085a7d> [Logo]<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=66f0edf7e5&e=982dc5b08e&i=a410c697e7> Thank you for considering the digital platform to enhance your macadamia trading experience I hope this email finds you well. My name is Gerhard Potgieter, and I am reaching out to you on behalf of the Macadamia Sales Market (MSM). We are excited to introduce you to the possibilities offered by the MSM Trading Platform for Macadamias. We are grateful your interest in macadamia trading after our first correspondence, and believe that our platform could greatly benefit you and your business. The MSM Trading Platform is designed to provide buyers like you with access to macadamias of the highest standards, all while ensuring transparency, safety, and efficiency in every transaction. The platform consolidates products of similar quality and give buyers access to a much larger footprint of macadamia kernels and products, and transparency with regards to disclosure of price, volumes and trends. With our platform, you can: * Access a diverse range of macadamia products and styles with stringent quality standards. * Facilitate transactions securely through our transparent and user-friendly interface. * Gain insights into market trends and pricing to make informed purchasing decisions. * Enjoy a seamless experience from procurement to delivery, with dedicated support every step of the way. We understand that not all buyers purchase macadamias in bulk quantities. If you prefer smaller LCL quantities, there’s the option to consolidate smaller consignments. You can also bring this platform to the attention of your bulk import suppliers, and so benefit from their bulk-break-consignments. By utilising the MSM platform, you can streamline your transactions, access a wider network of trusted suppliers, and ensure continuity of supply. I would like to extend an invitation to you or your relevant procurement team/supplier to join us for a discussion on the prospects of the MSM Macadamia Trading Platform at your earliest convenience. During this meeting, we can provide you with a detailed demonstration of our platform and address any questions or concerns you may have. Please let us know a date and time that works best for you, and we will ensure to accommodate your schedule accordingly. Alternatively, if you have any immediate inquiries or would like more information before the meeting, feel free to reach out to us directly at gerhard@macsm.org<mailto:gerhard@macsm.org?subject=null&body=null>. Alternatively, please visit our website at macsm.org<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=e458595d05&e=982dc5b08e&i=a410c697e7> for more information. Book a Meeting<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=f85aaf0fe1&e=982dc5b08e&i=a410c697e7> We look forward to the opportunity to connect with you and explore the potential of the MSM Trading Platform for Macadamias. Thank you for considering our invitation.
Subject: Thank you for showing interest in the MSM trading platform

TextBody: Hello, If your shipments are rejected by China Customs or could not be declared, there are usually several main causes, 1, No GACC number: If your company hasn’t applied for a GACC number, then you cannot export food products to mainland China. 2, Incorrect HS code: When you filed application for GACC registration, you used the incorrect HS code. Please be aware you cannot make declaration using HS code and products that do not match. 3, Wrong category: You identified the wrong categories when you applied for a GACC number, either general application categories or special application categories. 4, Not register on China Custom Website: If you are first time to export products to China, you need also register on China Custom Website, otherwise, you cannot clear China Custom. Application for GACC registration can be complicated with many details and potential pitfalls that will affect your food exports to mainland China. We have helped many food industry clients with exporting their products and their GACC registrations. Please do not hesitate to contact us If you like to utilize our expertise. Best wishes, Jane Wang 北京环资伟业管理咨询有限公司 Beijing One-Stop Consultation Co., Ltd. 电话/Tel: 0086-10-53656050 手机/Mob: 0086-13671359868 (同微信） WhatsApp: +86-17600330769 邮件/E-mail: info@onestop-consultation.com 网址/Website: www.onestop-consultation.com
Subject: Shipment Rejection Reason by China Customs

TextBody: Read this email in your browser Dear Company, Greetings, We are Special-Creative International Design Company and are currently collaborating with the Chiayi City Government to promote the excellence of local food products. As part of our efforts, we are excited to inform you about our upcoming initiative at the 2024 Taipei International Food Show. Our objective is to assemble a diverse array of local businesses to participate in a food distributor matchmaking event during the food show. We aim to showcase at least fifteen businesses and numerous products, with a focus on highlighting several key items endorsed by Chiayi City. These exhibitors represent esteemed establishments with significant expertise in both product manufacturing and sales. We are eager to recommend these exceptional businesses to your esteemed company and anticipate the opportunity to explore potential collaborations with you. Moreover, we cordially invite your company to partake in the Chiayi City Food Distributor Matchmaking Event, an integral component of this year's food show. For your convenience, please find attached a list detailing the brands and products expected to be showcased. We extend a sincere invitation for your company to join us at the food distributor matchmaking meeting, orchestrated by the Chiayi City Government in conjunction with the international food exhibition. This meeting serves as a platform to introduce our high-quality, locally distinctive products from Chiayi City to your esteemed organization. Below are the specifics of the food distributor matchmaking meeting: Chiayi City Food Distributor Matchmaking Meeting Meeting Venue: ELITE room and CHATTER Room, GRAND HILAI TAIPEI Meeting Time: June 26, 2024, at 2:30 PM Address: 6th Floor, No. 168, Jingmao 1st Road, Nangang District, Taipei City RSVP: https://forms.gle/zrjJ1kP7Ar8fYdty5 Kindly complete the RSVP form provided in the link above if you are interested in participating. Thank you for considering our invitation, and we eagerly anticipate your involvement. Warm
Subject: 【Food Taipei Sponsorship】Chiayi City Food Distributor Matchmaking Meeting

TextBody: Hello Business Development manager, I’d share the following Beach umbrella we’ve done for your reference. For more details please find the attached videos. If you need any further details, please let us know. Hope we cross paths in the future. [说明: cid:image001.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40][说明: cid:image002.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40][说明: cid:image008.jpg@01DA930D.241A6B20][说明: cid:image007.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40][说明: cid:image010.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40] [说明: cid:image012.jpg@01DA930A.8EA53A40] [说明: cid:image011.jpg@01DA930D.241A6B20] [说明: cid:image009.jpg@01DA930B.C99501C0] [说明: cid:image013.jpg@01DA930D.241A6B20] Outdoor Beach umbrella & Parasol Improve customer satisfaction: Providing beach umbrellas and parasols for customers to use can increase their comfort and satisfaction at the business premises. Customers can rest, dine or relax in a shady area and enjoy the pleasant outdoor environment, which helps improve customers' favorability towards the business. Increase customer flow: Businesses providing beach umbrellas and parasols can become one of the highlights to attract customers. In hot weather, many people will look for places that provide shade and shade. If businesses can provide such convenience, they may attract more customers to come and spend money. Extend their stay: Providing beach umbrellas and parasols can make customers more willing to stay in your business’s outdoor areas. In a cool and comfortable environment, customers may spend more or engage in other activities, extending their stay at the merchant, thereby increasing consumption opportunities. Increase sales opportunities: Merchants can set up additional sales points or promotional activities around beach umbrellas and parasols. For example, set up drink stalls, snack stalls or product display areas under the umbrella. Customers can also conveniently purchase the merchant's products or services while using the umbrella, increasing sales opportunities. Enhance brand image: Providing beach umbrellas and parasols can show that businesses care about customer comfort and satisfaction, thereby enhancing brand image. Customers will perceive the merchant as paying attention to details and customer experience, have a positive impression of the merchant, and are likely to recommend the merchant to others. Thanks &
Subject: Re: Customized your own brand Outdoor Beach umbrella & Parasol

TextBody: Hi team, Thank you for your support to reschedule the Hash Browns while ALDI adjusts the revised loading details for the new reference. After discussion with Michelle last night and ALDI today, we are aligned on the next steps: * Week 24 – artwork to be finalised and released to printer * Week 31 – latest we can receive film from printer (allow 2 additional weeks due to Summer Holiday closures) * Week 32 – reschedule production (this could be pushed forward or backward for a week, depending on capacity) * Week 33 – Send first production samples to ALDI * Week 35 – Loading date [cid:image002.png@01DAB288.19D3FAB0] Packaging: * I have calculated that the MOQ equals approx. 1.6 weeks of stock (see below for working) * We need to produce enough stock in existing packaging to cover loadings until week 34, as first production cases of new packaging need to be supplied to ALDI/ * This is a soft cutover, however we should still try and manage as tightly as possible to ensure minimal packaging stock remaining [cid:image015.png@01DAB291.0E7128B0] Please let me know if you have any questions or feedback.
Subject: FW: Seasons Pride Frozen Hash Browns 1kg 823471

View it in your browser.<https://campaign-statistics.com/browser_preview/QU1Q4L6UXm_LwXCh> [Image description] Good Day agristo ﻿ How to make Saffron Rice [Image description] To make saffron rice, you will need the following ingredients: - 1 cup of long-grain white rice - 2 cups of water or chicken broth - A pinch of saffron threads - Salt to taste - 2 tablespoons of butter or olive oil Here's how you can make saffron rice: 1. Rinse the rice in a fine-mesh strainer under cold water until the water runs clear. This helps remove excess starch and prevents the rice from becoming sticky. 2. In a small bowl, crush the saffron threads with your fingers and then pour 2-3 tablespoons of hot water over the saffron. Let it steep for about 10-15 minutes to release its flavor and color. 3. In a medium-sized saucepan, heat the butter or olive oil over medium heat. Add the rinsed rice and sauté for 2-3 minutes until the rice becomes slightly translucent. 4. Pour in the water or chicken broth, along with the saffron and its soaking liquid. Add salt to taste. 5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover the saucepan with a lid, and let it simmer for about 15-20 minutes or until the rice is tender and has absorbed all the liquid. 6. Once the rice is cooked, fluff it with a fork to separate the grains and distribute the saffron evenly. Your saffron rice is now ready to be served as a flavorful and aromatic side dish! Saffron Rice<https://campaign-statistics.com/link_click/QU1Q4L6UXm_LwXCh/52ddbc3b72abe47cff4df4a0057a9e37> IF YOU ARE NOT INTERESTED TO RECEIVE EMAIL REPLY ONLY NUMBER < 1 >, , Also you can click on below tab. unsubscribe<https://campaign-statistics.com/unsubscribe/QU1Q4L6UXm_LwXCh> PRODUCT LIST Saffron [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] [Image description] Pistachios [Image description] Raisins [Image description] Ddried fruit [Image description] Dried rose buds [Image description] Cumin [Image description] TOP GEM Company is a key supplier of agricultural products, active mainly in Saffron, Pistachios and other spice & nuts. ﻿

TextBody: Hi Isadora, Don’t forget we are keeping stock for them since months now… I am quite disappointed in this customer I must say… First hassles with Hapag, we switch them to MSC on our costs and now we are even punished more by storage costs. There is about 10 containers to go.
Subject: Nobredo / Vessel info / Week 21 21

Attention e-commerce focused manufacturers and suppliers! This is your golden opportunity to shine at WORLDEF Istanbul, happening June 6th-8th at the Istanbul Yenikapı Event Area! WORLDEF, in collaboration with Wabel, is your one-stop shop to dominate the e-commerce landscape! Showcase your cutting-edge production and supply power to a network of potential customers eager to expand their online offerings. Here's what awaits you: * Connect with a sea of engaged buyers: Forge lucrative partnerships that propel your brand to the top! * Unleash your e-commerce expertise: Network with industry leaders and fellow innovators. * Gain a global edge: WORLDEF is your platform to conquer new markets! Spots are filling up fast! Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your e-commerce presence! TextBody: Bonjour, Le soucis c’est que la réception passe de Nuit à partir du mois de juin, je peux vous proposer du coup le 04/06 à 00h57 Est-ce Ok pour vous ? Bonne Journée à vous. Cordialement, [cid:image001.png@01DAB26E.8D84D390]https://teams.microsoft.com/l/chat/0/0?users=quentin.hugues@mousquetaires.com [cid:image002.png@01DAB26E.8D84D390] De : Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Envoyé : mercredi 29 mai 2024 16:47 À : Quentin HUGUES <quentin.hugues@mousquetaires.com> Cc : alain.coulmeau@gxo.com Objet : RE: Montélimar/Agristo - Cdes 71706719 71706720 – Litige Bonjour, Je reviens de nouveau vers vous. Livraison demain n'est donc pas faisable et il y a un nouveau retard. Merci de donner un nouveu rendez-vous et nos excuses pour l'inconvénient. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl.
