All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. TextBody: Morning Pieter, Hope you are doing well. This week I received a statement from your accounts department mentioning invoices pending that goes back to February that is not correct. The below invoices are paid. 0090590475 Paid 05/04/24 0090601740 Paid 0090601873 Paid 22/05/24 0090601908 Paid 22/05/24 0090601950 Paid 22/05/24 0090602645 Paid 0090602750 Paid 0090602884 Paid 0090603046 Paid 0090603058 Paid 009063068 Paid 009063388 Paid 009063411 Paid Total 417366.00 This is a huge figure considering Credit limit, usually you will be getting the money right away. Can we please get this issue sorted right away? We will set up a phone call next week ones the above payments allocated. Thanks [cid:image113121.png@BA8961C5.C7D9647C] Wais Mohammad​​​​ T: 0207 720 9012 E: wais.mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com<mailto:Wais.Mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com> W: premierfoodswholesale.com<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> D36‑49 New Covent Garden Market Nine Elms Lane, Battersea, London SW8 5JJ [Facebook]<https://en-gb.facebook.com/premierfoodswholesale> [Linkedin]<https://www.linkedin.com/company/premier-fruits-ltd/?originalSubdomain=uk> [Instagram]<https://www.instagram.com/premierfoodswholesale/?hl=en> [Twitter]<https://mobile.twitter.com/PFoodsWholesale> [www.premierfoodswholesale.com]<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: 29 May 2024 14:35 To: Wais Mohammad <Wais.Mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com>; Olive Tanner <Olive.Tanner@premierfoodswholesale.com> Subject: Remittance advice Hi Wais, Olive, Could you please urgently send me a remittance for at least 93,000 GBP? We have 3 orders (PF-KOFF1389, PF-KOFF1388 and PF-KOFF1389) that are scheduled for loading tomorrow, but cannot be loaded for the moment as they are blocked by our credit control. Shall we set up a call to discuss the way forward? Personally, I have the feeling that we are constantly pushing against the limit and that this causes daily follow-up and stress. I would like to tackle this structurally, so that this is more workable for both parties and we don't have to deal with this every day. Looking forward to hearing how you feel about this. Thanks a lot!
Subject: Remittance advice

TextBody: Hey Charlotte, die versie heb ik niet ontvangen hoor denk ik: Bonte Maarten Customer Service Officer Agristo nv P +32 485 134 330 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Charlotte D'haeyere [charlotte.dhaeyere@agristo.com] Sent: 30/05/2024 09:51 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: RE: 62213 T2L Dag Maarten, versie met PLDA nr kan je vinden in de douane inbox als je zoekt op delivery nr: Da’s het document dat we via douane doorkrijgen (zie blauw gemarkeerd) en dus niet de versie via C4T: Zijn er nog andere klanten van jou die dit opvragen? Ik pols eens bij andere collega’s met T2L ladingen in BE of ze dit vaak manueel moeten doorsturen naar de klant/Remant. Zoja, pols ik eens bij IT hoeveel effort het zou zijn om dit op te zetten (dus dat de T2L met PLDA nr gelinkt wordt in SAP en die dan via instellen ZEXP in nieuwe customer app automatisch kan uitgestuurd worden naar de klant.) Hadden we nog niet nagevraagd, omdat volume niet hoog was en omdat er nog wijzigingen aankomen mbt opzet T2L … maar blijft aanslepen … en als het te veel effort is momenteel om dit manueel te doen, polsen we ms toch nog best eens bij IT of dit kan opgezet worden.:) Groetjes, Charlotte Charlotte​​​​ D'haeyere Customer Service Officer UK & Europe T +32 56 54 11 51 • M +32 474 76 65 02 Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com
Subject: 62213 T2L

TextBody: 26 - 28 Jun 2024, Sands Expo & Convention Centre, Singapore View this email in your browser<https://mailchi.mp/iegasia/restaurant-asia-scotsman?e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/824127a8-553e-6183-5eb3-6fa7b837a9c8.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=aafcf145ab&e=ac08d24560> Held in conjunction with [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/61182a97-2c9f-f46c-b94b-fb5c872fad1c.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=c4cb2c03db&e=ac08d24560> Co-located with [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/5509c4f2-6dab-9531-aeee-e2666c6b077d.png] 26 - 28 June 2024 Halls D, E & F - Basement 2 Sands Expo & Convention Centre, Singapore Exhibitor Spotlight [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/41040f15-74ce-4c47-3546-cea5d3ce8d1b.jpeg] Scotsman Industries Singapore Pte Ltd RJ20 | Singapore & Italy Welcome to Scotsman Ice Home of the industry’s only complete solution for highly efficient, superior-performing ice systems. Partner and Official Ice Supplier of World Coffee Championship and International Bartender Academy, and Official Ice Sponsor of the Singapore National Coffee Championships 2024. Instagram<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=92f48b21ac&e=ac08d24560> Facebook<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=290b895463&e=ac08d24560> LinkedIn<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=8442d69469&e=ac08d24560> YouTube<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=230cca9242&e=ac08d24560> TikTok<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=89bdcc749f&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/27880034-9bee-7c0f-386a-933d0bb70bc2.jpeg] For decades, Scotsman has been one of the world’s leading manufacturers of ice machines and ancillary products. Today, the brand offers literally hundreds of model variations, with more machines producing more varieties of ice than any other manufacturer, from compact back bar gourmet cubes for hospitality, to huge industrial machines making scale ice for the fishing and food manufacturing sectors. Ice is our passion. It is at the heart of everything we do. * World’s No. 1 Ice Manufacturer with over 1 million machines installed worldwide * Distributors in 100+ countries throughout the world * Widest range of ice varieties with production capacities to suit any application * EcoX series of machines are fully compliant with 2022’s revisions to the F-Gas regulations * Continuous R&D ensures Scotsman equipment remains a leader in the ice production market * Long lifecycle delivering great value with industry-leading warranty provision. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/ba74c941-1a5f-0291-e2f5-87b5981e2b30.jpeg] [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/64483d88-0542-5723-7a70-66ae366479fa.png] MXG 638 Modular ice machine producing Gourmet Ice Cubes with maximum production at 370kg/24h. Crystal-clear, pure, hard and long-lasting ice cubes are individually formed by spraying water onto a subcooled horizontal evaporator. Its fast-cooling action and slow dilution makes drinks chilled for a long time, perfect for bartenders and baristas. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/afeae07b-15ac-45cf-4e3e-bb6af36c8c78.png] MXF New ice machine launched in 2023 for Flake Ice. It is highly versatile and suitable for multiple applications: * Fish & buffet displays * Frozen drink preparation * Wine & champagne buckets [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/5bd5930f-332d-f74c-2143-32ae26ad96e5.jpg] NU300 / NW508 Undercounter and modular ice machines for Dice Ice. Classic 6-sided ice cubes where its greater surface area for heat exchange allows for fast-chilling of all drinks. The vertical evaporator technology of this ice cube guarantees large ice production at lower operating costs. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/0dae2471-2234-ac76-bcf7-01f04dca0a47.jpeg]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=6a9c7c95fe&e=ac08d24560> Enjoy up to 11% off your ticket when you fly with our Official Airlines [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/a1a871e4-7036-8402-ac1c-3d67f2a34d7f.png] Promo code: SIGEPA24<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=59915e91e3&e=ac08d24560> Enjoy specially negotiated rates with our Official Accommodation Partner [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/b946ab36-fd54-943b-74d9-c07c38b448a6.png] Find out how you can take advantage of the best pricing and hotel booking experience. Book here!<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=48eeecc881&e=ac08d24560> SQ Promo Code applicable to the following countries: Australia, Brunei, Cambodia, China, France, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Italy, Malaysia, Netherlands, Philippines, Sri Lanka, Thailand, UAE, United Kingdom, Vietnam [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/dff33951-a7ea-a9da-3d61-339ffda2ed0f.png] Presenting 5 shows, 8 thematic zones & pavilions catering to all key aspects of the F&B industry! [SIGEP Asia, Restaurant Asia 2024]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=be07731c05&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/b179ff2a-96e5-48f6-85fc-7d8378182a18.jpeg] [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/5f6e1dad-ac4f-d3e9-19ad-ef03096433ed.png] Contact our sales team to book your stand today! Click here to view the sales deck<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=146fabd02e&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/8c5b956d-0a76-400a-afc0-db93c11ac45a.png] IEG Asia Pte. Ltd. A company of Italian Exhibition Group S.p.A. 1 Maritime Square #09-57 HarbourFront Centre, Singapore 099253
Subject: Restaurant Asia Exhibitor Highlight: Scotsman

TextBody: Dag Maarten, versie met PLDA nr kan je vinden in de douane inbox als je zoekt op delivery nr: Da’s het document dat we via douane doorkrijgen (zie blauw gemarkeerd) en dus niet de versie via C4T: [cid:image001.png@01DAB275.F2719A20] Zijn er nog andere klanten van jou die dit opvragen? Ik pols eens bij andere collega’s met T2L ladingen in BE of ze dit vaak manueel moeten doorsturen naar de klant/Remant. Zoja, pols ik eens bij IT hoeveel effort het zou zijn om dit op te zetten (dus dat de T2L met PLDA nr gelinkt wordt in SAP en die dan via instellen ZEXP in nieuwe customer app automatisch kan uitgestuurd worden naar de klant.) Hadden we nog niet nagevraagd, omdat volume niet hoog was en omdat er nog wijzigingen aankomen mbt opzet T2L … maar blijft aanslepen … en als het te veel effort is momenteel om dit manueel te doen, polsen we ms toch nog best eens bij IT of dit kan opgezet worden.:) Groetjes, Charlotte [cid:image002.png@01DAB275.F2719A20] Charlotte​​​​ D'haeyere Customer Service Officer UK & Europe T +32 56 54 11 51<tel:+32%2056%2054%2011%2051> • M +32 474 76 65 02<tel:+32%20474%2076%2065%2002> Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com<https://eu.content.exclaimer.net?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&excomponentid=E_Xg2xpZEE7COvcAHBDP1EjLNrmijgfYCtnikvl0Y9o&excomponenttype=Link&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1> [Find your crispy challenge on our new job site]<https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&excomponentid=0FtwO6H728rcYRqVjUeXx_KJWv-RPvCRW1zd8woKpSo&excomponenttype=Image&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1>

TextBody: Hi Becky, We currently have 278 pallets finished products on stock of this new item. I had been informed by Michèle this article will be launched in store in July. Shall we foresee an order? What volume would you like to receive by when? (May I also ask you to send your e-mails to service@agristo.com? This makes it easier for me to handle your request.) Thanks!
Subject: 96020578 BE 900g Chips

Subject: FW: Orders for June

TextBody: Dear Rizwan, Atradius is not willing to grant any credit insurance for your company as they have information on previous claims. This means that the only 2 credit insurers we are working with (Groupama and Atradius) are refusing to give us a credit limit for your company. We do not use any other credit insurers. The only way we can do business with your company is on the terms of 30% prepayment + 70% Cash Against Documents. Please confirm the payment term, so we can continue with the order.
Subject: PI First orders

TextBody: Bonjour, Merci pour la commande ! Elle a été enregistrée dans notre système et sera chargée selon la chronologie demandée. La commande sera prête à être enlevée à partir du 03/06. Cette commande dépasse votre limite de crédit de 1.500 euros. Quand les prochains paiements seront-ils effectués ? Cordialement, Louise Regnier Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 62 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: EMEK Distribution [contact@emekgroup.fr] Sent: 30/05/2024 09:40 To: service@agristo.com; contact@emekgroup.fr Subject: Commande Fournisseur N° 4770Commande Fournisseur n°4771 Bonjour, Vous trouverez ci-jointe notre Commande fournisseur N°4770 et N°4771 Charger en premier la commande : 4771 (livré en dernier) 14 palettes Charger en second la commande : 4770 (livré en premier) 17 Palettes Merci de nous tenir informer pour la confirmation de la commande ainsi que la date d’enlèvement. Cordialement. Ce message et toutes pièces jointes sont établis à l'intention exclusive de ses destinataires et sont confidentiels. Si vous n'en êtes pas le destinataire voulu, merci d'en avertir l'expéditeur à son adresse e-mail ou au numéro de téléphone précisés ci-dessus et d'effacer ce courrier électronique de votre système. Toute divulgation, reproduction ou autre diffusion ou utilisation de ce message totale ou partielle est strictement interdite.
Subject: Commande Fournisseur N° 4770Commande Fournisseur n°4771

I kindly ask you to delete this requirement.

TextBody: Propak East Africa visitor registration is open View this email online<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/q/13W7Q1DuHGJUwlfw8n6JO/wv> [https://event.montgomerygroup.com/i/amf_angus_montgomery/user_53/PEA/25/PROPAKL.png?size=600x0&w=BhuHZDa-Kby6Fica3FfBCFwQFLlM] <https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1P9J7BALYrDCltSE8ie0qAK> Book A Stand<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PdIsX1vjWBB5FKdwDWZ2Gl> [https://event.montgomerygroup.com/i/amf_angus_montgomery/user_53/PEA/25/Beige_Black_Modern_Fashion_New_Arrivals_Blog_Banner.png?size=1200x0&w=BouIVFeE9DDjJzi60s51ddcc_P80] <https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PhHOiseFrzzPRBMUZFXELW> Brochure<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PlH9DSY0WxyA3tmjloWgRx> Website<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PpGuZjHmrvxkfkVHH7USX8> Book A Stand<https://event.montgomerygroup.com/c/1e1PxFbGba3rruOD44uozS78k> Greetings, I hope this message finds you well. As you may know, the next edition of Propak East Africa 2025, the premier B2B exhibition and conference for packaging, printing, plastics, and food and beverage processing professionals, is set to take place from May 20th to 22nd, 2025. This is your golden opportunity to showcase your products and services to a targeted audience of industry leaders, suppliers, manufacturers, and distributors from across the East African region. We have been offering an exclusive early bird booking rate to help our valued exhibitors secure their spots at a reduced cost. However, this special offer is ending soon. After June 17th, 2024, our rates will increase. Why Exhibit at Propak East Africa 2025? * Unparalleled Networking Opportunities: Connect with over 5,000 industry professionals and decision-makers. * Brand Exposure: Showcase your innovations and solutions to a highly engaged audience. * Market Insights: Gain valuable insights and stay ahead of industry trends. * Business Growth: Foster new partnerships and generate high-quality leads. Act Now - Secure Your Stand at the Best Rate! Don’t miss out on this incredible opportunity to enhance your brand’s presence in the East African market. Book your stand by June 17th to take advantage of our early bird rates and ensure you get the best possible spot on the exhibition floor.
Subject: Early Bird Rate for Propak East Africa Ends Soon!

TextBody: Hi Siddeeque, Please find schedule enclosed. In Column Loading Agristo, you can see the Week Commencing Date - this is the week when we will book the loading. When the vessel is confirmed, I will complete further details and adapt ETA and vessel in the schedule. We will try to follow these weeks, taking into account 7 containers per week and starting next week. Please note that 4500004418 and 4500004410 already shipped, so I will delete them out the schedule. Kindly confirm if stated otherwise. For the new orders, I have put in the 99- proforma number in the first column and fit them into the schedule. Also please find all pdfs enclosed. Kindly provide me your pdfs/ordernumbers so I can adapt these in the schedule. KR, Sarah Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: [siddeeque@gulfwest.com] Sent: 29/05/2024 14:03 To: sarah.detailleur@agristo.com; mohamed.elhawary@agristo.com; service@agristo.com Cc: sadiq@gulfwest.com; logistics@gulfwest.com; saif.basheer@gulfwest.com; shihab@gulfwest.com; moustafa.dessouki@agristo.com; leena@gulfwest.com Subject: RE: Agristo - Gulfwest Service Dear Mohamed, Thank you for your prompt response and for providing clarification regarding the situation with the EVER CRISP 10X10 SKIN ON STRAIGHT CUT FR containers, However, we would like to bring to your attention the significant potential stemming from the additional leads we obtained at the recent Food Show. These leads present a promising opportunity for increased sales, and we believe that with your support, we can capitalize on them effectively. In the past, we have encountered similar situations with our battered products, and your(Agristo) assistance has been instrumental in navigating through them successfully. Hence, we are reaching out to you once again, confident that together, we can achieve even greater results @Sarah Detailleur, as per our standard procedure, we typically issue POs based on the PI provided by your end. Therefore, we kindly request you to share the PI with us at your earliest convenience Thank you
Subject: Agristo - Gulfwest Service

TextBody: 150+ sessions, live music, demos and loads more [ITâ€™S ALMOST HERE..-2] <https://bit.ly/3WV7Q29> Dear colleague, With just one week remaining until Smart Manufacturing & Engineering Week<https://bit.ly/3UV005U> 2024, we are thrilled to welcome you to an event packed with innovation, insights, and networking opportunities. >> FREE TICKETS << <https://bit.ly/3WV7Q29> VISIT WEBSITE <https://bit.ly/3UV005U> Hereâ€™s a glimpse of what awaits you next Wednesday & Thursday: [BEST OF BRITISH SHOWCASE!-4] 2024 Content Agenda Free-to-attend presentations are delivered by manufacturing and engineering experts covering Design & Innovation, Maintenance, IIoT & Connectivity, Digital Transformation, Data & AI, Fluid Power & Air-Tech. Check out the agenda >> <https://bit.ly/4e1WdfZ> Live Music & Drinks Gather round the Headline stage to hear our guest band the Shadow Monkeys play during the networking party! (2)-2] Guitar Legends Competition 2024 sees the return of our LIVE guitar competition! Sign up now >> <https://bit.ly/4e9sCRQ> Dedicated Visitor Trails To help visitors navigate the presentations and exhibitors most relevant to them, we're introducing a new feature called 'Visitor Trail' to make the most out of your visit at the show! (3)] [SMEW_SocialReg_1920x1080 (300 x 250 px)] Best of British Showcase Join us in a celebration of domestic manufacturing, featuring world-beating new designs, innovative modes of manufacture, products that redefine categories, and export successes that plant the flag in overseas markets. Find out more >> <https://bit.ly/4bWa9WG> IfM Masterclasses The Institute for Manufacturing (IfM) Theatre showcases research and knowledge transfer activities from the Institute for Manufacturing, University of Cambridge. Their 2021-30 strategy<https://bit.ly/4bRcHp8> sets out four key principles of global responsibility â€“ responsible, purposeful, inclusive and regenerative â€“ that they want to see embedded in the culture of how all engineering is taught and practised. TextBody: Goede morgen, Zoals reeds bekend zullen wij later op het jaar de Belgische kroketten wijzigen van gewicht, 800g wordt 700g. De eerste leveringen zouden wij aan onze klanten willen doen vanaf W39, beschikbaar om te laden bij Agristo ergens in W38. In bijlage de forecast in kg tem WK38 op de 800g Onze stock is momenteel = 0, we zijn OUT en er is ook geen stock meer bij jullie. TextBody: External: Verify the sender before clicking any link/attachment. Hi Kathleen, Thank you for your email. But I did mention to Pieter before. For Singapore, the preference is with HFCE because it has the Halal ID there. The purpose is due to halal traceability – how do we show evidence that the product is the same as the halal cert? Either by the same name on the label or the Halal ID number. I understand that Malaysia does not recognise HFCE anymore and recognises HFFIA but HFFIA does not show the traceability that is required for Food Service. I am hoping that the ones applied for Ben Foods is under HFCE or any organisation that meets the halal traceability standards. In the meantime, as we wait for the Ben Foods Halal cert to be ready, can you send me a letter like what I have attached that links the product to the HQC and HFFIA certs? Thank you.
Subject: RE: Agristo service

Pas d’impact sur le bilan ni sur votre capacité d’endettement en comptabilité sociale. Pas de TVA à avancer sur le prix de l’installation : elle est facturée sur les loyers EDF ENR supervise et maintient vos installations pendant toute la durée du contrat. [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/5031381406658.jpg] [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/8881327956658.jpg] [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/1705862709665.jpg] [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/1625527956665.jpg] DEMANDEZ VOTRE ÉTUDE PERSONNALISÉE<https://news.tuplanatope.> [https://news.tuplanatope.com/img/149448/images/7130963276658.png] (1) Le niveau de réduction de la facture dépend de plusieurs facteurs tels que le prix de l’électricité et le profil de consommation du client. Selon les configurations, cette baisse peut atteindre 40% de la facture d’énergie électrique. L’estimation est indicative et non contractuelle et basée des panels de simulations, chaque projet nécessite une analyse détaillée de votre profil de consommation ainsi que la localisation / orientation de vos panneaux photovoltaïques. Aussi, l’énergie qui est produite et non consommée localement, pourra être revalorisée par un mécanisme de soutien de l’Etat, sous réserve d’éligibilité. (2) Les installations solaires sont éligibles à une prime à l'investissement. Cette prime est fonction de la puissance de l'installation (puissance du générateur photovoltaïque <=100 kWc) [https://tracking.publicidees.com/link.php?promoid=259212&progid=8329&partid=62781&to_shootid=54406] Ce message est envoyé de la part des sociétés filiales du Groupe Dataventure, dans le cadre de la promotion de ses offres commerciales, et de celle de ses partenaires, susceptibles d’intéresser votre organisme. Ce message est envoyé sur une adresse générique professionnelle et n’implique pas de traitement de données à caractère personnel, au sens du Règlement Général sur la Protection des Données (Règlement (UE) 2016/679 ou « RGPD »). Par conséquent, les exigences requises par le RGPD ne s’appliquent pas au présent message. Pour plus d’informations, contactez-nous à l’adresse dpo@cardata.fr<mailto:dpo@cardata.fr>. Si l’organisme souhaite se désinscrire totalement de nos listes d’envoi, cliquez ici<https://news.tuplanatope.>

TextBody: Bonjour, A la suite des différentes commandes livrées au cours du mois de avril 2024, nous avons constaté, sur la base du contrat logistique qui nous unit, des défauts de performances logistiques de votre part. Afin de démontrer ces manquements, vous trouverez en pièce jointe, à titre de preuve, une extraction du logiciel de gestion. Conformément au paragraphe D de la Foire Aux Questions portant sur les lignes directrices en matière de pénalités logistiques, « une photographie, une capture écran du logiciel » font partie des preuves matérialisant le manquement. Le préjudice lié à ces défauts de performance logistique est détaillé dans les pièces jointes. Le respect des niveaux de performance convenus dans notre contrat logistique permet d'assurer un taux de service optimal de livraison auprès de nos Points de Vente, permettant ainsi d’éviter tout manquement engendrant un manque à gagner à la revente en raison de l’indisponibilité de la marchandise en temps et heure. Nous vous rappelons que vous disposez d'un délai de 30 jours à compter de la réception de cet avis de pénalités pour en contrôler le bien-fondé et nous transmettre vos remarques. Merci de nous retourner vos analyses contradictoires associées à cette extraction. Au retour de vos remarques, lors d’échanges contradictoires, nous prendrons en compte les éléments justifiés et documentés que vous mentionneriez afin d’obtenir un accord avant établissement d’une facturation. Nous restons à votre disposition pour toute question et pour étudier avec vous des moyens spécifiques afin d'améliorer votre performance logistique pour nos prochaines commandes. Nous vous remercions de bien vouloir adresser vos retours à l'adresse mail : itmlai_negociations_logistiques@mousquetaires.com et à votre négociateur de dossier : - Fatyne BOUFOUS - fatyne.boufous@mousquetaires.com : Frais non laitier (volailles, œuf, traiteur, charcuterie, traiteur de la mer, viandes) - Priscillia LUZOLO - priscillia.luzolo@mousquetaires.com : DPH (Parfumerie, entretien et Hygiène) & Epicerie Salée - Marylise GOBIN - marylise.gobin@mousquetaires.com : Epicerie Sucrée / PPI & Animaux - Chloé MAYALA - chloe.mayala@mousquetaires.com : Vins & Champagnes, BNA, Bière, Alcools & Gel - Faustine BOSIO - faustine.bosio@mousquetaires.com : Frais Laitier - Carine GALLETTE - carine.gallette@mousquetaires.com : Maison/Textile Cordialement, Equipe Négociation / Logistique ITM LAI ----------------------------- Disclaimer ------------------------------ --- Ce message ainsi que les éventuelles pièces jointes constituent une correspondance privée et confidentielle à l'attention exclusive du destinataire désigné ci-dessus. Si vous n'êtes pas le destinataire du présent message ou une personne susceptible de pouvoir le lui délivrer, il vous est signifié que toute divulgation, distribution ou copie, totale ou partielle, sur un quelconque support de cette transmission est strictement interdite. Si vous avez recu ce message par erreur, nous vous remercions d'en informer l'expéditeur par téléphone ou de lui retourner le présent message, puis d'effacer immédiatement ce message de votre systeme. Tout message électronique est susceptible d'altération. Le "groupement des Mousquetaires" décline toute responsabilité au titre de ce message s'il a été altéré, déformé ou falsifié.--- --- This e-mail and any attachments is a confidential correspondence intended only for use of the individual or entity named above. If you are not the intended recipient or the agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, distribution or copying, either whole or partial, in any medium of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication by mistake, please notify the sender by phone or by replying this message, and then delete this message from your system. E-mails are susceptible of alteration. The "Mousquetaires' group" shall not therefore be liable for the message if altered, changed or falsified.--- -----------------------------------------------------------------------
Subject: Indemnités logistiques ITM - avril 2024 - 82006 - AGRISTO N-V - 76

TextBody: Wat dacht u van een metalen tussenvloer ? ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Indien u deze e-mail niet kan lezen ? » klik dan hier<https://web.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/html_mail.jsp?params=hwYjlkOiaxyL1l%2BoMAfj2UJFk6xse%2BoeWbfkvCSQJVnTnCeSPBkYjL9heLBiGRP5gCZzp4zws7g9vvNEP30ZMMTZVHP5IpwfvolVXE2BhdE%3D> [Logo Storacon]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrkq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000jyorfh4&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [Logo Provost]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrp00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000b6fy304&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Extra bedrijfsoppervlakte zonder bij te bouwen dankzij onze metalen tussenvloeren [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/366a22b9-58a4-4c6a-abaf-6c856eeba176.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrky0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000fhjbs64&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Dag beste klant, Bent u op zoek naar extra vierkante meters tegen voordelige prijs ? Wist u dat u met een metalen tussenvloer uw beschikbare ruimte kan vergroten zonder te hoeven bijbouwen of ingrijpende werken te moeten uitvoeren of bijkomend te moeten ruimte huren ? Onze LP3 tussenvloer, conform de norm EN1090 en CE goedgekeurd, is geschikt voor tal van toepassingen. Meer weten<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrl00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000fb3k7jq&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/2a30dd15-c53a-4a8e-9fe8-4f0c443497fd.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrli0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000j642iqq&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Tussenvloer voor opslag Benut de volledige hoogte van uw gebouw om uw ruimte voor opslag te verdubbelen of verdriedubbelen. Onze regioverantwoordelijken helpen u graag bij de keuze van het type tussenvloer : met grote overspanning, met gangpaden tussen rekken of een extra verdieping bovenop rekken. Ik ontdek<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrli0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000j642iqq&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Industriële tussenvloer Creëer extra ruimte bovenop werkplaatsen. Een schaalbare oplossing die gemakkelijk aan veranderende behoeften kan worden aangepast. Ook ideaal voor onderhoudsruimtes. Ik ontdek<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrlq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000bjidwtu&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/2084889b-130f-4341-84aa-bf6adf6d391d.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrlq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000bjidwtu&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/d6da0222-c39f-4846-bc5e-356e5c07947b.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrly0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nwptbku&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Tussenvloer voor kantoren In uw werkplaats of magazijn een zone inrichten als kantoor, dat kan heel snel dankzij onze combinatie van scheidingswanden en tussenvloer. Een budgetvriendelijke oplossing met een stijlvolle afwerking. Ik ontdek<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrly0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nwptbku&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Een project op maat ? Een van onze 4 regioverantwoordelijken in België begeleidt u graag. Ik heb een project<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrm00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000f3shju0&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/0fc4971b-6d8e-44c5-a954-c8555078762c.png] [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/b5ebfdf9-e47e-4075-a998-56de72239da5.png]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrmi0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000jevx6n0&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Veilig betalen Gratis levering* vanaf aankoop van € 100 [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/b724d785-4f2e-45b0-8840-2240374fdd04.png]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrmq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000btbo0oe&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/8fef2500-7825-48b2-89b8-205bc7c1f778.jpg]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrmy0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nmg6xxe&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> Familiebedrijf sinds 1963 4 regioverantwoordelijken in België Storacon, ontwerper en fabrikant van uw werkomgeving [X] [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/95211fd8-15a0-477d-a88a-f0dfeaa53564.png] Hulp nodig ? Onze afdeling klantenservice staat voor u klaar : 056 77 58 21 [X]<tel:+33809102202> > Contact<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrmy0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nmg6xxe&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> > Veelgestelde vragen<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrn00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000nkuv20i&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [X] [X]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrni0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000bvtfnzi&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [X]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrnq0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000jch4t2m&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/f75bae32-5ae1-43ff-95ce-e45b3529cf0f.png]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rrny0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000f50medm&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [https://media.inx-cdn.de/nxpml-ca0b7a6f-a976-4c68-a002-d00cac877c86/cb79bfe7-79ef-48a8-97df-a09469d21acc.png]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rro00b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000jpdkiuu&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [X]<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rroi0b7bie00d0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000fqe27nu&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> [X]<https://www.threads.net/@provostrayonnage?utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> *Alleen geldig voor aankopen op onze website. STORACON, ontwerper en fabrikant van opslagmogelijkheden en specialist in inrichting van werkomgevingen. STORACON biedt een breed assortiment kunststof bakken, producten voor goederenbehandeling en werkplaatsmeubilair voor de inrichting van uw bedrijfsruimten. In overeenstemming met de Europese RGPD-verordening hebt u recht op toegang, rectificatie, wijziging en verwijdering van uw persoonsgegevens. U kan dit recht uitoefenen door hier <mailto:contact@storacon.be?subject=Recht%20op%20toegang%20tot%20persoonlijke%20gegevens> te klikken. U ontvangt dit bericht omdat u zich hebt ingeschreven voor de Storacon nieuwsbrief. U kunt zich te allen tijde uitschrijven van de nieuwsbrief door deze link te volgen Uitschrijven<https://rdir.inxmail.com/steel_evolution/d?p000rroq0b7bie00k0000h2i00000000bqdoi4b2sfocnqdwpgh7zc0q00000w000000b4g356i&utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=STOMAIL24&code=STOMAIL24&crm=> uniquement pour les achats sur notre site web.
Subject: Verdubbel uw bedrijfsoppervlak zonder bij te bouwen Meneer Algemeen

TextBody: Bonjour, Je viens de recevoir un message de notre transporteur m'indiquant qu'il ne peut pas décharger chez vous et qu'il attend à Vendargues depuis 4h du matin car l'entrepôt est surchargé. N'y a-t-il vraiment aucune possibilité de décharger aujourd'hui ? Y a-t-il un dépôt à proximité où nous pourrions décharger ? Ou la commande doit-elle être renvoyée en Belgique ? Cordialement, Staf Vantieghem Customer Service Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 14 17 46

TextBody: The Hotel Show is in 5 days. Register now for free. View this email online<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/q/17QwWMF6XJQWgD9ZawSlTH/wv> [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/i/amf_dmg_events/project_3014/Last_chance_-_The_Hotel_Show.png?size=640x0&w=BFq353aGkfMQxua8LwDHUUNOXde0] <https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bgREa4Rd9ZjyfuFYnOnc15lRv9> Dear , Time is running out to get your free visitor badge! The Hotel Show opens in 5 days, running from 4 - 6 June at the Dubai World Trade Centre. If you haven't yet registered, here is your chance<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bgREhRzRZ9OvGye7xmrIpREcqm>! At The Hotel Show, you can: * Meet and build meaningful connections with 250+ leading exhibiting companies in the hospitality industry. * Learn from 110+ leading experts across 4 fully fledged CPD certified hospitality conferences. * Gain access to 4 co-located events - INDEX, Workspace, Leisure Show and KIDSPACE. * Experience the awe-inspiring stage design at The Hotel Leadership and F&B Forum. BADGE DETAILS [http://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_487/border-333.png] Your name: . Job title: Company name: AGRISTO COMPLETE YOUR REGISTRATION <https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bgREpEiwOkjt7BMgGUweODWxlz> It's time to transform hospitality spaces with product, design and technology, all found under one roof at The Hotel Show 2024. We can't wait to see you there! Yours sincerely, [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/i/amf_dmg_events/project_3014/Untitled_design_18_.png?size=139x0&w=Bo99fxTMB4XNsuPkTZZS_UQL50dA] Polina Patyrina Event Director The Hotel Show CONTACT US

TextBody: Hi Lisa The order has been moved to next week. You should be able to book now.

Hi Agathe, without error from my side I did not receive the final volume confirmation + the supply forecast. Can you please send this to me? I would already ask your approval to order the film for the Duchesse and the Dauphines. Dauphines: 2000kg - good for 275 pallets. We already have 3784.5kg film in stock - good for 522 pallets. Duchesse: 4000kg - good for 707 pallets Are you also able to give me the DU code for the new products? (gratin with mushrooms, dauphine with truffle) Thank you! Marlies Marlies De Ketele Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63
Subject: EOY 2024 Findus

TextBody: Helder Batista has left Nutritir - Terramar Group on the 30th of April 2024. Please contact pedro.marques@nutritir.com for Commercial Matters PT / Worldwide. Please contact pedro.marques@nutritir.com or catarina.fontes@nutritir.com for any other matter. South Africa / Portugal Fisheries related matters, please contact steven.roode@portugalfisheries.co.za or jorge.fernandes@portugalfisheries.co.za. Mozambique / Terramar Maputo and Nacala related matters please contact jose.a.guerra@terramar.co.mz or peter.vanas@terramar.co.mz Thank you for you attention. Terramar Group O Helder Batista deixou a Nutritir - Grupo Terramar no dia 30/04/2024. Por favor contacte pedro.marques@nutritir.com para assuntos comerciais PT / Resto do Mundo. Por favor contacte pedro.marques@nutritir.com ou catarina.fontes@nutritir.com para outros assuntos. Assuntos relacionados com a Àfrica do Sul / Portugal Fisheries por favor entre em contacto com steven.roode@portugalfisheries.co.za ou jorge.fernandes@portugalfisheries.co.za. Qualquer assunto relacionado com Moçambique / Terramar Maputo e Nacala entre em contacto com jose.a.guerra@terramar.co.mz ou peter.vanas@terramar.co.mz Obrigado pela sua atenção. Grupo Terramar

If in any doubt please bring to our urgent attention. Contact: 00 44 1992 701710 P.S. To open the attached file, Adobe Acrobat Reader version 7 or greater must be installed on the system. TextBody: Dear BRF team, I need to receive the original documents urgently as I will send them to the bank. ETA is 14/06 and I am still waiting for your commercial invoice to make the payment and waiting for original documents to receive. Please send me the invoice today. or send me the original documents asap if you will send the invoice later. We are already very late for Bietc validation as we received the draft documents very late. I cannot be late for sending the original documents too. Please find the msg I received from the waiver agency Unfortunately this BIETC is out of time for validation, CNEE shall contact authorities at POD to complete the procedure of validation Q Bietc soumis après les délais autorisés MERCI DE CONTACTER VOTRE CLIENT FZ DISTRIBUTION AFIN DE CONTACTER LE CGC LBV MME DJENNY UQ ETD of this vessel was 11/05. We had time for BIETC validation by 21/05, as we need to validate it in 10 days for the loadings from Europe. We received the loading documents on 23/05 in the evening, so that we could only check the docs on Friday. Even loading schedule was not shared with us in advance for approval although it was asked may times though email. Schedule was not available on BRF system neither. It is still blocked if you check it. Now we will have a penalty at the destination. In general it is the half price of the freight. So it will be around 3.000 USD I guess. We will learn when the consignee handle it at POD. Please note that we may reflect this cost to you due to the lack of communication and not sending the documents on time. We can talk this again when we receive the penalty cost, but for today I need to receive the original documents asap. Please send them today to the address below including 3XOBL + HC + CO Noridane Foods A/S Amaliegade 9 B DK-1256 Copenhagen K Denmark Att: Nina Madsen Tel: +4571728825 And send me the commercial invoice for the payment!!! Thanks!
Subject: URGENT!!!! : Agristo - 20241524  Fries - Sadia brand / PO 2040398 BRF 140250-2  (IE)

TextBody: Hi Abbie I don’t think we are going to be able to move this order at the moment. Unfortunately the Sunday slot that was available got snapped up by another order. We will have to leave this as it is at the moment as I wouldn’t be able to confirm accepting this on Sunday out of any remaining slots until Friday afternoon which would be very late in the day for everyone involved. If this would still be feasible then I will keep a close eye on things however I would understand if not. TextBody: Dear Liesbeth We would awaiting for email based on our LC draft discussion this morning Ali Asghar On 2024-05-29 18:27, Agristo Service wrote: Hello Ali In the meantime I have gone over the draft, please note my remarks: F59 -> Name and Address: AGRISTO nv Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 8710 WIELSBEKE BELGIUM Account: BE53738417044953 F41D: Available with -> bank should be KBC Belgium F43P: Should be set to allowed F44C: please change latest date of shipment to July 15th 2024 to allow us enough time to arrange the shipment F45A: Please change CFR Shanghai to CFR Karachi, as agreed F46A A. -> 8 copies of the invoice is excessive, we issue 5 as an absolute maximum, please change this B. -> please remove "Clean" and just state "Shipped on board" Freight to collect -> change to "Freight prepaid" C. -> Since insurance is not arranged by Agristo, please have this document removed from the required documents list E. 3.SHELF LIFE CERTIFICATE (a)HEALTH CERTIFICATE (b)HALAL CERTIFICATE -> what is meant by this? We issue a health certificate and a halal certificate -> is a shelf life certificate a separate document? is this really needed? F. Is it possible to remove the validty for 6 months and change it to 3 months? H. Please remove this statemen, we will not paste packing list and invoice on each pallet F47A: +1: HS code will be noted as follows: "1105200000" +6. Can the requirement about the shelf life be removed? +8. Please remove this -> we will not attached packing list and invoice to the pallets +17. Please specify the date +18. Please clarify 3rd party documents -> health certificate, certificate of origin and Halal certificate are not issued by Agristo Please let me know your feedback
Subject: Contract 07052024

Please find enclosed new order for collection week 24. We will collect as well 1 pallet Topy 9x9 1kg ref 32400238-3. Cordialement,

Hi Paula, I regret to inform you that this container has been loaded with 3 pallets less indeed. There have not been produced enough pallets during last production run of jacket wedges. As we have loaded this container in our external warehouse there was no extra stock available to load 3 pallets of another item. For both World food and Cial we are not loading in our external warehouses anymore so if this problem would occur again in the future we will be able to load another item to have a full container. We are sorry for this inconvenience,
Subject: World food / Vessel info / Week 21

TextBody: Šis elektroninis laiškas išsiųstas automatiškai Laba diena, Siunčiame artėjančios mėnesio arba savaitinės akcijos preliminarius Jūsų tiekiamų prekių UAB "RIMI Lietuva" užsakymų kiekius. Atkreipkite dėmesį: "m_" - reiškia mėnesio akciją "w_" - reiškia savaitės akciją Norime pabrėžti, kad tai nėra šalių sutartas kiekis, o informacinio pobūdžio prognozė skirta planuoti gamybinius ar tiekimo pajėgumus. Visą detalią informaciją apie numatomus pardavimus akcijos metu rasite prisegtuke. Tikimės, kad ši informacija padės Jums teisingai suplanuoti išvežimus ir taip užtikrinsime aukščiausią prekių prieinamumo lygį pirkėjams (On shelf availability). Jeigu manote, kad negalėsite užtikrinti šio kiekio prašome atsakyti į laišką nurodant tikslią prekę, numatomą kiekį ir priežastį, kad galėtume bendradarbiaudami rasti tinkamiausią sprendimą. Jei manote, kad galėsite užtikrinti nurodytą kiekį, atsakyme parašykite "Sutinkame". RIMI Lietuva Tiekimo skyrius ------------------------------------------------------------ This email was generated automatically Good day, UAB "RIMI Lietuva" would like to inform you about preliminary quantities for campaign deliveries. Please, note that these quantities are not binding or agreed between the parties, this is only an informative forecast, to help you with planning production and supply capability. You can find all the details about expected sales during the campaign in the attached PDF document. We hope that this information will help you to plan and to ensure the highest level of availability of goods to our customers (on shelf availability). Please note that: "m_" - means monthly promotion "w_" - means weekly promotion If you feel that you will not be able to deliver the forecasted quantities, please respond to this letter stating the expected possible delivery and the reason for not being able to fulfill the requested quantities, so that we can find the best solution for collaboration. If you feel that you are able to ensure the delivery of the forecasted quantity, simply reply to this email with the text: AGREE RIMI Lietuva Supply Chain Department PRIVACY NOTICE: Your privacy is important for us at RIMI. We are transparent with how we collect and process any personal data that you share with us. More detailed information on how we process your personal data can be found at Privacy section in RIMI’s home page. Latvia <https://www.rimi.lv/privatuma-politika> Lithuania<https://www.rimi.lt/privatumo-politika> Estonia <https://www.rimi.ee/privaatsuspoliitika> ATTENTION: This e-mail may contain confidential information that is intended solely for the addressee. If you are not the intended recipient, you should delete this message and are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, or distribution of this message, or the taking of any action based on it, is strictly prohibited.
Subject: Palaikymo akcijos RIMI preliminarūs užsakymai/RIMI promotional sales preliminary orders

Archimedeslaan 21, 3584 BA UTRECHT | www.plus.nl<http://www.plus.nl/> Mobiel: 06 - 83 65 65 20 E-mail: kschouten@plusretail.nl<mailto:kschouten@plusretail.nl> Ik ben afwezig op Woensdag in de oneven weken. PLUS staat voor PLUS Groep, één van haar gelieerde entiteiten of PLUS Holding B.V. Elke PLUS vennootschap is een aparte juridische entiteit en lid van PLUS Groep. PLUS Holding B.V. is statutair gevestigd te Utrecht en ingeschreven bij het Handelsregister onder nummer 85065153. Zie https://www.plus.nl/organisatie/over-ons/plus-retail voor meer informatie. U.S. soy farmers partner with the food industry to ensure it can meet customer demand for quality and nutritious ingredients by implementing new farming practices to increase yields and planting soybean varieties that are most desired by the food industry. From oil to shortening to protein, U.S. Soy’s versatility is unmatched. Learn more about the different U.S. soy-based products and how they can benefit your operation. LEARN MORE<https://email.cloud2.secureclick.net/c/33536?id=6462616.1487.1.9e6711b67b4eb3d935a40e8be66a5763> [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ds1heading_LSk.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ms1heading.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ms1img.jpg] Food companies can drive sales with U.S. soy ingredients due to its functionality and versatility as well as U.S. soy’s health and sustainability halos. U.S. grown soy ingredients are sustainably grown by local farmers consumers trust. 83% of consumers rank U.S. farmers as the most trusted part of the food supply chain. [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ds1img_right_fvt.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ds1positives_cne.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ms1positives_UdH.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ds2heading_PPf.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ms2heading_1DQ.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ms2img_ZPB.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ds2img_left_Lxt.jpg] U.S. soybean oils<https://email.cloud2.secureclick.net/c/33536?id=6462616.1488.1.b2e1fe6e45ad4ecfad12607ca7309ef8> represent the largest supply of vegetable oils and shortenings in North America. U.S. soy farmers work closely with the food industry to develop varieties that provide the best functionality. High oleic soybean oil – a trait-enhanced cooking oil – is the direct result in a farmer and food company partnership. [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ds2quote.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ms2quote.jpg] Soy-based ingredients such as soybean oil and high oleic soybean oil provide a great source of unsaturated fats including omega-3 fatty acids and omega-6 fatty acids which are both associated with reduced risk of heart disease and lowered bad cholestrol levels when replacing saturated fats. High oleic soybean oil particuarly excels as an ingredient for the food industry due to its enhanced functionality, including high-heat stability and extended shelf life. U.S. Soy conducted extensive functionality testing with high oleic soybean oil. Click below to learn more about how high oleic soybean oil measures up in frying, coating and baking applications. LEARN MORE<https://email.cloud2.secureclick.net/c/33536?id=6462616.1489.1.2f8e5ff31ddcd2a5c067b0fbadb864b3> [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ds3heading.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ms3heading.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ms3img_OGa.jpg] A high-quality protein with proven health benefits, U.S. soy is unique among commercially available plant proteins. [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/ds3chartleft_ZiG.jpg] The versatile range of soy protein ingredients caters to the growing demand for healthy, planet-friendly options, helping you stay competitive in today’s market. Companies can also depend on U.S. Soy’s domestic supply chain to provide high quality products at an affordable price point. Learn more about how your company can benefit from U.S. soy protein. LEARN MORE<https://email.cloud2.secureclick.net/c/33536?id=6462616.1490.1.d079d6dc6a8febd002a46343a632221d> [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/dclosing.jpg]<https://email.cloud2.secureclick.net/c/33536?id=6462616.1491.1.80b9fd687ac178b24894d82b3d95856a> [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/mclosing_7mg.jpg]<https://email.cloud2.secureclick.net/c/33536?id=6462616.1492.1.59991fa57e0df7e02c5a69996fa56da7> [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/dfooter.jpg] [https://hnxjyy.stripocdn.email/content/guids/CABINET_ad00617bcef3b6ae4a5a5a3b5f412ca963387cda0c23f9bdbd0792a1f1adab41/images/mfooter.jpg] Unsubscribe instantly from these emails by clicking here<https://go.madmimi.com/opt_out?pact=6462616-181549487-14755879762-7ae8d520ca6963c2c73b62576ab47abed8ecd2a0>.

The next production for 314373 - BIG B09HV 2,04 1 C80WC is planned for W23. I have aked the production planning team to take special care that this production will be given priority, both in timing and also if something would go wrong and if they have to make choices, that they certainly don't drop this one. Coming back on what I said earlier, that I though we had stock for one order immediatly, was not correct as I now see that this stock was already allocated to PO 756679, which is loading tomorrow early in the morning. My apologies for the confusion on that. Hopes this already gives some clarity and helps out a bit, do let me know if you have any additional questions or remarks ​​​​​​​

TextBody: Dear Bezi, Because we keep looking for reliable supply of raw materials, we need to change the supplier of our breadcrumbs. Because we needed to find a new supplier, we also looked at optimizing the whole product for sustainability reasons and to make the product cleaner. This is why like to propose a new recipe to you for your croquettes. You can find the technical sheet attached. What changes? New Breadcrumbs Suppler change: Old supplier: Koopmans New supplier: ECS Paneermeel Industrie BV Ingredient change: Barly malt extract will be changed by wheat bran Small change in breakdown New Premix – Same supplier Ingredient change: Wheat flour will be replaced by our own potato falkes E461 is replaced by E464 (because we change from wheat flour to flakes) Small change in breakdow Specification: Old: 302285 New: 314300 We will check if the label information can stay the same or needs to be changed. If a change would be needed, we will send you the adapted labels for approval. Please do not hesitate to contact me incase of further questions.
Subject: Change product Croquettes

TextBody: Goede middag Rinus, We hebben u eerder geïnformeerd over een mogelijke wijziging in de receptuur van onze kroketten. Gezien we er steeds naar streven onze producten te verbeteren zijn we vandaag blij u te kunnen melden dat deze optimalisatie daadwerkelijk een feit is! We zijn ervan overtuigd dat deze aanpassing zal bijdragen aan de kwaliteit en de smaak van onze kroketten! Wat betekent dit concreet voor u? De belangrijkste verandering betreft een aanpassing van de premix, wat bijgevolg ook een invloed heeft op de ingrediëntendeclaratie. Bijgevoegd kan u alvast de specificatie van de nieuwe receptuur vinden. Het zal dus ook noodzakelijk zijn om de folie hiernaar aan te passen. Gezien alle ingrediënten van de huidige receptuur gradueel worden opgewerkt, voorzien we de schakeling naar nieuwe receptuur rond +/- W38 (afhankelijk van beschikbaarheid hoofdoogst). Idealiter is de nieuwe folie dus bestelklaar uiterlijk begin W29, rekening houden met zomerperiodes. Laat gerust weten indien u stalen wenst te ontvangen van de vernieuwde receptuur. Ik hoor graag hoe we deze aanpassing samen kunnen organiseren! Mvg, Michèle Vandenbroucke Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44
Subject: Update recipe kroketten

TextBody: Hi all, Today I have received the latest set of analytical results from our lab SGS. They are all ‘ as cooked’ results and they continue to tell me the same story that they always have. They are very consistent since we launched Jack’s. Fat analysis between Booker and Agristo is consistent – but always in different places. I have put off doing anything about it but with the arrival of Rebecca I am hopeful that the issue can be resolved. 1. The issue is to do with the ‘cooking ‘ aspect. All ‘as sold’ results are good. This is what I have seen today: Product SGS Moisture % SGS Fat % Agristo Moisture % Agristo Fat % Jack’s Roast Potatoes 67 2.9 68 5.2 Jack’s Skin on Fries 4.3 46 7.7 Jack’s Crinkle Cut Chips 69 2.6 60 5.3 Jack’s Thin & Crispy 67 3.9 52 7.0 All of the products were oven cooked. As you can see the figures are miles apart. I am somewhat concerned that according to SGS we could label Roast Potatoes and Crinkle Cut Chips as Low Fat products. I have included the moisture values as I think that this is the basis of the off fat results. When you cook a chip – doesn’t matter if it is oven cooked or fried – the chip loses water. Quite a lot, sometimes over 10%. What is left after the water has gone is fat, protein and carbohydrate. So the more water that goes the higher the % of the fat that is left. With that thought in mind look again at the figures above. Can you please go away and find out how each lab cooks the chips? In a standard cooker or a lab oven? Gas or electric? Top shelf or middle shelf. Are the ovens pre heated? How accurately do they measure the time? Can they cook the product to a standard moisture level? We are looking to standardise the cook as much as we can. In the real world this never happens but in our world we need to show that the data on back of pack is accurate. Last point – if anyone is still thinking about the chip diet I would just point out that the SGS chips are heavier than the Agristo chips so you will get fewer chips in a portion. Sorry! Thanks both
Subject: Booker - fat levels in cooked chips

TextBody: Dear Hagino, A sea waybill is a document that is not issued by Agristo, but by the carrier (MSC / Hapag / One / ...). It serves as evidence of the contract of carriage and receipt of goods. This document is thus indeed only released once the carrier has received the goods for shipment. I am afraid we thus cannot make a "draft" sea waybill. That being said, I am not aware that there is a delay in us sending you the sea waybill. Could you please send me some examples? For example: boat was loaded on day X and the sea waybill was only sent to you on day Y? This will allow me to have some concrete examples we can share with our logistics partner and their carriers. Thank you.
Subject: ON BOARD DATE ON SWB

TextBody: Hi Lesley, different outcomes on SGS nutritional information is no new for me. We have the same issue with another customer in the UK, so we already checked how SGS way of work goes. Can you get more info on what oven they use? Agristo way of work Agristo cooks the product, not the lab Oven is pre heated Middle shelf Electric oven The cooked time is mentioned on the report. SGS Way of Work For preparation; In most cases the whole bag will be used. In some cases for extra-large/industrial sizes the product will be split, and the split ratio recorded. The products are cooked in a single layer. The product will be cooked to the rough mid-point of the range and the cooking time recorded. Cooking method is following the primary method on pack. Testing methodologies; Total Fat – NMR. The same as the Ashby site. Saturated Fat – GC-FID. The same as the Ashby site. Carbohydrate – Difference calculation. The same as the Ashby site. Fibre – Based on AOAC 991.43 using Ankom instruments. The same as the Ashby site. I have already asked our quality team if she sees issues with the way of work of SGS that can explain this difference. But as the frozen values do match, I think it will be the way of cooking the product..
Subject: Booker - fat levels in cooked chips

TextBody: If you cannot read this e-mail properly, please click here. 10,000+ Business Matches Completed! Post Your Sourcing Requests Now and Continue the Efficient Sourcing Journey! CPS+ eMarketplace supported by CHINAPLAS achieved a remarkable result at the 36th edition of CHINAPLAS, which was held in Shanghai, P.R. China in April this year. More than 10,000 business matching sessions were conducted for 3,000+ international buyers through our promotion during the full cycle of CHINAPLAS and strategically on O2O matching model, connecting the plastics and rubber suppliers and buyers around the world. Let's flashback through our precious moments and vibrant atmosphere at CHINAPLAS 2024! Four CPS+ eMarketplace Booths to Gather Global Buyers from around the World! International Buyers Posting Sourcing Requests and Our Professional Team to Facilitate Matching with Suppliers Sourcing Request Walls Displaying the Latest Sourcing Requests for Suppliers to Match by Scanning the QR code The professional team of CPS+ eMarketplace who accumulate extensive business matching experience successfully matched numerous buyers' requests with suppliers. What are you looking for? Which plastics and rubber technologies are in demand the most? Let’s take a look below. 【All Sourcing Requests Already Matched with Suppliers - Partial List Is Shown Here】 Are you still worried about finding the right suppliers? No need to worry, CPS+ eMarkeplace is always at your service. 4,500 exhibitors of CHINAPLAS 2024 are the members of CPS+ eMarketplace. CHINAPLAS and CPS+ eMarketplace will continue jointly provide online business matching services for you in the whole year, connecting you with the right suppliers on such a valuable and useful matching online platform! Don't miss the peak sourcing season after the show. ACT now and enjoy an efficient and trouble-free sourcing journey! Post Your Sourcing Requests About "CPS+ eMarketplace" Fully supported by CHINAPLAS, we provide uninterrupted 365-day services, offering various features to help buyers efficiently connect with global suppliers and find the best matches for their sourcing needs. With information of over 4,000 global plastics and rubber technology suppliers and 7,000+ products, it has become the most popular online sourcing platform dedicated to the plastics and rubber industries. Enquiries Tel: (852) 2811 8897 (Hong Kong) (65) 6631 8955 (Singapore) WhatsApp: (852) 9602 5262 E-mail: eMarketplace@adsale.com.hk buyer@adsale.com.hk Website: www.ChinaplasOnline.com/eMarketplace If you do not wish to receive our emails, please click here to unsubscribe. For privacy policy, please click here. If you are located in the European Union or the European Economic Area, and would like to enquire about your subscription, you may contact us at eu-usercom@adsale.com.hk with this email subject. Sender: Adsale Exhibition Services Limited Address: 6th Floor, 321 Java Road, North Point, Hong Kong. Tel: (852) 2811 8897 Fax: (852) 2516 5024
Subject: 10,000+ Business Matches Completed!  Post Your Sourcing Requests Now and Continue the Efficient Sourcing Journey! (Ref:202446537)

TextBody: Dear, I would like to know how the document process is going? Do you have any questions about the documents we have requested for renewals? All the best, [cid:1e47679a776a092099dd079b90f01974ea5606eb@zimbra] ________________________________ De: "Ruth Araujo" <registros@apolo.com.py> Para: "Agristo Sales" <sales@agristo.com> Enviados: Martes, 14 de Mayo 2024 12:44:45 Asunto: RENOVACION DE REGISTRO / PAPAS LISTO / AGRISTO Dear, I hope you are well! Greetings to you, Ruth Araujo, from the Records Department of Apolo Import S.A. I inform you that the following registration is about to expire and we want to renew it: [cid:413a6acec6230341aad3292f8ae53497fc1afe05@zimbra] The documents that we would need are the following: * Authorization (model attached) * Allergen Declaration (model attached) * Certificate of Free Sale * Technical Sheet, with the percentages of the ingredients (model attached) * Preparation process or Flowchart (model attached) You can send me all the documents in digital format to verify them and once I confirm that they are correct, proceed to certify and apostill them, in this way we will avoid unnecessary expenses. For any quetions I am at your service. All the best, [https://apolo.com.py:4343/service/home/~/?auth=co&loc=es&id=244692&part=2.3] ________________________________ De: "Agristo Sales" <sales@agristo.com> Para: "registros" <registros@apolo.com.py> Enviados: Lunes, 29 de Abril 2024 4:18:11 Asunto: Potato Times Food Service - April Is this email not displaying correctly? View it in your browser<https://mailchi.mp/agristo/potato-times-6723659?e=913a31ae1d> [Agristo]<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=48eb289a2d&e=913a31ae1d> [https://mcusercontent.com/ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516/images/1b38c138-ae27-dad5-310f-dbc4382f91c3.gif]<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=6327bbabf0&e=913a31ae1d> CROP UPDATE What's up with our crop We have faced fickle, wet weather in recent times. With no long spells of dry fixed weather on the horizon in the near future. This both impacts the current harvest in storage and the planting of the early harvest. The previous warmer and wet days increased the risk of rot or sprouting for stored potatoes. Depending on when the early harvest can be planted, there is a lot of uncertainty if we can bridge the gap between both harvests. The early harvest is normally planted as from mid-April onwards. Today, only the German region made some bigger steps in planting, while Belgium, the Netherlands and France are seriously lagging behind. This is partly due to a very wet autumn and spring, which meant farmers could do little preparatory work on the land. A longer dry period is a necessity. Another challenge is the availability of seed potatoes, or better the lack of it. Timings for farmers will have to be just right as cut seed potatoes face limited holding times and risk of viruses means there can be no delays in planting. The right weather at the right time will result in a much needed effort farmers need to undertake in order to keep on track with the potato season to come. [https://emailresources.moqo.be/agristo/mailing/familiedag/img_01.png] INSIGHTS Tips for home delivery Sooo, we have the crispiest fries suited for takeout. But kitchen and delivery staff should still follow some easy steps to ensure the products keep their crisp throughout the process. We have put together some easy steps to make our fries fully travel-proof. Read all about it<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=879e30c338&e=913a31ae1d> [https://mcusercontent.com/ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516/images/b6d05689-cad0-43cf-87c0-971a710c6484.jpg]<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=eaf35ba544&e=913a31ae1d> POTATO CONCEPT Have an easy ride with the crispiest fries in the world Life is beautiful with the crispiest fries ever to exist. Potato products perfect for home delivery and takeout. A stride forward, where fries keep their crisp for a very, very long time. You can even reheat them and they stay super crispy! Want to know more?<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=2e4d605aa1&e=913a31ae1d> [https://mcusercontent.com/ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516/images/21399e4f-4b5c-90bd-b32b-9ce62bb0a44f.png]<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=78c2ebd150&e=913a31ae1d> Copyright © 2022, All rights reserved. Agristo n.v. Ridder de Gellinckstraat 9, B-8710 Wielsbeke +32 56 54 09 00 — info@agristo.com<mailto:info@agristo.com> www.agristo.<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=395b978683&e=913a31ae1d>com<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=92471efb36&e=913a31ae1d> <https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=5de451ee36&e=913a31ae1d>[fb]<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=e8656aeded&e=913a31ae1d> [insta]<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=109bb49c8d&e=913a31ae1d> <https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=b21f891a65&e=913a31ae1d>[in]<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=0514c8b703&e=913a31ae1d> This email was sent to registros@apolo.com.py<mailto:registros@apolo.com.py> why did I get this?<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/about?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=b12246ffaa&e=913a31ae1d&c=5faf005c03> unsubscribe from this list<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=b12246ffaa&t=b&e=913a31ae1d&c=5faf005c03> update subscription preferences<https://agristo.us13.list-manage.com/profile?u=ed77d3433d7a542d4ed9c0516&id=b12246ffaa&e=913a31ae1d&c=5faf005c03> Agristo NV · Ridder de Gellinckstraat 9 · Wielsbeke 8710 · Belgium

TextBody: HI, The user has been approved and will be notified via email Attaches is the guide. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ To: Supplier Setup From: NoReply@sainsburys.co.uk CC: Date: 2024-05-29 12:17:32 Subject: RE:For Your Information: iSupplier Portal: Notification for Approval To SETUP, SUPPLIER Sent 29-MAY-2024 13:14:54 ID 27490030 service@agristo.com, from AGRISTO NV (EUR) (A1781), has completed their registration form for access to the iSupplier Portal.. To approve or reject this registration request, please sign-in to the system at this link and then navigate to the Approve/Reject Supplier User menu option. Thank you. Ref:MSG43014498
Subject: RE:RITM11970519 For Your Information:  iSupplier Portal: Notification for Approval

TextBody: To ABBIE ROGERS Sent 31-MAY-2024 02:22:05 ID 27490326 Your request to register at Sainsbury's for access to their iSupplier Portal has been approved. You can now log on at log on with the username SERVICE@AGRISTO.COM and the password Dw8+4CEAD. When you first log on, you will be required to change your password for security purpose. Contact Supplier Queries for additional information. Thank you. Please Note: If you are unable to access the link above, please copy/paste the following URL to your web browser: https://access.sainsburys.co.uk/OA_HTML/AppsLogin?requestUrl=APPSHOMEPAGE&cancelUrl=https%3A%2F%2Faccess.sainsburys.co.uk%2FOA_HTML%2FAppsLogin This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify the system manager (postmaster@sainsburys.co.uk) and delete it from your system. Sainsbury's Supermarkets Ltd (3261722 England) Registered Offices: 33 Holborn, London, EC1N 2HT Sainsbury’s Argos is a trading name of both: 1) Argos Limited, Registered office: 33 Holborn, London, EC1N 2HT, registered number: 01081551 (England and Wales); and 2) Sainsbury’s Supermarkets Limited, Registered office: 33 Holborn, London, EC1N 2HT, registered number: 03261722 (England and Wales). All companies listed above are subsidiaries of J Sainsbury plc (185647).
Subject: For Your Information: Sainsbury's iSupplier Portal: Notification of Approval

TextBody: Hi Daniel, For the fries I follow your remark on the USDA and I have asked some advise to our quality department. On the waffles, see more info on the dimensions below. We also don’t have a picture in our archive for an overcooked mini waffle, this is requested. For the large waffles, fresh puree is used. These are shaped with a fixed mold set (nexgem), ensuring that the length and width dimensions remain almost unchanged (9x7). Therefore, we do not perform any checks on this. However, we measure the weight every hour. If the weight is too low, we can adjust this by making the waffle slightly thicker (and vice versa). This is done by adjusting the cutting wire. However, thickness is not a critical parameter for us (it used to be measured in the past, but not anymore). What is important is that the waffles fit in the box (they should not be extremely thick or warped). For this, we perform the ‘box test’. The weight is also important in this context. Underweight quickly becomes a problem when packing in boxes. For underweight products packed in bag references, there is usually the option to add an extra piece to the bag. This option is often not available with boxes, causing them to not meet their nominal weight. For the above reasons, weight is very critical for this type of product. The production process for the small waffles is slightly different. Flakes are used for this, and the molding machine is also different. Here, we regularly see deviations in length (e.g., with misshapen waffles: see photo) and thickness. QC also checks length and thickness. This is done on frozen products with a digital caliper. Ten pieces are measured hourly, and if there are deviations from the norm, adjustments can be made, such as adjusting the molding machine. As the below type of misshapen product is acceptable, I have added it in the QAS. [Inline image URL : data:image/png;base64,] Should we highlight the above information in the QAS in any way? Any suggestions?
Subject: RE: Asda QAS Update - Redesign 2 of 2
