TextBody: Hello Mohamed I'm afraid I have some bad news. As I mentioned below, our bank KBC cannot accept LC's from every Libyan bank, and unfortunately United bank for Commerce and Investment is one of the banks that is not accepted, so we cannot go through with this LC. Only the following banks are acceptable: • Assaray Trade and Investment Bank • First Gulf Libyan Bank (state bk) • Libyan Islamic Bank = > this is the bank that has our strong preference • Mediterranean Bank We kindly ask you to open a new LC with one of these banks, in order to proceed.

TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Subject: QUOTATION FRENCH FRIES

TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With
Subject: Autoreply

PERFORATED POLYPROPYLENE BOARDS FOR SHELVING CHEESES Product Details › Production system: injection molding resistance to operating temperatures: -30, + 80 °C Suitable for food contact: all food-grade polypropylene grills are made with certified raw materials and are suitable for contact with foodstuffs, in compliance with the regulations and directives and the national ministerial decree. Uses: for salting, drying and maturing cheeses. Recommended for cheeses such as caprini, caciotte, gouda, tomini, muffettato, cascaval, pecorino toscano, pecorino sardo. The surface grilling allows the form a considerable aeration allowing fewer turning and less mold formation. Euro pallett: allows easy and comfortable maneuverability inside the cells and storage and seasoning and salting. Washing: PP articles are recommended to be washed with 1/2% chlorinated basic solutions, or acid solutions always at 1/2%. it is also advisable not to use solutions with nitric acid, because over time the quality of the plastic material deteriorates. TextBody: Bonjour Aurelie, Je reprends l'email de Michelle. Alors que la nouvelle recette sera mise en place en mois de septembre, on voudrait savoir qu'on doit de nouveau déclarer sur le packaging et commencer la refonte. Si on continue la refonte, il s'agirait d'un léger changement dans la déclaration: Le dextrose ne doit plus être déclaré. L'ordre du sel et des pommes de terre séchées change (mais tous deux inférieurs à 2 %). Déclaration actuelle: Rehydrated potatoes, WHEAT flour, EGGS, Sunflower oil, WHEAT starch, Dried potatoes, Salt, Dextrose, White pepper. Nouvelle declaration: Rehydrated potatoes, WHEAT flour, EGGS, Sunflower oil, WHEAT starch, Salt, Dried potatoes, White pepper. Merci d'avance de votre réponse. Cdt, Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14
Subject: FW: Changement Recette Dauphine

TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. Yes, we also do potato flakes. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Subject: Potato flakes

TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Subject: Frozen French Fries

Vous m'aviez simplement demandé d'annuler ces commandes. Nous ne pouvons donc pas l'accepter. De plus, je vous demande de ne plus envoyer ces fiches à OcrOrdersAutoPrd@agristo.com. Cette adresse mail est un robot et ne peut lire que vos commandes. Vos fiches sont toujours bloqués dans notre système. Cordialement, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67
Subject: Fiche de non conformité

TextBody: Madame, Monsieur, Nous avons trouvé un accord définissant les principes et les conditions logistiques et techniques qui s’appliquent entre nos deux sociétés. La loi n° 2023-221 du 30 mars 2023 poursuit les objectifs déjà présents dans la loi EGALIM 1 et 2. Cette loi, souvent désignée EGALIM 3, a été publiée au Journal officiel du 31 mars 2023. A ce titre, nous vous prions de trouver les datas indemnités logistiques retard et qualité de avril 2024, joints au présent courrier, lequel fait suite à nos différents échanges. Ce qui a pour objet de lancer la période d’échanges contradictoires en perspectives de trouver un accord sur le montant de réparation du préjudice. Nous vous rappelons que vous disposez d'un délai de 30 jours à compter de la réception de cet avis de pénalités pour en contrôler le bien-fondé et nous transmettre vos remarques. Merci de nous retourner vos analyses contradictoires associées à cette extraction. Au retour de vos remarques, lors d’échanges contradictoires, nous prendrons en compte les éléments justifiés et documentés que vous mentionneriez afin d’obtenir un accord avant établissement d’une facturation. Nous restons à votre disposition pour toute question et pour étudier avec vous des moyens spécifiques afin d'améliorer votre performance logistique pour nos prochaines commandes. Nous vous remercions de bien vouloir adresser vos retours à l'adresse mail : itmlai_negociations_logistiques@mousquetaires.com et à votre négociateur de dossier : - Fatyne BOUFOUS - fatyne.boufous@mousquetaires.com : Frais non laitier (volailles, œuf, traiteur, charcuterie, traiteur de la mer, viandes) - Priscillia LUZOLO - priscillia.luzolo@mousquetaires.com : DPH (Parfumerie, entretien et Hygiène) & Epicerie Salée - Marylise GOBIN - marylise.gobin@mousquetaires.com : Epicerie Sucrée / PPI & Animaux - Chloé MAYALA - chloe.mayala@mousquetaires.com : Vins & Champagnes, BNA, Bière, Alcools & Gel - Faustine BOSIO - faustine.bosio@mousquetaires.com : Frais Laitier - Carine GALLETTE - carine.gallette@mousquetaires.com : Maison/Textile Nous vous prions de croire, Madame, Monsieur, à l’expression de notre considération distinguée. Cordialement, Equipe Négociation / Logistique ITM LAI ----------------------------- Disclaimer ------------------------------ --- Ce message ainsi que les éventuelles pièces jointes constituent une correspondance privée et confidentielle à l'attention exclusive du destinataire désigné ci-dessus. Si vous n'êtes pas le destinataire du présent message ou une personne susceptible de pouvoir le lui délivrer, il vous est signifié que toute divulgation, distribution ou copie, totale ou partielle, sur un quelconque support de cette transmission est strictement interdite. Si vous avez recu ce message par erreur, nous vous remercions d'en informer l'expéditeur par téléphone ou de lui retourner le présent message, puis d'effacer immédiatement ce message de votre systeme. Tout message électronique est susceptible d'altération. Le "groupement des Mousquetaires" décline toute responsabilité au titre de ce message s'il a été altéré, déformé ou falsifié.--- --- This e-mail and any attachments is a confidential correspondence intended only for use of the individual or entity named above. If you are not the intended recipient or the agent responsible for delivering the message to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, distribution or copying, either whole or partial, in any medium of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication by mistake, please notify the sender by phone or by replying this message, and then delete this message from your system. E-mails are susceptible of alteration. The "Mousquetaires' group" shall not therefore be liable for the message if altered, changed or falsified.--- -----------------------------------------------------------------------
Subject: Indemnités logistiques ITM - avril 2024 - 82006 - AGRISTO N-V - 76

Merci [Inline image URL : https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 23 mai 2024 à 15:14, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Veuillez envoyer tous votre mails à service@agristo.com svp. Blending tradition with modernity, the sector’s offerings span a diverse array of flavours and textures. And all of those are created with the utmost attention to quality and presentation. Given that, JFEX<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=JFEX2024_Visit_Consi_Acqui_E_31_May_8_Exhibits_Highlights_%28Taste_Japan%29&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=COC4lwHnZKlu0TMu%2BkeVUfvfjXa0Llp4MKd%2F1BBp96m8OW795C33DSwPKbr6d%2FZsz4iWkEqMgYoDqiCRC38bog%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=33693&elqTrackId=0CCF1B90FE8341EE5A83AAAB6B2E39F1&elq=17c26bd8c7ff40e3bb4f8a713148a3bd&elqaid=1688751&elqat=1> will be the perfect destinations to explore these F&B delights firsthand. Join us this year in June and experience the best of Japan’s and the world's F&B market. Get Visitor Badge ⮞<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=JFEX2024_Visit_Consi_Acqui_E_31_May_8_Exhibits_Highlights_%28Taste_Japan%29&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=COC4lwHnZKlu0TMu%2BkeVUfvfjXa0Llp4MKd%2F1BBp96m8OW795C33DSwPKbr6d%2FZsz4iWkEqMgYoDqiCRC38bog%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=46528&elqTrackId=A8CC5F4842F5E23E0AE9E6F5F241B221&elq=17c26bd8c7ff40e3bb4f8a713148a3bd&elqaid=1688751&elqat=1> Get VIP Visitor Badge ⮞<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=JFEX2024_Visit_Consi_Acqui_E_31_May_8_Exhibits_Highlights_%28Taste_Japan%29&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=COC4lwHnZKlu0TMu%2BkeVUfvfjXa0Llp4MKd%2F1BBp96m8OW795C33DSwPKbr6d%2FZsz4iWkEqMgYoDqiCRC38bog%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=46527&elqTrackId=7D73D767FE7EE512501655764F108436&elq=17c26bd8c7ff40e3bb4f8a713148a3bd&elqaid=1688751&elqat=1> Get an Exclusive Taste of Japan [Ready-to-eat Meal] Ready-to-eat Meal To satisfy the needs of modern, busy lives, Japanese ready-to-eat meals have developed into a popular culinary genre. Known for their easy preparation, taste, and simplicity, these dishes are becoming a staple in Japan and are more and more well-liked elsewhere as a representation of Japanese cuisine. [Varieties of Snacks] Varieties of Snacks Japanese snacks are well-known for their wide range of flavours, premium ingredients, and mouthwatering textures. Their taste is authentic and delightful, with visually appealing packaging and quantity sizes that are convenient. Discover More ⮞<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=JFEX2024_Visit_Consi_Acqui_E_31_May_8_Exhibits_Highlights_%28Taste_Japan%29&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=COC4lwHnZKlu0TMu%2BkeVUfvfjXa0Llp4MKd%2F1BBp96m8OW795C33DSwPKbr6d%2FZsz4iWkEqMgYoDqiCRC38bog%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=46635&elqTrackId=6C5DAB058A2022637EDCA6D4884CE4D3&elq=17c26bd8c7ff40e3bb4f8a713148a3bd&elqaid=1688751&elqat=1> Mark your calendars and be present on June 19–21, 2024, at Tokyo Big Sight, where the ever-changing Japanese and world's F&B market will be showcased to thousands of visitors from all over the world. See you there!
Subject: Experience Japan's premium F&B market!

TextBody: Bonjour Nansifou, Vous pouvez nous facturer les coûts pour les heures d'attente. Veuillez envoyer votre facture au service comptable par invoices@agristo.com. Restant à votre disposition. Cordialement, Delphine --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Nansifou Gbadamassi [nansifou@saglam-france.fr] Sent: 30/05/2024 17:39 To: anton.jongbloet@agristo.com; service@agristo.com Cc: comptabilite.distribution@saglam-france.fr Subject: Demande de note de credit sur des jours-heures d'attente Bonjour à tous, Suite aux retards de chargements sur les commandes ci-dessous dus à une longue rupture de 9/9 présalé puis de film emballage chez vous, notre transporteur nous a facturé des heures d'attente sur 3 des 5 camions, voir facture ci-joint. Pour rappels, les chargements prévus pour samedi 18/05 ont été faits dimanches après-midi voir lundi matin pour un d'entre eux. Cet incident a occasionné 1700 € de frais, soit 750€ + 750€ + 200 €, voir facture. Merci d'établir à notre avantage un avoir/credit note correspondant à la totalité de ce montant, 1700 €. Dans l'attente de votre retour. Bien cordialement, SAGLAM DISTRIBUTION Nansifou GBADAMASSI DIRECTEUR DU DEPOT Téléphone : 02.43.04.48.89 E-mail : nansifou@saglam-france.fr ZA des Avaloirs 53140 Pré en Pail FRANCE www.saglam-france.fr
Subject: Demande de note de credit sur des jours-heures d'attente

TextBody: Bonjour, Désolé pour ce désagréments il y’a eu un contre temps le camion sera à vos entrepôts à 2pm. Le transporteur ne nous a pas averti pour ce changement. Merci de faire le nécessaire si possible avoir le Certificat avec le chargement cet après-midi. Merci d’avance Bien cordialement, cordialement [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 31 mai 2024 à 08:43, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Le camion prévous pour 30/05 our les 7x7 n'est toujours pas ici. Ce camion arrivera-t-il encore ? Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 28/05/2024 17:19 To: orhefir@good-eats.ma Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Bonjour Omar J'ai changé AGR5920648 pour le 7x7 au jeudi 30/05 à 11h. AGR6969224 pour le 10x10 est le vendredi 31/05 à 11h. Pourriez-vous nous prévenir un peu plus tôt à l'avenir ? Si le camion ne vient pas au rendez-vous, nous aurions pu donner un créneau à un autre camion à ce moment-là. Cordialement, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 28/05/2024 16:22 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Bonjour, Je suis navré pour ce retard car c’est difficile de trouver des camions en ces périodes le 1er va arriver jeudi 7x7 le 2 eme f10 vendredi. Bien cordialement [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 28 mai 2024 à 15:19, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Le camion pour votre commande n'est pas encore arrivé ici. Un autre camion est prévu pour demain. Quand arriveront-ils tous les deux ? Veuillez respecter l'heure de votre réservation. Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 24/05/2024 15:04 To: orhefir@good-eats.ma Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Bonjour Omar Pour les 7x7 le premier créneau disponible est le 28/05 à 9h00, je l'ai donc réservé pour vous. <Image_2024-05-24_14-54-30.png> Pour le 10x10, votre réservation est le vendredi 31/05 à 11:00. <Image_2024-05-24_15-02-24.png> Bon weekend et bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 24/05/2024 10:51 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Bonjour Lauren, 7x7 mm début de la semaine prochaine si possible lundi première heures, le second fin de semaine vendredi apr exemple. Pouvez-vous me dire svp par rapport la coated est ce qu’elle sera disponible pour chargement la s23. Bien à vous [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 24 mai 2024 à 09:31, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Pouvez-vous me dire quand vous voulez charger le camion 10x10 et le camion 7x7 ? Je pourrai alors réserver un créneau pour vous. Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 17:38 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Parfait. Merci [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 23 mai 2024 à 15:49, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Nous avons également du stock pour charger 7x7 a semaine prochaine. Cela signifie-t-il que nous chargerons 3 commandes la semaine prochaine ? (1 conteneur 10x10, 1 camion 10x10 et 1 camion 7x7) ? Si ce n'est pas le cas, n'hésitez pas à me dire ce que nous chargerons la semaine prochaine. Seuls le coated et le crinkle ne peuvent pas encore être chargés. Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 16:25 To: service@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Nous somme dont le besoin de la 7x7 mm coated et crinckle dans un premier temps pour la f 10 ça peut attendre merci de faire votre mieux pour nous charger au moin la 7x7 mm la semaine prochaine c urgent svp. Merci [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://goodeats.ma Le 23 mai 2024 à 15:14, Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> a écrit : ﻿ Bonjour Omar Veuillez envoyer tous votre mails à service@agristo.com svp. C'est avec regret que j'ai appris aujourd'hui qu'aucune production de les coated ne pourrait avoir lieu cette semaine. Il n'y a pas assez de film. Il faudra donc attendre encore quelques semaines avant que nous puissions produire les coated..... J'essaierai de vous faire savoir dès que possible la semaine exacte où ils seront prêts. Comme je vous l'ai indiqué précédemment, les 2,5 kg crinkle ne seront pas prêts à être chargés avant la semaine 25. Puisque la commande de 10 pal 7x7 + 10 pal coated ne peut être réalisée la semaine prochaine, devons-nous charger seulement le camion 10x10 + le conteneur 10x10 la semaine prochaine ? Le conteneur 10x10 a déjà une réservation. <Image_2024-05-23_16-14-10.png> Bien à vous, [image] Lauren De Baets Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 52 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Omar RHEFIR [orhefir@good-eats.ma] Sent: 23/05/2024 15:54 To: Lauren.DeBaets@agristo.com Subject: Re: Coated crinkle urgent Aimable relance dites moi juste svp quand la coated et la cri Cole seront prêt pour chargement. Merci d’avance [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://goodeats.ma___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjZjODU4MWUwZjg0Y2RhZWZiOTI3MmYxNzI0MjhlODdkOjY6MmQxYjo2ZTg2Yjk5NjdhYjc4NWNhNWJjZGU3NzA2NWIwOWQ5YmFhZWM5YzBkOTc2ODE1YzIzZjQ5NDMyN2Y4MjZhYTJmOnQ6VA Le 23 mai 2024 à 12:00, Omar RHEFIR <orhefir@good-eats.ma> a écrit : ﻿Bonjour Lauren, Pouvez vous m’envoyer la référence de chargement de la semaine prochaine ainsi me répondre sur la disponibilité de la coated 9x9 mm. Bien à vous < [https://marketpro.ma/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Screenshot-2024-02-20-at-12.11.06.png] OMAR RHEFIR CEO https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://goodeats.ma___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjZjODU4MWUwZjg0Y2RhZWZiOTI3MmYxNzI0MjhlODdkOjY6MDgxNToxNjEzOTE1YWZmMDE1NzIyYmM5MDRlNGM0ZmNmNjY3OTY2YzAwMTQzNTJlZmVmZjc3NTE5NjlmZmViMDE0ZWQ1OnQ6VA
Subject: Re: PICKUP W20

TextBody: Hello Marlies, Please find below our final volume confirmation for 2024 DU code EAN Article Volume 2024 Xmas to be contract Part of the volume to be delivered in september 2024 96015156 3599741005704 Gratin dauphinois 400g 39 8 96015168 3599741005728 Pommes dauphine 540g - XMAS 223 45 96021024 3599741007425 Mini Gratin aux Champignons 400g 28 6 96021023 3599741007432 Pomme dauphine truffe 500g 51 10 96016420 3599741006114 Pommes Duchesse Truffe 420g 61 12 96015169 3599741005735 Pommes duchesse 720g - XMAS 298 60 700 141 Delivery planning month by month : Unit M 09.2024 M 10.2024 M 11.2024 M 12.2024 Total 96015156 4 gratins pdt 10X400g Ton 8 20 11 39 96015168 Pommes Dauphines 10x540g FR X Ton 45 118 60 223 96016420 Pomme duchesse à la truffe 12x420g Ton 12 35 14 61 96021023 Pomme dauphine truffe 10x500g Ton 10 26 15 51 96021024 Mini gratins champignons 10x400g Ton 6 13 9 28 96021222 Pommes duchesse 12x720g Ton 60 178 60 298 Packaging Can wait to reorder pack on the Dauphines ? You already have a great part of the pack needed in stock. Maybe we can place a second pack order later to readjust quantities if needed and reduce risks of write-off. On duchesse what do you think if we print half of the pack needed for now for the same reason ? this will represent around 300 pal. Tell me if you have any question Thank you
Subject: EOY 2024 Findus

TextBody: Hi Marlies Do you have an update on any productions that may have happened this week on Aldi? Specifically on mini hash brown waffle, skin on fries, waffles and hash browns? When I put the numbers in from Monday we were only just above a weeks cover. Just want to check what was in the plan this week. TextBody: Hi Lupe Can you please tell us which payers need to be linked to order 414 and 418 that will load next week? Thank you! Regarding our meeting yesterday, I checked with out forwarder about the flakes not being in a dry container, and they found that order 270 was indeed loaded in a normal reefer at 15 degrees Celcius. It was too long ago to be sure why this happened, but they think this had something to do with the rates at the time. In any case, they are very aware that flakes need to be loaded in a dry container and so all flake orders should be loaded accordingly in the future. Regarding the other topics in our meeting, Beau and I will discuss on Monday when he is back and I will let you know. :)
Subject: Agristo shipments week 23 payers

TextBody: Hi Pieter, Can you please send over an up to date statement? Want to check if all those invoices mentioned in the last email are taken out. Thanks [cid:image126509.png@154D6D13.A0F875C3] Wais Mohammad​​​​ T: 0207 720 9012 E: wais.mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com<mailto:Wais.Mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com> W: premierfoodswholesale.com<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> D36‑49 New Covent Garden Market Nine Elms Lane, Battersea, London SW8 5JJ [Facebook]<https://en-gb.facebook.com/premierfoodswholesale> [Linkedin]<https://www.linkedin.com/company/premier-fruits-ltd/?originalSubdomain=uk> [Instagram]<https://www.instagram.com/premierfoodswholesale/?hl=en> [Twitter]<https://mobile.twitter.com/PFoodsWholesale> [www.premierfoodswholesale.com]<https://premierfoodswholesale.com/> From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: 31 May 2024 10:56 To: Wais Mohammad <Wais.Mohammad@premierfoodswholesale.com> Cc: Olive Tanner <Olive.Tanner@premierfoodswholesale.com> Subject: RE: Remittance advice Hi Mohammed, Olive, It seems that, although you are paying our invoices on time, or just a couple of days late, viewing the volume we are doing together for the moment, we are constantly above the credit limit. (I have been informed we did receive the payment of the invoices mentioned below yesterday, thank you for that!) Can I ask you to send a remittance for 130,000 GBP please? This will allow us to release the orders that are scheduled for loading on Monday (345038, PF-KOFF1397, PF-KOFF1395). Indeed, I propose we set up a call to discuss how we can structurally tackle this issue, so I don't need to bother you with this every day. Does Monday afternoon work for you? What about 2 p.m. UK time? Thank you very much!
Subject: Remittance advice

TextBody: Hi Mohammed, Olive, It seems that, although you are paying our invoices on time, or just a couple of days late, viewing the volume we are doing together for the moment, we are constantly above the credit limit. (I have been informed we did receive the payment of the invoices mentioned below yesterday, thank you for that!) Can I ask you to send a remittance for 130,000 GBP please? This will allow us to release the orders that are scheduled for loading on Monday (345038, PF-KOFF1397, PF-KOFF1395). Indeed, I propose we set up a call to discuss how we can structurally tackle this issue, so I don't need to bother you with this every day. Does Monday afternoon work for you? What about 2 p.m. UK time? Thank you very much!
Subject: Remittance advice

TextBody: Hi Marlies, Just to follow up on the below, Asda have now confirmed the revised critical path for this line due to the delays in closing out the legal advisory queries. Please see below. Print & Pack (Weeks) Artwork Dispatched Stock into Depot Launch Date 13 12/07/2024 27/09/2024 12/10/2024 I appreciate you advised that ideally we needed to FTP by 05/07/2024, but due to the significant delays Asda do not have time in their process for this. Of course, we will do all that we can to FTP as early as possible (we will need your assistance in returning artwork feedbacks within 24 hours to do this), but can you please let me know if an FTP of 12/07/2024 is not workable?
Subject: RE: Asda Business Confirmation and Next Steps - Cheesy Mashed Potato

TextBody: Bonjour Madame Khadidiatou, Je peux confirmer que le produit 300234 Classic wedges skin on (19055 POMME QUARTIER A/P FOUR FRITEUSE) (SKU 301172) Agristo , contient l’huile de palme non certifiée RSPO . Il est possible de créer une référence à base de l’huile de de palma certifiée RSPO – MASS BALANCE ; mais à condition que le volume minimal soit suffisamment important (le volume minimum peut être discuté avec Ine.) L’huile de Palme certifiée RSPO - SEGREGATED n’est pas possible. Je souhaite également vous informer des points suivants : Nous avons modifié notre mode de communication afin d’encore mieux répondre à vos besoins. Veuillez adresser vos demandes de service (demandes de qualité, d’emballages, délais, complaints, commandes) à l'adresse électronique centrale suivante: service@agristo.com<mailto:service@agristo.com>. Cette approche permettra de centraliser vos questions et demandes, facilitant ainsi un traitement plus efficace et plus rapide, surtout en absence de votre interlocuteur habituel. Nous comprenons que cela représente un changement pour vous, mais soyez assuré(e) que votre contact habituel (donc moi, Kathleen Samyn) reste à votre disposition et vous pouvez toujours me contacter par téléphone. Nous vous remercions d’avance pour votre compréhension et n'hésitez pas à nous contacter pour toute question supplémentaire. TextBody: Good morning, Thank you for your email. We are a spanish meat products factory since 2005, producer and supplier to all Spain, Portugal and France. We have as well several own restaurants. We work with Mccain and we have worked in the past with Ekin. We are looking for new products and prices. We buy by palet and it depend but a truck each 2 months. We work with wholesalers and restaurants. You can find us in www.birtanfood.com<http://www.birtanfood.com> Thank you in advance for your answer.

TextBody: Hi, note sure if you have well received my intitial mail and sending a kind reminder to get these new packaging started. Please let me know if anything, Michèle Vandenbroucke Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 27/05/2024 15:43 To: ali@magnafoodservice.co.uk Subject: Start up Sidewinders Dear Ali, Moving forward, I've been checking the artwork which I have received on the Sidewinder Fries. Please find attached my comments made on the consumer unit packaging (bag) and trade unit (carton). Attachd you can also find the cutter guide which has to be used for the packaging = 730 x 460mm. Additionally, as Simplot has the license of these Sidewinder®, we are legally required to add the following sentense on the packaging. Could you add this? "Sidewinders® is a registered trademark of the J.R. Simplot Company and is used under license on proprietary and patented french-fry products." Hope the above and my remarks are clear. Just let me know if anything!
Subject: Start up Sidewinders

Waffles * Based on the detail provided below, in attached I have removed all reference to the length, width and thickness parameters – if these are not checked and controlled then they are not relevant. Thank you for providing the context. * Do you agree with the statement added to the QAS ‘Excessive delamination of the outer surface of the waffles’? * If you don’t have stock product or packaging photos, I can look to shop some product in and take these photos so we can finalise the QAS. Will this be easier? Mini Waffles * If you are controlling weight, length and thickness parameters then we should leave these in the QAS. Thank you for providing the context. * Do you agree with the statement added to the QAS ‘Excessive delamination of the outer surface of the waffles’? * If you have updated the QAS with the additional photo below for acceptable misshapen pieces, please can you send this to me? * For the photo of ‘red’ cooked product, if you can’t obtain this I can shop some product in and take these photos so we can finalise the QAS. Will this be easier? One of the other queries outstanding was on the Roast Potatoes, as below: Roast Potatoes * In the updated QAS the parameters for length and weight <18g have been changed to %ages. These were previously a number of pieces acceptable in an 800g pack – please can you check and confirm if these should be %ages or number of pieces? From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: Friday, May 31, 2024 6:01 AM To: Daniel Taylor <daniel.taylor@fullersfoods.com> Subject: RE: Asda QAS Update - Redesign 2 of 2 *** Please note the message below originated on the Internet. Please use caution when replying or opening links or attachments. *** Hi Daniel, For the fries I follow your remark on the USDA and I have asked some advise to our quality department. On the waffles, see more info on the dimensions below. We also don’t have a picture in our archive for an overcooked mini waffle, this is requested. For the large waffles, fresh puree is used. These are shaped with a fixed mold set (nexgem), ensuring that the length and width dimensions remain almost unchanged (9x7). Therefore, we do not perform any checks on this. However, we measure the weight every hour. If the weight is too low, we can adjust this by making the waffle slightly thicker (and vice versa). This is done by adjusting the cutting wire. However, thickness is not a critical parameter for us (it used to be measured in the past, but not anymore). What is important is that the waffles fit in the box (they should not be extremely thick or warped). For this, we perform the ‘box test’. The weight is also important in this context. Underweight quickly becomes a problem when packing in boxes. For underweight products packed in bag references, there is usually the option to add an extra piece to the bag. This option is often not available with boxes, causing them to not meet their nominal weight. For the above reasons, weight is very critical for this type of product. The production process for the small waffles is slightly different. Flakes are used for this, and the molding machine is also different. Here, we regularly see deviations in length (e.g., with misshapen waffles: see photo) and thickness. QC also checks length and thickness. This is done on frozen products with a digital caliper. Ten pieces are measured hourly, and if there are deviations from the norm, adjustments can be made, such as adjusting the molding machine. As the below type of misshapen product is acceptable, I have added it in the QAS. [Afbeelding met Snack, voedsel Automatisch gegenereerde beschrijving] Should we highlight the above information in the QAS in any way? Any suggestions?
Subject: RE: Asda QAS Update - Redesign 2 of 2

TextBody: Hallo Marleen, bedankt voor deze info. Echter zijn dit niet-voorgebakken kroketten, welke we maar kunnen produceren tot aan de zomerstop, daar deze niet produceerbaar zijn met de vroege oogstaardappelen. De hoofdoogst-aardappelen zijn ze nu vollop aan het planten, waardoor we deze maar pas tegen W40 kunnen gebruiken. Als we het 700g artikel reeds willen verladen W38, wil dit zeggen dat we deze nog voor de zomerstop dienen te produceren. Nl. W27. Ik zie helaas dat de artworkfiles pas W28 vanuit Iglo beschikbaar zullen zijn. Wat kan hier de oplossing zijn? Bekijk ik de mogelijkheid om meer van de 800g referentie te produceren om verder in te dekken tot we kunnen starten met de 700g referentie? Alvast bedankt voor uw advies. Mvg, Marlies Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • ​​​​www.agristo.com <https://eu.content.exclaimer.net?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=12ea178d8c1eef1186d20022488063c9&excomponentid=E_Xg2xpZEE7COvcAHBDP1EjLNrmijgfYCtnikvl0Y9o&excomponenttype=Link&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1> <https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fagristo.com%2Four-story%3Futm_source%3Dsignature%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_campaign%3Dour_story&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=12ea178d8c1eef1186d20022488063c9&excomponentid=ySafZFzlR6_EJGL2oWfcW6zkUWvCxReXT-S7plR3a4w&excomponenttype=Image&signature=IqF3m22dreS2J4Tnc7zfXnPfLHn3ii-xiDw20KTLUJftzwA7YGC5wkp9SLEdmGH_HHEf3rSR9MKcdyEQeQMdK0ZAsDy9P92t6x_QIqRRXVp74v5DAAcZ0dv7_Js8c9jGXjIpuXJNB4nt2rziH-4g6mSHbexBlYRQ_yxBy8sE6QL4K0n2xq6qTrYTNvyJ26DHeX91lNiS5nubCel_DwmoE7cmiXwYepg7JcV3hHyjKHzy_E1WAASs3_H8DgLm5APR6S3dDzPmc8zKt2-MD8KdcrBowgO7qDJ42avmswQUKDfdIVJgVQzVjjDhY92zT0NsxRQhVJ812DAjHICs8YE2vw&v=1>

TextBody: Dear Lauren, Thanks for the update. We are quite surprised by this decision, as all of our European suppliers have granted us payment terms without issue. Could you please explain the reasons why securing a credit limit for our account was not feasible? Your feedback is very important to us, as we highly value our business relationship with Agristo. Our aim is to significantly increase our volumes for our 'Fry Day' brand. Will there be a possibility of reconsidering our request in the future, or will pre-payments always be required?
Subject: Agristo credit limit

TextBody: Dear Hashim, As per the previous conversation and agreement with Elias and Mohamed El Hawary, we can offer 7 containers (about 158 metric tons) for the coated and battered products combined, until the new crop harvesting. The new crop harvesting will only be in September - October 2024, depending on the weather and growth conditions of the new crop. This means that for departure in July and August combined, we can offer 7 containers in total for the coated and battered products. The straight cut is not an issue. So your request for 5 FCL August landing + 5 FCL September lading of the coated crunchy is not possible unfortunately, the potato supply does not allow this volume at the moment. Please let us know how you would like to divide the 7 containers (158 tons) over the coated and the battered products for August and September landing? We understand this is an difficult situation and we hope that the next crop will provide better volumes throughout the next season.
Subject: French fries - New order - August end arrival

TextBody: Hi Sarah, It takes 6 weeks from receiving the artwork files to delivering the film to Agristo. Our production cycle is 4 weeks. Therefore, the minimum lead time is 7 weeks, assuming the film arrives and we can begin production the following week. In the worst-case scenario, if production starts 4 weeks later, the maximum lead time would be 10 weeks. Does this make sense to you?
Subject: Info time delivery new AW

TextBody: Poštovani, U svrhu vršenja eksterne revizije finansijskih izveštaja Frikom d.o.o. Beograd. za 2023 godinu, šaljemo Vam Zahtev za usaglašavanje salda na dan 31.12.2023. Ljubazno Vas molimo da nam na dostavljen Zahtev za usaglašavanje salda odgovorite u najkracem roku, putem ovom e-mail-a, ali i da nam original pošaljete poštom na našu adresu koju piše na samoj konfirmaciji. Unapred Vam hvala na izdvojenom vremenu. Srdačan pozdrav, -- Marija Mladenovska PwC | Assurance Services | Competency center - Skopje Office: +389 (2) 3140 900 | Mobile: +389 (72)304377 | Fax: +389 (2) 3116 525 Email: marija.mladenovska@pwc.com<mailto:marija.mladenovska@pwc.com> PricewaterhouseCoopers Revizija d.o.o. Skopje 16, 8 Septemvri Blvd, Hyperium Business Center, 2nd floor | 1000 Skopje | North Macedonia http://www.pwc.com/mk PwC Privacy Statement<https://www.pwc.com/mk/en/privacy-statement.html>/ Papazoski and Mishev Law Firm<https://www.papazoski-mishev.mk/en/> The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material. Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon, this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited. If you received this in error, please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer. Please familiarize yourself with our privacy policy.
Subject: Konfirmacije za usaglasavanje - Frikom d.o.o. Beograd

TextBody: Hello Bram Unfortunatelly they are also disappointed. First we delayed the film, than the problem with Hapag, than we shipped 5 containers at once, but since the begging the position was very clear to ship 2 containers per week. Many mistakes on the documents, Isadora has to ask many times for amendments and delays the containers release with documents arriving in the same day as the container. I’m talking to them and also with our salesman, we will revert their position, but we need your support. Last meeting we were told that we would not ship this week, but we received some shipping documents, it is really shipped? We need to urgently, so we can inform the customers and have a decision for next week shipment. Thank you, [cid:image001.jpg@01DAB343.049E39B0] De: Bram Tuytens <Bram.Tuytens@agristo.com> Enviada em: quinta-feira, 30 de maio de 2024 03:06 Para: DELTA <delta@jaoliveira.com.br>; Agristo Salesforce service <service@agristo.com>; jao@jaoliveira.com.br Cc: flv@jaoliveira.com.br Assunto: RE: Nobredo / Overview Hi Isadora, Don’t forget we are keeping stock for them since months now… I am quite disappointed in this customer I must say… First hassles with Hapag, we switch them to MSC on our costs and now we are even punished more by storage costs. There is about 10 containers to go.
Subject: Nobredo / Vessel info / Week 21 21

C'est un problème mais pas un gros problème. Il vaut mieux ça que d'avoir des rupture de produits. Bien cordialement, SAGLAM DISTRIBUTION Nansifou GBADAMASSI DIRECTEUR DU DEPOT Téléphone : 02.43.04.48.89 E-mail : nansifou@saglam-france.fr ZA des Avaloirs 53140 Pré en Pail FRANCE www.saglam-france.fr De : Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Envoyé : mardi 28 mai 2024 09:35 À : Nansifou Gbadamassi <nansifou@saglam-france.fr> Objet : RE: Nouvelles commandes Bonjour Nansifou, Il reste 1 PAL en stock de la référence 9/9 présalée. J'ai juste reçu la remarque qu'il y a une différence en couleur des boîtes, le produit dedans est identique. Est-ce que ça peut poser des problèmes chez vos clients? Cordialement, Delphine --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 27/05/2024 16:16 To: nansifou@saglam-france.fr Subject: RE: Nouvelles commandes Bonjour Nansifou, Il y a une erreur dans le système et les collègues n'ont plus de l'acces sur le portail pour vérifier des possibilités pour demain (j'avais demandé 11-13h). Ça veut dire aussi qu'il y aura du retard avec les chargements de cet après-midi. Au pire, il n'y aura plus de possibilités pour demain. En tout cas, j'ai réservé les 2 crenaux de 20h peur être sûr d'avoir quelque chose. On peut toujours changé ces rendez-vous, mais à ce moment je ne peux rien garantir pour demain midi, je suis très désolée. Cordialement, Delphine --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Nansifou Gbadamassi [nansifou@saglam-france.fr] Sent: 27/05/2024 15:54 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: Nouvelles commandes D'accord Delphine, Merci de faire le nécessaire pour que ça soit possible. TextBody: Dear Kobe Bussan team, By means of this e-mail I wanted to let you know that all our plants have succesfully passed the new Halal audit. However, the HFCE is still finishing all paper work, so we haven't received the new certificates yet. Enclosed you can find a statement from the HFCE in this regard. As soon as we have received the new certificates, we will of course share these with you.
Subject: 【REMINDER】Request for renewal of Halal certificate　【提醒】清真证书续证申请　【リマインダー】ハラール証明書更新のご依頼（工場：597:Agristo(ﾍﾞﾙｷﾞｰ)）

TextBody: Our Company is active in Montevideo, Uruguay, South América. We actualy buy to different purveyors in uruguay but we want to start importing as we are a distribution company. We sell to restaurants and supermarkets. Our competition is Mcain. Actually we buy 20.000 kg and we want to sell 40.000kg per month. We want to sell all type of frozen products. We are planning to expand and open branches so as to be a reference in frozen products in uruguay as the market is growing. Hoping to hear from you soon Sincerely Valentín Fernández.

TextBody: Hi, I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to bring to your attention a recurring issue we have been experiencing with your deliveries. Each time we receive a delivery, the pallets are not up to standard. As a result, we have to spend approximately 3 hours transferring the goods to our pallets, which is significantly affecting our operations. Could you please address this issue and provide a solution? We need to ensure that the pallets used in your deliveries meet our requirements to avoid these time-consuming transfers. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. We look forward to your swift response. Thanks &
Subject: Urgent: Issue with Pallets in Deliveries

TextBody: Hello Sir, My name is Ahmad Saeed Al-Amoodi (Mr.) I am the Director of Al-Shaibi Consulting & Marketing Global Saudi Arabia. I would like to send you a request for Product Information, Catalog and Price List. Please send me these details so that we can review and write to you on how we work. We look forward to a fruitful working relationship in the future. Thanks in Anticipation,
Subject: Product Information and Price List Request

TextBody: Good day , According your question , pls see below : * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? Yes , we are now selling fries in our country-Taiwan . What is your experience in this field? My company has been at least 25 years in Taiwan. We are family-own company. We mainly imported 50 fcl chicken and 5-10 fcl pork for one month. And fries became more . * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? USA - AJC International . Why do you wish to change? Find more good choice , and good quality, stable supply. * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Not sure , maybe at least more than 3 fcl in a month . Most of our clients have used fries because we are importer for chicken . We believe we can do more for fries. * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? Yes , we now sell for all Taiwan clients. And warehouses? Our warehouse located in Chia-yi in Mid Taiwan .Also we have 3 processing plant for meat . We rent some warehouse for distribution in Kaohsiung, Taichung, and Taipei total have 7 place warehouse now . * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? We are importer, but we want to add more items . Also we need stable fries supply to help us get more orders . Do you have a website? Yes , https://www.topfreshfoods.com/index.php * What is your market strategy? We hope to sell good quality and stable products. Price is not always the best . If we sell a product, we hope to sell it for al long time . That’s mean we will keep work with our suppliers. Who are your customers? Too many to list. Thank you and Regards MARK LO SUN-RISE FOODS INC.—TAIWAN Meat Import Manager +88652833966 (T) +88652853406(F) +886921972900(C) j3135412@gmail.com<mailto:j3135412@gmail.com> Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com<mailto:sales@agristo.com>>於 2024年5月24日 週五，下午4:23寫道： Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? * What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Subject: Inquiring exports fries to TAIWAN

TextBody: Hi Beau, I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to share some feedback on our recent Fry Day 01 trials: 1. Fries Quality: The fries tasted very good and met our expectations. However, the first round of trials, Fry Day Crunchy was surprisingly not crunchy at all. We redid a second trial, and on that attempt, it felt more premium and crunchier, as expected. Could you please advise on the possible reasons behind this discrepancy? Additionally, could you provide us with some directions on the optimal cooking method and temperatures that we can recommend to our customers? As noticed, the margin for cooking error seems to significantly affect the final product quality. 2. Packaging Material: The packaging material, especially on the straight cut fries, was quite disappointing. The printing quality is not sharp and looks very blunt/blurry and lacked some sharpness. I have attached some pictures for your reference. Can you advise on this issue? Would it be possible to address this for our subsequent orders? Thank you for your attention to these matters. We look forward to your response and suggestions.
Subject: Fry Day 01 Feedback

TextBody: [https://exportdir.com/covr.jpg] It is indeed our great pleasure to invite your esteemed organization to participate at our forthcoming specialized B2B trade show which is 12th Kenya Food Expo an Int'l Trade Show for the entire Food industry going to be held at Nairobi Kenya, starting from 1 - 3 September 2024. Kenya is the Gateway to reach East African Counties and it's 7th Biggest populated country in Africa. 120 Companies are Participating from 12 Countries Over 55% of visitors are potential buyers coming from: Ethiopia, Kenya, & Uganda. Product Profile:- Agro Commodities, Pulses, Flour, Food ingredients & chemicals, Food Packaging, FMCG, Beverages, Energy Drinks, Juices, Catering & Hospitality, Hygiene & Cleaning, Spices & Herbs, Home Appliances, Printing Machinery & Packaging Machinery Kenya Food Expo is a comprehensive and dynamic Food platform that celebrates the rich and diverse Food heritage of the East African region. This multifaceted initiative encompasses various components. Kenya Food Expo brings together chefs, food enthusiasts, industry professionals, and businesses from across East Africa and beyond. It showcases a vibrant array of Food experiences, from traditional dishes to modern gastronomic innovations. The expo serves as a platform for networking, knowledge exchange, and discovering the latest trends in the world. The Kenya Food Expo is an annual gathering of thought leaders, experts, and professionals. This Expo offers panel discussions, workshops, and seminars on a wide range of topics, including sustainable food practices, cultural preservation through cuisine etc. It provides a space for meaningful conversations and collaboration within the Food community. For 3 Days you will have direct access to quality attendees & a buyer profile unmatched by any other event industry. Kinya is the gateway to East African Countries and mostly neighboring landlocked countries such as Uganda, Rwanda, Burundi, Congo & Ethiopia depend on Kenya. COST OF SHELL STAND - US$ 375 sq.m 9 m2 ( 3m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 9 = US$ 3375 12 m2 ( 4m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 12 = US$ 4500 15 m2 ( 5m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 15 = US$ 5625 18 m2 ( 6m x 3m ) COST - US$ 375 x 18 = US$ 6750 In the link you will find complete information such as; • Booking Application Form • Hotel Accommodation Packages specially designed with 4* & 5* Hotels • Useful Information & Products Profile • Floor Plan with available stand locations for your selection • Last year Participant's list • Photo Gallery enable you to understand how the stands will be look alike. Click Here To Download Booking Form <https://inexpos.us22.list-manage.com/track/click?u=741126994153c31e999db440f&id=4e53e28ca7&e=3adc8060ec> Why to Invest in Kenya? 1. Macroeconomic Stability: Kenya is the third largest economy in Sub-Saharan Africa. Kenya's economy is projected to grow by 5.5 percent in 2023 and above 6.0 percent over the medium term. The Government's Bottom-Up Economic Transformation Agenda will reinforce this growth, which is geared toward an economic turnaround and inclusive growth. The economic stability will boost the investment climate in the country. 2. Infrastructural Development: Kenya has a well-developed physical infrastructural facility including, four international airports, an extensive road and railway network, a modern deep sea port at Mombasa and Lamu capable of handling liquidbulk and other containerized cargo, an expanding, liberalized energy sector, and digital telecommunication. 3. Availability of highly skilled human resource In Kenya, the proportion of the youth (18-34 years), constitutes 25%. The youthful skilled population economically implies, there are lots of potential workers for the future in various areas of investment and a wider market for goods meant for the youth. The flexibility and adaptability to high technological changes will easily make the goods and services produced locally highly competitive. This in turn will act as an enabler for investment because of the availability of skilled affordable labour. 5. Improved Governance: Kenya enjoys a stable political environment and investors are guaranteed repatriation of capital and profits, constitutional protection against expropriation, and investment guarantee against non-commercial risks: ICSID, MIGA, and ATIA. We look forward to welcome you at the show! For Booking & more info kindly contact: [https://www.inexpo.ae/images/direct.jpg] Mr. Inaam Salman Project Director INEXPO GROUP IN EXHIBITION ORG & MGMT LLC Dubai - UAE Mob: +971 - 55 - 5506187
Subject: Kenya Food Expo

Dado que tenemos capacidad limitada, solo podemos cargar volumen en línea con el volumen promedio desde octubre, que es de aproximadamente 30 toneladas por mes. ¿Podrías reenviar los pedidos conforme a lo que menciono arriba? Puedes llamar a Anton si necesitas más información. Muchas gracias por tu comprensión. TextBody: Dear Pieter san, Good day. As we discussed before, Don Quijote said that they’d like to add EAN code on their carton label and could you please add EAN code on the current label?? EAN code: 4393259019708 Article: Don Quijote PB (7mm) 1kgx12 Before proceeding this, we need to report to them from which of Don Quijote orders will be produced with new carton label. Our current orders for Don Quijote are as follow and I guess that both 2 orders are already produced for JUNE and JULY loading. 12140542xx23 OSAKA June Loading 12140543xx23 TOKYO July Loading Therefore, we’d to start producing with new carton label with EAN code from August loading order (I haven’t sent PO yet). Could you please confirm that is it possible to start from August loading production??
Subject: Adding JAN code on the carton label of Don Quijote PB

TextBody: Hi Colin, I am afraid only 21 pallets can be loaded. Truly understand your point of view and totally agree, but we were only informed at the last minute by the carrier that this order will be loaded tomorrow (Monday). Everything had to be finalized in our system before Friday close of business, so we were not able anymore to fill the truck completely - our apologies! We will make sure this does not happen again.
Subject: Order 4504304771

TextBody: Geachte heer/mevrouw, Ik schrijf u om informatie te vragen over uw diepvries frietproducten, met name de 7x7 en 9x9 gesneden varianten. Wij zijn geïnteresseerd in het importeren van deze producten naar Turkije. Onze totale hoeveelheidsbehoefte zou ongeveer 40 ton per maand zijn, op voorwaarde dat de kwaliteit goed is en de prijs redelijk is. We zouden maandelijkse bestellingen plaatsen als we tevreden zijn met de eerste bestelling. Kunt u ons de volgende informatie verstrekken? 1. Huidige prijzen voor de 7x7 en 9x9 gesneden diepvries frietproducten (per kilogram of ton). 2. Levertijd vereist voor orderverwerking en levering. 3. Minimale ordergrootte, indien van toepassing. 4. Beschikbare logistieke en verzendopties, inclusief bijbehorende kosten. 5. Eventuele andere relevante informatie of vereisten voor import naar Turkije. Wij zouden uw spoedige reactie met de gevraagde gegevens zeer op prijs stellen. Laat het ons weten als u verdere informatie van onze kant nodig heeft. Hartelijk dank voor uw medewerking. Met vriendelijke groet,
Subject: Aanvraag voor diepvries frietproducten

TextBody: Hi, My name is Jessie Chua, and I am contacting you regarding search engine optimization (SEO) services for your website. I was just going through your website and would like to share some observations pertaining to it. Though your website is great and has all the information that prospective customers of your niche will search for, it has a lot of scope for getting optimized in line with Search Engine Guidelines. I'm not just saying this because I have to but can back it with facts and relevant information. We strongly believe that your website can give you more return than it might be giving you at present if it is optimized. If you are interested in seeing your business on the top position on Google, want to improve website revenue by 30-40% and ROI of 30X-50X, please reply to this email and we will get back to you with a detailed & comprehensive online marketing plan. Silver Gold Diamond Platinum 15 Keywords 20 Keywords 30 Keywords 40 Keywords Quarterly Quarterly Quarterly Quarterly $1,045 $1,386 $1,716 $2,046 We give you 100% quality assurance. Thanks in advance, Jessie Chua Business Development Manager
Subject: SEO keywords & Report

TextBody: Dear All I am contacting you regarding INV. No. 90592480 (P/O Y20240117-292150). Yokohama’s quarantine is asking about the following matter: On the specification of 13866 Potato Noisette, the rice flour used as ingredient could also be from Sri Lanka origin. Did you use Sri Lanka rice flour this time? [cid:image003.png@01DAB5AA.00FD9EE0] PS: Sri Lanka origin rice flour is subject to mandatory quarantine inspections, so we think that is the reason why they are asking this question. Thank you for letting me know. Looking forward to your reply.
Subject: Question from quarantine: INV 90592480 (P/O Y20240117-292150)

Je peux aussi confirmer que la production a fait 186 PAL 9/9 présalée pendant le weekend. TextBody: Dear Alina, Attached you can find the technical sheets. We will soon be changing our way of communicating to be able to assist you even better. From now upon, please direct your service-related queries to the following central e-mail address: service@agristo.com. This approach will centralize your questions and requests, allowing a more efficient and prompt processing, especially when your regular contact person is unavailable. We understand that this represents a change for you, but rest assured that your familiar contact person remains at your service. Thank you in advance for your understanding, and feel free to reach out to us for any further questions
Subject: Omnia technical specification 31.05.2024

TextBody: Dear Mya san, I have well received your request below, thank you. Please note that we can add an EAN code to the carton label starting from a certain production / packing run (and thus not necessarily starting from a certain order / delivery). At this moment, we only have 1 pallet (84 cartons) of the Don Quijote shoestring fries available, so the majority of the volume that is ordered in the two orders that you mention below has not yet been produced. The next production is scheduled for next week. Coud you please let me know how you want to proceed? We already add the EAN code to the box label from next week, or we wait until the production after that? Just to be sure: the EAN code that you want to add to the label is the same one as the one that is mentioned on the bag, right? Thanks!
Subject: Adding JAN code on the carton label of Don Quijote PB

TextBody: Dear Maxim , Thank you for your mail . Here are the responses to your questions : * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? 5 years on the field * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? From a few different companies/traders * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? At least 5 to 10 containers each months * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? I have distribution channel and warehouses as well * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? www.sticonsultancy.com<http://www.sticonsultancy.com> * What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? Chain stores, Wholesalers and Supermarkets
Subject: Frozen French Fries

TextBody: Only 24 hours to go. Have you registered yet? View this email online<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/q/17QwWMF74NXwORaoh1k8r5/wv> [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/i/amf_dmg_events/project_3014/Reglive-HS-Header2024.gif?size=640x0&w=BJx1RTbDgLBqZ71upeag5DuC_zy0] <https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikeKgU444uqNZcU6VGSUrYYZ1> There's only 24 hours to go for The Hotel Show, have your registered for your free pass yet? Whether you're in search of groundbreaking design concepts or game-changing operating supplies, we've curated a lineup that promises to leave you in awe. Don't miss out on this grand opportunity to network, connect and learn about the latest trends within the hospitality industry, from 4 - 6 June at the Dubai World Trade Centre. REGISTER FOR FREE<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikeS3CITeZof2L3gtLpjehjUe> To make your experience at The Hotel Show extra sweet, we're giving you a chance to win a VIP upgrade. All you have to do is share your participation with your colleagues on LinkedIn here<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikeZQlnIpulG6jcq1PVI0zEPr>. It's that simple! A sneak peek at our show features [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/203A1167.jpg] The Chefs Table Witness nine culinary teams from some of the region's leading hotels go head-to-head to produce a stunning 5-course meal in the hope of winning the coveted title of 'Hotel Culinary Team of the Year'. See more<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikffpMHmKugydpuJ7YYvzakFR> [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/_DM20248.jpg] Leadership and F&B Conference Explore thought-provoking leadership and strategy topics for tomorrow’s leaders. Participate in an unforgettable gathering of influential figures from the industry. See more<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikfncvmbUZdZgXDSG3uUlsFB4> [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/_DM20786.jpg] HITEC Conference Discover what’s new in the world of technology, to drive your workforce and solutions forward, from leaders in robotics, automation, artificial intelligence and more. See more<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikfuZe115ubqkvN2e81j7L0wh> [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/RAY_8022.jpg] UAE Professional Housekeepers Group Meeting Join us for in-depth conversations and tutorials on every facet of our industry from new market conditions, technology, procedures, constraints, regulations, products and more. See more<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikfCLWFQfZ8Ro3WbMcxHU3lru> [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/_DM21787.jpg] The Engineering and Sustainability Summit (TESS) The Engineering and Sustainability Summit (TESS) is crafted to encourage progressive thought leadership while promoting best practices for engineers within the industry. See more<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikfKyFkFqu6irC5lkh46GlGmH> [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/WhatsApp_Image_2024-05-29_at_5.56.22_PM.jpg] Leadership and F&B Stage design Marvel in the "Sands of Time" stage design for the Leadership and F&B conference, inspired by the UAE's iconic sands and history. Crafted by Designsmith<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikfSlnZuAZ3JvaeuSlAvsE1hU> with build partner OK Middle East, this stunning design seamlessly blends tradition and innovation. See more<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikg086EjLu1ayInEqq6UeWmd7> [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/Copy_of_650X225_1280_x_500_px_2000_x_1308_px_.png] Upskill and earn CPD points Our conferences are certified through the CPD Certification Service, the world’s leading and largest independent CPD accreditation organisation working across all industry sectors. [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/WhatsApp_Image_2024-05-29_at_5.42.38_PM.jpg] Watch for our guided robots roaming the halls! These robots represent the future, dedicated to enhancing human productivity and living standards with cutting-edge technology. Catch them for event information and a glimpse into tomorrow's innovations. [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/lazulite.png] Dynamic LED wall, Hologram and Robotic Arm Enjoy a game of tic tac toe with a robot at the HITEC conference! Witness a technology feature comprising of a dynamic led wall, hologram and an AI robotic arm. [https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/files/amf_dmg_events/project_3131/App_Email_Banner.png] <https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikg7UPj8VYYBCgwNYuDj1eH8k> Online registration is mandatory and will take less than a minute, so complete it today to skip the long queues at the venue. REGISTER FOR FREE<https://dmg-events.msgfocus.com/c/1bikgfHxXY6tW2FOFXwz9HNx23x> FREE ACCESS TO CO-LOCATED EVENTS Your visitor pass for The Hotel Show also grants you access to the four co-located shows. Nuestra capacidad actual es la siguiente: 1 contenedor en junio 1 contenedor en julio 2 contenedores en agosto Para septiembre, no podemos añadir más contenedores porque ya tenemos los tres contenedores de ARO programados. Dado que tenemos capacidad limitada, solo podemos cargar volumen en línea con el volumen promedio desde octubre, que es de aproximadamente 30 toneladas por mes. ¿Podrías reenviar los pedidos conforme a lo que menciono arriba? Puedes llamar a Anton si necesitas más información. Muchas gracias por tu comprensión. TextBody: Goedemorgen, Mijn naam is Jasper Kappelle en ik werk bij Corbion, een toonaangevend bedrijf op het gebied van voedselconservering en -preservering. Op de recente voedingsbeurs PLMA in de RAI in Amsterdam had ik de kans om uw bedrijf en de innovatieve producten die u aanbiedt te leren kennen. Bij Corbion zijn we gespecialiseerd in het produceren en leveren van met name melkzuur en melkzuurderivaten, die bijdragen aan de voedselveiligheid en de verlenging van de houdbaarheid van voedingsmiddelen. Als uw bedrijf geïnteresseerd is in het verkennen van de mogelijkheden die onze producten bieden, zou ik graag een verdere kennismaking plannen. U kunt mij bereiken via onderstaande contactgegevens om een geschikt moment voor een gesprek af te stemmen. Alvast hartelijk dank voor uw tijd en ik kijk uit naar uw reactie.
Subject: Introductie Corbion

TextBody: Stay ahead of the curve with our weekly updates on macadamia trade dynamics. Stay informed about the latest global trends and market forecasts. [https://mcusercontent.com/6729522a8581934ce98e49011/images/f8372a51-2577-8873-818c-556aae03cb93.png]<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=a5fe5cb2a0&e=982dc5b08e> Week 22: Report 7 Weekly MSM Trade Report Newsletter Message from the MD Dear readers, In reporting on the macadamia roundtable seminar at the recent INC World Nut and Dried Fruit Congress, the Australian Macadamia Society highlighted concern expressed by the South African industry on the availability of stock for the kernel market. The AMS report commented: “With the total global macadamia kernel production significantly lower than that of competing nut industries, it’s important the global industry plans strategically and builds, rather than starves, the critically important long term kernel market.” Given the intense cashflow, cost and margin pressures on producers and handlers over the past three years, it is not surprising that immediate solutions during 2024’s price and demand recovery have been sought in prioritising NIS markets. However, the call to strategically build the kernel market is probably one of the key requirements to ensure the sustainability of the macadamia industry. Inescapably, this is a collaborative exercise that requires the right tools and mechanisms to convince suppliers to commit to kernel production, especially given the attractiveness of NIS sales even at low prices. For a shift to occur, market participants need to be better able to assess risks in kernel supply and to foster productive, unpanicked reactions to market fluctuations. They need transparency and real-time access to market signals to foresee and address challenges across trade cycles. [https://mcusercontent.com/6729522a8581934ce98e49011/images/9ffd0f1f-4c9d-e0c6-420b-7bc920cf9842.jpeg] Managing Director - Cobus Kok The MSM platform provides the means and mechanisms for such industry collaboration and the discovery of fundamental conditions necessary to implement a common strategy and realise a common goal that goes beyond short-termism and builds towards a sustainable future for the industry. As you consider this week’s market review, consider also how the trading platform can assist the industry to strategically plan and to build the kernel market. We would love to engage with you to show you how we see it playing a critical part in developing a positive future for all in the industry. Sign up to receive the MSM Market Report Newsletter - Free of charge.<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=607a56c10e&e=982dc5b08e> Latest Macadamia Transactions 27 - 31 May 2024 Reported transactions for Week 22 (27-31 May) capped off a month of price rises for kernel styles. The graph below, which effectively compares average prices observed in reported transactions for May (Weeks 18-22) versus April (Weeks 13-17), show particularly strong price increases for Style 1 and Style 4L. [https://mcusercontent.com/6729522a8581934ce98e49011/images/e8075ac6-8a11-cbd4-6487-e7fd95c751d3.png] Prices for larger NIS styles retained their levels this week as an increase in the number of transactions for NIS 22+ were observed. [https://mcusercontent.com/6729522a8581934ce98e49011/images/871afbee-dd13-2fca-b887-b5df57773eb1.png] Market Sentiment Reported NIS prices did not rise in May despite expectations that the marketing of Australia and South Africa’s 2024 crop could reinforce this year’s price recovery. Later than usual harvests in both countries together with South African supplier decisions to pursue NIS transactions above kernel have kept average NIS 22+ prices below US$3.50/kg CIF. While this is still an improvement on last year’s average prices, an apparent urgency in cashflow recovery after a tough 2022 and 2023 may be driving supplier interest in NIS rather than pursuing lucrative kernel markets. The latter have longer payment terms and higher costs for processors. There are also widespread reports of growers bypassing handlers to sell NIS directly to China as producers address their immediate business needs to recover from previous seasons’ low prices and high costs. Some industry voices are raising concern with the need for a more strategic and sustainable approach by South Africa that focuses on developing kernel markets. While it appears that short-term goals dominate in South Africa, the Australian industry is showing an earlier shift back to its traditional NIS/kernel marketing split. With Stratamarkets reporting that suppliers are already feeling “well sold” on kernel despite the increased demand at rising prices, it remains unclear if further crop will be committed to meet this demand this year or if NIS transactions will continue to be favoured. Trade Trends Demand for kernel macadamia products in Germany has improved in Q1 2024 in comparison to the same periods in the previous two years. By the end of Q1 2024, Germany had received 381mt of kernel from South Africa, while 212mt had been received from Kenya, according to the Federal Statistical Office of Germany. By the end of Q1 2023, 196mt had been shipped from South Africa and 234mt from Kenya. By the end of Q1 2022, 256mt had been shipped from both South Africa and Kenya. Interestingly, about 124mt had been received from Malawi in Q1 2024 whereas that country had shipped virtually nothing in the equivalent quarter of 2022 and 2023. Kernel shipments to Germany typically peak between May/June and January the following year. [https://mcusercontent.com/6729522a8581934ce98e49011/images/9c99a4c6-184e-cfa1-8bd9-5171f196d6d0.png] In the News 1 June 2024: Kakuzi looks to revenue diversification with macadamia production. Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=59b74545be&e=982dc5b08e> 30 May 2024: South Africa’s agricultural trade surplus up 20% y/y in Q1, 2024. Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=26e617d04d&e=982dc5b08e> 29 May 2024: Macadamia market recovery. Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=3f8ff876e3&e=982dc5b08e> 27 May 2024: Macadamias: twisted sales. Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=d0f2171775&e=982dc5b08e> 27 May 2024: International influencers embark on tour of Australian macadamia industry. Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=327302fe77&e=982dc5b08e> 27 May 2024: KNCCI market intelligence for export of macadamia [video] Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=37e05d060f&e=982dc5b08e> 24 May 2024: Mozambique’s macadamia exports – a tough nut to crack. Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=a870c15aa6&e=982dc5b08e> 24 May 2024: China bans Guatemala’s coffee and macadamia imports. Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=2ce0023d4d&e=982dc5b08e> 23 May 2024: Brazilian nut market is showing promising growth. Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=133c205ede&e=982dc5b08e> 23 May 2024: MSM address burning questions. Read more<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=cfdfb56280&e=982dc5b08e> Strata Report Click here <https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=c9b3dfd8b6&e=982dc5b08e> Disclaimer: While every effort is made to be accurate, it does not constitute advice and MSM is not responsible for any reliance exercised on this data CLICK HERE TO UNSUBSCRIBE <https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=dd0780cea3&t=b&e=982dc5b08e&c=9c11bc04b9> [Facebook icon]<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=17de53dd23&e=982dc5b08e> [YouTube icon] <https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=5de05d1ff6&e=982dc5b08e> [LinkedIn icon] <https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=2534c9a143&e=982dc5b08e> [logo]<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/track/click?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=8ed699fa7f&e=982dc5b08e> View email in browser<https://mailchi.mp/macsm/weekly-mac-trade-information-newsletter-16533594?e=982dc5b08e> MSM · 45 Marloth St · Mbombela, Mpumalanga 1201 · South Africa unsubscribe<https://macsm.us8.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=6729522a8581934ce98e49011&id=dd0780cea3&t=b&e=982dc5b08e&c=9c11bc04b9>

TextBody: FOOD KENYA TRADE SHOW 2024 International Food Trade Expo July 12 - 14, Sarit Expo Center We invite you to participate at to participate at Food Kenya 2024 that will take place in Nairobi, Kenya from 12 -14 July. The annual event attracts visitors from all over East & Central Africa while exhibitors participate from over 10 countries. The event will take place in conjunction with Kenya Trade Show 2024. The rate per sq. m is US$ 350 and the minimum size of the booth is 9 sq. m, hence the rate for the 9 sq. m booth will be US$ 3150. The booth will include one table, two chairs, one electrical socket, two spot lights & fascia with board. The event has been very successful in East Africa with International exhibitors getting a very promising response. The event which mainly targets the manufacturers, distributors, retailers, and entrepreneurs in the Food & Hotel industry, has been one of the most important platforms for the sector in East Africa which is also one of the world’s fastest growing markets. Exhibitors and visitors alike have made new business contacts and closed valuable deals For More Information, Please Click Here <https://intlexpos.com/FHK2024/> For an urgent response, please feel free to call on +97150 5352675 Grow International, Dubai UAE Unsubscribe by clicking here<https://intlexpos.com/Unsubscribe/>, kindly do not reply to the email
Subject: Export To Kenya - 5th FKTS 2024

TextBody: Hi Gloria, 5.36% is the moisture (so % water). This has nothing to do with the color. The sample is on its way, I’ve shared the tracking last week Friday (let me know if you didn’t received it). The production took place last week and is in our spec and is our standard color for that spec. If colors are not matching, we currently don’t have a spec in our portfolio (5 mm flake) with a lighter color and no other additives. Let’s discuss when the sample arrive.
Subject: Order flakes + return order

TextBody: Hi Hilke, hope you are well! Gilles informed me of your comment about the brightness of the current film's color. I discussed this with the printer, Delo Dettmer. They mentioned they can print brighter, but they need more specifics on what would be sufficient for you. If the desired print result differs from the proofs, they will no longer have a color target. Delo suggests that someone from Iglo visit them to approve the print directly on their press. Are you open to this? They currently have an open order for the crinkle-cut and thin-cut chips, which they will print next week. Please let me know how you would like to proceed.
Subject: Brightness Iglo Film
