TextBody: Dear Mohamed, Please find the ProForma invoices attached for the new June + July orders. Below is an overview of the containers per BL. For the the Qualiko Classic French Fries I'm hoping we can still add the production this week, because the next run is only planned in week 28. I'm waiting for the confirmation on that and will confirm asap. The next production of the Shoestring fries is planned for week 26, which means shipping is possible in week 27 (week of 1st July) only. So shipping shoestring fries in June is not possible anymore unfortunately. I have combined Classic FF and Shoestring fries in same BL's as per your request, but I can still adjust if you would like that. JUNE orders KSA JUNE 4 - 99192737: 2 FCL QAL Classic FF + 1 FCL QAL Thin Cut fries KSA JUNE 5 - 99192735: 2 FCL QAL Classic FF + 1 FCL QAL Thin Cut fries KSA JUNE 6 - 99192736: 1 FCL QAL Classic FF (please let me know if you want me to add this container to order JUNE 4 or JUNE 5 to have one less BL) JULY orders KSA JULY 1 - 99192742: 2 FCL QAL Classic FF + 1 FCL QAL Thin Cut fries KSA JULY 2 - 99192739: 3 FCL QAL Classic FF I will confirm the tenative shipping schedule soonest I have confirmation from the production planning.
Subject: New June + July orders

TextBody: Dear Exhibitors, We refer to the trade fair listed below. As a competent agency, we offer you comprehensive consultation on accommodation at trade fairs and congresses without obligation. Our cooperation ranges from 2-star to 5-star hotels, and we place great emphasis on providing comprehensive service to our clients. If you still require rooms for the Anuga trade fair or any other trade fair in Germany, we look forward to receiving your inquiry. We will process it for you within 24 hours and send you a completely non-binding and free offer. As an example, we would like to present the following options: 1. Pullman Hotel Cologne **** - €469.00 Euros per single room per night including breakfast - Public transportation: 21 minutes to the fair with tram line 9 - Direct connection - 3 stops to the fair 2. B&B Hotel Cologne City ** - €339.00 Euros per single room per night including breakfast - Public transportation: 32 minutes to the fair with tram line 1 - Direct connection - 8 stops to the fair 3. B&B Hotel Cologne Ehrenfeld ** - €339.00 Euros per single room per night including breakfast - Public transportation: 26 minutes to the fair with the S-Bahn - Direct connection - 4 stops to the fair 3. B&B Hotel Cologne West ** - €392.00 Euros per single room per night including breakfast - €326,00 Euros per double room per night including breakfast - €326,00 Euros per Twin room per night including breakfast - Public transportation: 53 minutes by public transport - By car 21 minutes 3. Delta Hotel by Marriott Leverkusen **** - €429.00 Euros per double room single use per night including breakfast - Public transportation: 28 minutes to the fair by train - Direct connection - 2 stops to the fair For a customized offer and further details, please contact us. We look forward to welcoming you! Mit freundlichen Gruessen | With
Subject: Anuga 2025: Secure Your Hotel Accommodation Now!

TextBody: Good day, Marieke. My name is Otar, I am a new member of Mziuri team on commercial team lead position in Company Mziuri. We have tested your trial order with our clients and we have following general feedback: Most of them are ok with the quality of the fries, but we cannot compete with competitor prices on the market. I would like to ask you to update prices of frozen potatoes with following information included: I understand there are categories of each product. AA – A – B If you are producing all of the categories, please provide all prices. Keep in mind for price quotations, we are going to order full truck. I will await your answer. Thank you. Otar Tsinadze Commercial Team Lead Tsereteli St. № 113d Tbilisi ,Georgia 0159 Cell: +(995 598) 29 22 99 E-mail: o.tsinadze@mziuri.com.ge<mailto:o.tsinadze@mziuri.com.ge> WEB: https://mziuriholding.ge/ [Description: Description: cid:image001.png@01CDF7B9.1155D2A0]

TextBody: Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. I see that your company is based in Poland, but the request is for Greece. What is the purpose of getting an offer from our side? Can you share some information about your activities? Why do you want to change from supplier? Which markets are you active in? What competitors do you have in your market? What volumes do you do? What volumes do you predict to do? What products do you do? What products would you like to in the future? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Subject: RE: Frozen French Fries

Beemsterboer Food Traders Tel: +310226396408 Mobiel: +31610946168 Mail: william@jpb.nl<mailto:william@jpb.nl> J.P. Beemsterboer Food Traders Op al onze aanbiedingen, op alle aan ons en door ons gegeven opdrachten en op alle met ons gesloten overeenkomsten zijn uitsluitend van toepassing onze Algemene Handelsvoorwaarden (hierna aangeduid als “AHV”), gedeponeerd bij de Griffie van de Rechtbank Noord-Holland, locatie Alkmaar op 3 september 2013. Kopieën van onze AHV liggen ter inzage bij ons op kantoor en kopieën daarvan zullen op uw eerste verzoek kosteloos aan u worden gestuurd. Voorts kunnen onze AHV kosteloos worden gedownload van onze website: www.beemsterboer.nl. Wij wijzen algemene voorwaarden gehanteerd door onze contractuele wederpartij uitdrukkelijk van de hand, tenzij wij uitdrukkelijk schriftelijk de toepasselijkheid van algemene voorwaarden van onze contractuele wederpartij hebben aanvaard. All our quotations, all orders placed with and by us and all contracts concluded with us are exclusively subject to Dutch law and our General Conditions of Trade (hereafter also referred to as “GCT”) including the The Hague Uncitral Arbitration Clause included therein (article 4.3), filed with the court Noord-Holland, location Alkmaar on 3 September 2013. Copies of our GCT are available at our offices and will be sent to you free of charge at your first request. Moreover, our GCT can be downloaded from our website: www.beemsterboer.nl. We explicitly reject any and all general conditions of trade from our contractual counterparts, unless we explicitly agree in writing with the applicability of such general conditions of trade. Toutes nos offres, toutes les commandes qui nous sont confiées, toutes les commandes que nous passons, tous les contrats et toutes les conventions conclus avec nous sont régis de manière exclusive par le droit néerlandais et nos Conditions Générales (nommées dessous aussi “CG “), assortie de sa clause compromissoire et attributive de juridiction exclusive à l'article 4.3 (arbitrage à La Haye Pays-Bas conformément au règlement d’arbitrage de la CNUDCI), qui ont été déposées au greffe du tribunal de Noord-Holland, dépendance à Alkmaar le 3 septembre 2013. Il peut être pris communication de nos CG en nos bureaux et un exemplaire peut être gratuitement obtenu sur simple demande. Par ailleurs, nos CG peuvent être gratuitement téléchargées à partir de notre site Internet www.beemsterboer.nl. Nous excluons formellement l’application des conditions générales de notre cocontractant, à moins que nous en ayons formellement accepté l’application. En todas nuestras ofertas, en todas las órdenes hechas por o a nosotros y en todos los contratos celebrados con nosotros son de aplicación exclusiva el derecho holandés y nuestras Condiciones Mercantiles Generales (en adelante denominadas como "CMG"), incluida la cláusula de UNCITRAL Arbitraje de la Haya ahí incluida (artículo 4.3), depositadas en la Secretaría Judicial del Juzgado de Noord-Holland, localidad de Alkmaar el 3 de septiembre 2013.Las copias de nuestras CMG se encuentran para su consulta en nuestras oficinas y a la primera solicitud le enviaremos gratuitamente copias de las mismas.Además, nuestras CMG pueden ser bajadas gratuitamente de nuestro sitio en Internet: www.beemsterboer.nl. Rechazamos expresamente las condiciones generales que usen nuestras contrapartes contractuales, salvo que hayamos aceptado expresamente por escrito la aplicación de las condiciones generales de nuestras contrapartes contractuales.
Subject: 1 x Iral D24-01327   IO24-00910

TextBody: Goedemiddag., Gebasseerd op onderstaande planning en de aanwezige voorraden begin vorige week, verwacht ik hetvolgende van de nieuwe planning June 2024. * 131400, met 7500 dozen voorraad lijkt het mij dat W21 - W31 in 1 productierun is gedaan. Op basis daarvan verschuift de eerstvolgende behoefte naar W36.2024 * 1000005533 met 13000 dozen op voorraad lijkt het mij dat W34.2024 al vooruit geproduceerd is. Op basis daarvan verschuift de eerstvolgende behoefte naar 38.2024 Verzoek: is er een mogelijk niet al 10+ weken vooruit te plannen, we verliezen nu 2 maanden BBE en tevens zorgt dit voor extra opslag aan beide kanten. Alvast bedankt! Met vriendelijke groeten,

TextBody: Hello, Please find attached the requested documents. May I also ask your attention for below: We changed our way of communicating to be able to assist you even better. From now, please direct your service-related queries to the following central e-mail address: service@agristo.com. This approach will centralize your questions and requests, allowing a more efficient and prompt processing, especially when your regular contact person is unavailable. We understand that this represents a change for you, but rest assured that your familiar contact person remains at your service. Thank you in advance for your understanding, and feel free to reach out to us for any further questions. • GFSI certificate and report. If non-GFSI accredited, please provide any other certificates • Sustainability certificate(s) if applicable (ASC, MSC, GAP): Not applicable • BAP certificate (if applicable): Not applicable • HACCP Documentation – minimum process flow and CCP summary • Allergen risk assessment • Up to date specifications for relevant products • A full traceability exercise if non-GFSI accredited only • SEDEX report, if a member
Subject: FW: Expired Documents

TextBody: Hi Alicea Thank you for your feedback. However, I'm afraid this is not workable. If Golden Foods places an order, I can't go back each time checking if we can actually ship it. Especially since, this request was made on Thursday for an order that loaded today and I sent you an email requesting if all orders were okay to load as such on Thursday. However, I did not receive a response by Friday night. There is no way for me to know when a confirmation is final or preliminary. Going forward, should I put all future Suape orders on hold until your explicit confirmation this order can load? Please note this can cause significat delays in shipping in contrast to the Excel Francisco created.. Thank you for your cooperation.
Subject: Re: WORLD FOOD BUSINESS/AG2810 - vessel-info

TextBody: En nu met bijlage Marlies De Ketele Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Service [service@agristo.com] Sent: 3/06/2024 14:58 To: marleen.van-durmen@iglo.com Subject: Stock rapport Iglo - 03.06.2024 Hallo Marleen, ik vond het zeer aangenaam om deze morgen een gezicht op de naam te kunnen plakken!:) In bijlage vind u het recentste stockrapport terug. Ik heb een extra kolom voor u toegevoegd waar u reeds info vroeg over mogelijke productieweken. Bevestigde producties werden genoteerd met datum + volume. Zoals afgesproken zal ik u woensdagnamiddag proberen in te lichten over de komende productie-week. Dus voor komende woensdag, zal ik u hopelijk meer kunnen vertellen over 96017389 - Belviva - Plain Croquette - 12 x 800g en 96018964 BELVIVA - klassieke Frieten-classiques Frites - 12x875g. Komende vrijdag en maandag ben ik er even tussenuit. De orders zullen worden opgenomen door mijn back up, dus geen zorgen. Echter vroeg ik me af of het stockoverzicht kon wachten tot dinsdag? Indien niet, laat ik dit ook door mijn collega verzorgen. Met vriendelijke groeten, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63
Subject: Stock rapport Iglo - 03.06.2024

TextBody: Dear Sarah, To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Subject: PO Inquiry 2024

TextBody: Hi, We have received these references for loading in Wielsbeke, is there any way to book it in via your website? Or do we contact you by e-mail?

Hallo Marleen, ik vond het zeer aangenaam om deze morgen een gezicht op de naam te kunnen plakken!:) In bijlage vind u het recentste stockrapport terug. Ik heb een extra kolom voor u toegevoegd waar u reeds info vroeg over mogelijke productieweken. Bevestigde producties werden genoteerd met datum + volume. Zoals afgesproken zal ik u woensdagnamiddag proberen in te lichten over de komende productie-week. Dus voor komende woensdag, zal ik u hopelijk meer kunnen vertellen over 96017389 - Belviva - Plain Croquette - 12 x 800g en 96018964 BELVIVA - klassieke Frieten-classiques Frites - 12x875g. Komende vrijdag en maandag ben ik er even tussenuit. De orders zullen worden opgenomen door mijn back up, dus geen zorgen. Echter vroeg ik me af of het stockoverzicht kon wachten tot dinsdag? Indien niet, laat ik dit ook door mijn collega verzorgen. Met vriendelijke groeten, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63
Subject: Stock rapport Iglo - 03.06.2024

From: Agristo Service <service@agristo.com> Sent: Friday, May 24, 2024 7:26 AM To: Fullers Foods Purchasing <purchase@fullersfoods.com> Cc: marlies.deketele@agristo.com Subject: RE: Schedule Update 22/05/24 *** Please note the message below originated on the Internet. Please use caution when replying or opening links or attachments. *** Good morning Gareth, As promised I have also checked on the newcold orders (tesco) for the week of 3/6. French Fries, roast potatoes and crinkle cut oven fries will all be loaded as requested, volumes have been confirmed. The Hash browns had to be limited so we will deliver only 1 truck on that article the 1st week. We are trying to get more volume as you have requested so if I get more, I will send out orders that are currently delayed earlier. Tesco wedges remain to be confirmed. we have a production run this weekend and after that run we will evaluate the needed volume. Almost all remaining orders for Reed Boardall and Dublin have been planned for next week. Still 2 trucks for Reed Boardall remain to be confirmed. If these volumes get out in time, we will be able to load the 1st 3 trucks to Newcold. If not, it is possible that we will need to delay 1 or 2 trucks in the week of 3 June, I will follow up on this next week. TextBody: Hello, I hope this email finds you well. The majority of exhibitors have already embarked on their quest for the perfect hotel, and now it's your turn to join them. Prepare to thrive at TUTTOFOOD 2025<https://tsmtpclick.com/tracking/qaR9ZGxjBQxlZQp2ZmxkBGNlAQRlBPM5qzS4qaR9ZQb1JD> by partnering with us. Here's why our exclusive accommodation solutions will take your experience to new heights: * Unparalleled Location: Our preferred hotels place you in the heart of the action, ensuring you never miss a moment of this premier event. * Unmatched Convenience: Benefit from the sheer convenience of being just steps away from the exhibition halls, enabling you to maximize your networking opportunities. * Tailored Excellence: Choose from a wide range of accommodation options that suit your preferences, whether you seek the utmost luxury or value-driven comfort. * Early Bird Advantage: By securing your accommodation now, you can select from a plethora of available rooms and secure the best deals before the rush begins. Simply reply to this email or complete our online request form<https://tsmtpclick.com/tracking/qaR9ZGxjBQxlZQp2ZmxkBGNlAQRlBPM5qzS4qaR9ZQb2Dt> with your accommodation requirements, and we'll provide you with a personalized offer tailored to your needs. Take advantage of this opportunity now to secure your success in Milan. Don't wait until it's too late – join the ranks of exhibitors who have already partnered with us and prepare to thrive at TUTTOFOOD 2025. We look forward to welcoming you to this extraordinary event! With
Subject: TuttoFood 2025 - Hotel Offers in Milan

TextBody: Buenas días, El documento apostillado adjunto para revisar. Saludos cordiales, Elynn Marisse Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 472 922 248 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: [info@delegacionescanarias.com] Sent: 10/05/2024 10:50 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: Agristo/ Fabrix - cambio de aceite para noisetes y rostis redondas/ certificado de libre venta para todos sus productos Buenos días, Me confirma el cliente que los documentos están bien, deben ser apostillados y luego emitidos por el organismo oficial. Por favor cuando estén firmados los originales, enviar una copia para enviárselo al cliente. Saludos, De: Service Request [mailto:service@agristo.com] Enviado el: jueves, 2 de mayo de 2024 12:59 Para: info@delegacionescanarias.com Asunto: RE: Agristo/ Fabrix - cambio de aceite para noisetes y rostis redondas/ certificado de libre venta para todos sus productos Hola, Ya tienen alguna respuesta de Fabrix en relacion con los certificados de libre venta? Un saludo cordial, Mercedes D'hoker Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 63 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Service Request [service@agristo.com] Sent: 23/04/2024 18:53 To: info@delegacionescanarias.com Subject: RE: Agristo/ Fabrix - cambio de aceite para noisetes y rostis redondas/ certificado de libre venta para todos sus productos Buenos días, Adjunto encontrará el certificad de libre venta parasus productos: (solo se menciona la descripción agrupada y los ingredientes como puede ver) HF article description grouped description production site ingredients 300004 314896 MAO ALL 2,5 1 I108BE FRENCH FRIES Wielsbeke, Belgium Potatoes, Palm oil. 300136 305618 MAO F10 2,5 1 I120FA Wielsbeke, Belgium Potatoes, Palm oil. 300490 307368 MAO STH 2,5 1 I120BE Wielsbeke, Belgium Potatoes, Palm oil. 308101 310637 MAO CRC10 2,5 1 I108 Harelbeke, Belgium Potatoes, Palm oil. 301748 305442 MAO WED 2,5 1 E72V2 WEDGES Wielsbeke, Belgium Potatoes, Sunflower oil 300234 307035 MAO JAC 2,5 1 I120 WEDGES Wielsbeke, Belgium Potatoes, Palm oil. 308164 314020 MAO RORO 2,5 1 I96V4 HASH BROWN Nazareth, Belgium Potatoes, Sunflower oil, Onion, Potato flakes, Salt, Spices, Dextrose. 302155 313903 MAO NOO 1,0 1 I96V2 NOISETTES Nazareth, Belgium Potatoes, Sunflower oil, Rice flour, Dried potatoes, Salt, Potato Starch, Stabiliser: E461, Dextrose, Spices 300270 301177 MAO JAR 2,5 1 I120 SPICY WEDGES Tilburg, Netherlands Potatoes, Sunflower oil, Rice flour, Salt, Dextrine, Potato starch, Spices, Onion granulate, Flavouring. ¿Pueden confirmar si este borrador es correcto? Nos gustaría presentar las ventas libres (1 por país de orígen) con una descripción general. Proponemos trabajar con la descricpción general porque así evitaríamos la necesidad de establecer nueva CLV si decide pedir otra marca/artículo, pero con los mismos ingredientes y denominación, ésta seguirá siendo válida. Si no es posible adaptaré el documento de venta libre, pero entonces me gustaría entender un poco mejor por qué sería necesario. Si necesitas que el registro de los productos se de otra manera, me gustaría preguntarte si puedes pedir un documento, pantallazo o página web donde conste que es normativa de sus autoridades. Así lo entiendo correctamente y podemos centralizar esta información para el futuro 😊. Esperamos su aprobación para que lo firmen las autoridades necesarias. Un cordial saludo, Mercedes D'hoker Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 63 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: info@delegacionescanarias.com [info@delegacionescanarias.com] Sent: 8/04/2024 13:26 To: Mercedes.Dhoker@agristo.com Subject: RE: Agristo/ Fabrix - cambio de aceite para noisetes y rostis redondas Hola Mercedes, El cliente Fábrix pide que sí, que por favor se renueve todos los certificados de libre venta, pero por favor, que pongan en el mismo documento todos los productos que consume el cliente. Saludos, Jéssica De: Mercedes D'hoker [mailto:Mercedes.Dhoker@agristo.com] Enviado el: viernes, 22 de marzo de 2024 16:07 Para: info@delegacionescanarias.com Asunto: FW: Agristo/ Fabrix - cambio de aceite para noisetes y rostis redondas Hola, Como están? Espero todo bien. Querría verificar si entretiempo ya saben si Fabrix necesita nuevo CLV? Un saludo cordial 😊 Mercedes​​​​ D'hoker Customer Service Specialist T +32 56 54 11 63 • M +32 498 16 52 48 Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com

TextBody: Hello Mohammed, Alright, thank you for the clarification, we will proceed with the first payment and we will transfer the rest of the amount after the issuance of the first transfer. So the 100% will be transferred before the loading date. Regards On Mon, 3 Jun 2024 at 6:08 PM Mohamed El Hawary <Mohamed.ElHawary@agristo.com<mailto:Mohamed.ElHawary@agristo.com>> wrote: Dear Fatima, Hope all is well with you. After checking with the finance team, unfortunately we will not be able to load any containers unless the 100% payment has been made. This is our standard also specially when we start with new companies. Appreciate if you could apply the 100% this time as we cannot change it, and later we can discuss a new way of payment if applicable with future orders. Your quick response and action will be highly appreciated.

TextBody: Hi Lesley, our quality team says the following: The method they (SGS) use is a quick method for determining fat content, but a specific type of fat in our products is not included in the analysis. Hence the lower fat content. The Soxhlet method is the correct method to analyze our type of product.
Subject: Booker - fat levels in cooked chips

TextBody: Good day, Hope you're doing great! 🌞 As we prepare to dive into June, we're excited to help with your container shipments. Do you have any shipments or rate requests for us? We're ready to make this month smooth sailing for you. Why don't seagulls fly over the bay? Because then they'd be bagels! 🥯😉 Let us know what you need, and we'll get things rolling faster than a seagull can say "bagel"! Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Subject: June Containers: Ready, Set, Go!

TextBody: Hi Ana, I received your email via Gilles. We normally load these products at Wielsbeke. However, I understand the confusion as some of the orders are to be loaded in Nazareth because we packed there in the previous weeks. As internal transport of a full truck from Wielsbeke to Nazareth is not efficient, we moved below orders to Nazareth: 4500023567 4500023568 4500023570 4520000110 However, these are the only orders for now to be loaded in Nazareth. The loading place can also be consulted in our TMS or transport system. Without any further confirmation from my side, you can consider these the only orders to be loaded in Nazareth. KR Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14
Subject: FW: upit

TextBody: Hi Ana, I received your email via Gilles. We normally load these products at Wielsbeke. However, I understand the confusion as some of the orders are to be loaded in Nazareth because we packed there in the previous weeks. As internal transport of a full truck from Wielsbeke to Nazareth is not efficient, we moved below orders to Nazareth: 4500023567 4500023568 4500023570 4520000110 However, these are the only orders for now to be loaded in Nazareth. The loading place can also be consulted in TMS or transport system. Without any further confirmation from my side, you can consider these the only orders to be loaded in Nazareth. KR Sarah Detailleur Customer Experience Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 65 M + 0498 74 13 14

TextBody: Dear All Good morning. Well noted. Thanks for your information and believe your service will be further better !!! We are glad. Noriko From: Pieter Lapierre <Pieter.Lapierre@agristo.com> Sent: Monday, June 3, 2024 7:08 PM To: Mya Thin Kyu (ミャ ティン チュー) <mya@kohyoj.co.jp>; Noriko Kataoka (片岡 範子) <kataoka@kohyoj.co.jp> Cc: Melissa Samyn <Melissa.Samyn@agristo.com>; Line Cabbeke <Line.Cabbeke@agristo.com>; Alexia Lacombe <Alexia.Lacombe@agristo.com> Subject: Agristo Service Dear Mya san, Noriko san, As already mentioned during our call some weeks ago, I want to inform you of an exciting development here at Agristo. Our Service team, currently consisting out of Technical Sales and Customer Service, is undergoing a transformative journey in the coming weeks and months, as we shift towards becoming a Customer Experience organization. This transformation is paired with some changes in customer allocation within both teams and in the way of communication. In concrete terms, for you, the following changes will take effect from today: * Personally, I will also become your point of contact, instead of Alexia, for everything related to orders, logistics and invoicing, next to the topics that I was already responsible for in my previous role as Technical Sales Officer (quality, packaging, specifications, …). * As from now on, you can direct all your service-related queries (so all questions and information which you used to send to Alexia and/or to myself) to the following central e-mail address: service@agristo.com<mailto:service@agristo.com>. This approach will centralize your questions and requests, allowing a more efficient and prompt processing. Of course, you can also still call or text me via WhatsApp. * As from now on, you can direct all your claims (so complaints related to packaging, quality and logistics) to the following central e-mail address: claims@agristo.com<mailto:claims@agristo.com>. Melissa and Line stay in place in their current roles and can be contacted as you are used to do. That being said: please note that I will not be in the office from tomorrow until end of next week. Marlies De Ketele will take over from me during this time – she already was my back-up for your account last summer. If you send your e-mails to service@agristo.com<mailto:service@agristo.com>, she will automatically receive your e-mail while I’m not in the office. As soon as I’m back, I will get your e-mails again. We understand that this represents a change for you, but we are confident that this new way of working will improve your overall experience with Agristo. If you have any questions or doubts, do not hesitate to contact me.
Subject: RE: Agristo Service

TextBody: Dear Alexia , Good day to you. Please find attached new orders DICPO009695-1 for your kind perusal. Kindly assist to counter sign and return us a copy for our filing purpose. Look forward to receive Proforma Invoice for VO application and keep us update Cargo Readiness for our shipment booking purpose. Documents Require : 1) Invoice 2) Packing list (with production and expiry date) 3) BL / Seaway Bill (provided by our agent for FCA term) 4) Certificate of Origin 5) Health Certificate 6) Certificate of Analysis complete with Heavy Metals and Microbiological Analysis 7) Packing Declaration 8) Halal Certificate 9) Material Safety Data Sheet ( MSDS ) 10) Mandatory Inspection By SGS Before Stuffing ***Important Note : Based on Indonesia regulation (BPOM Regulation 27/2022), food product must have at least 2/3 remaining shelf life when imported to Indonesia*** Thanks. [A close up of a computer Description automatically generated] [A white background with blue text Description automatically generated] [A white background with black text Description automatically generated]
Subject: Agristo // DICPO009695 -- Frozen Agristo Fries ( Blank Label )   ,  1 x 40' Reefer -- FCA terms ( Antwerp , Belgium to Jakarta  , Indonesia ) -  Requested ETA : 29/07/2024

Need to revise to ' potatoes, sunflower oil, rice flour, dried potatoes, potato starch, salt, stabiliser: E461, dextrose, spices' ,same as the ingredients mentioned on the labels. TextBody: Hello, Yes we are food trading company based in Poland, I’m Turkish and I’m owner, I live in Poland 15 years. 1. You can see our website, we mainly trade frozen meat (poultry, pork, beef, fish) and fresh eggs but also many other food articles. 2. Who said I want to change my supplier? 3. I have clients all over Europe and some third countries. 4. We don’t sell much frozen French fries, few spot deals yearly and we don’t have any competitor 😊 5. I sell around 400 trucks weekly but of course not fries.. One of my good clients asked me recently 500 tons of fries during this summer season to sell to Greek hotels. 6. They need 9x9 and/or 11x11 straight cut in 10 kg carton, like 4 x 2,5 kg standard. I’m shipping first container to them from Belgium tomorrow. Are you satisfied with my answers?? Br Ozgur From: Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> Sent: Monday, June 3, 2024 2:04 PM To: ozgur@rafood.com.pl Subject: RE: Frozen French Fries Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. I see that your company is based in Poland, but the request is for Greece. What is the purpose of getting an offer from our side? Can you share some information about your activities? · Why do you want to change from supplier? · Which markets are you active in? · What competitors do you have in your market? · What volumes do you do? What volumes do you predict to do? · What products do you do? What products would you like to in the future? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With
Subject: RE: Frozen French Fries

TextBody: Dear Sir/Madam, We hope you and your family are in the best of health. At Nutrizo Advancis, We pride ourselves on our commitment to providing natural, sustainable, and innovative solutions to meet the evolving needs of the health and wellness industry. With a focus on excellence and integrity, We have established ourselves as a trusted partner for businesses seeking superior ingredients for their products. Our Stevia sweetener is renowned for its exceptional taste and zero-calorie nature, making it an ideal choice for health-conscious consumers looking to reduce their sugar intake without sacrificing flavor. Derived from the Stevia plant, our sweetener offers a natural alternative to traditional sugar, free from artificial additives and harmful chemicals. In addition to our Stevia sweetener, we also specialize in plant-based protein, catering to the growing demand for sustainable protein sources among consumers worldwide. Our plant-based protein products are derived from premium-quality ingredients, carefully selected and processed to ensure maximum nutritional value and taste · Stevia Pure Extract ( Organic ) · Stevia Powder · Stevia Tablets · Stevia Liquid . 100% Plant based Protein [760d2c8b-8e59-4d59-891e-8023c2046ced.jpeg] STEVIA is 100% Natural Sweetener can be used in a variety of products such as Tabletop Sweeteners, Sweets, Biscuits & Cookies, Confectionary, Health and Dietary supplements, Low calorie food, Dairy Products, Desserts, Baked Goods Products. We are Certified by various standard authorities such as US FDA, ORGANIC, KOSHER, GMP, HACCP, Non-GMO, HALAL, & ISO:22000-2005. We would be delighted to explore how Nutrizo Advancis can support your business goals and contribute to your success. Please feel free to reach out to us at www.nutrizoadvancis.com<http://www.nutrizoadvancis.com/> to discuss your requirements or to request samples of our products. Thank you for considering Nutrizo Advancis Healthcare Pvt Ltd as your partner in health and wellness. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you and to build a mutually beneficial relationship. Please find the attached Brochure and product list for your reference. Thanks &
Subject: USFDA Certified Stevia and Plant based products

TextBody: NEWSLETTER JUNE 2024 - EDITION # 11 [https://mcusercontent.com/c15672cd2184cc0de1954c499/images/d924c6a0-1db8-7809-498b-92d3e5063aad.png]<https://agriworldexpo.us10.list-manage.com/track/click?u=c15672cd2184cc0de1954c499&id=863cf82812&e=510ebb1b52> Greetings! We pose three questions in this newsletter. Please consider them and see how they can help your business. [https://mcusercontent.com/c15672cd2184cc0de1954c499/images/c241c451-d6ce-9892-eaae-4a5d001bac8f.jpg] [https://mcusercontent.com/c15672cd2184cc0de1954c499/images/ee558f4b-2b7e-1947-0147-6acd91e29126.jpg] [https://mcusercontent.com/c15672cd2184cc0de1954c499/images/03e634ca-c2c4-5c8a-342e-a566b908d767.jpg] Have you considered how a free AgriWorldExpo.com virtual stall can be a better alternative to your own website? 1. It is fully editable in minutes; there is no need for the technical team to write and test the code. Simply edit and update your video, catalog, and other data in a few minutes. 2. No server charges and AMC costs. 3. There are no expenses to raise visibility on your site and search engines; we are promoting the site and its ads in multiple locations, with over 1000 Food and Beverage professionals visiting daily. How many hits do you get on your website from this target group ? 4. Easy integration with your social media, LinkedIn, and email with its built-in on line tools accessible from your dashboard. 5. Easy set up in 30 minutes if you have all the content (catalog, company profile, logo and product images, promotional video, etc.) ready. (We can help with content creation). 6. You can build ten or more distinct advertisements with our affordable bundle packs of many ads, each of which is aimed at a particular market niche or represents a different offering of a product or service. This is more manageable than a complicated website with layers of navigation. Have you thought about how your marketing and sales teams might utilize your multimedia ad to reach a wider audience? 1. You may participate in a physical expo for 3-5 days and process 200–300 inquiries. At a considerable cost. But your online ad URL link can be sent by WhatsApp, iMessage, and email to thousands of prospects every week for less than 1% of the cost. 2. You will get walk-in clients who have learned about your company through search engines or browsing the expo. It is very helpful for sales and a free gift that you should not ignore. Are you providing a sustainable choice for your clients? By providing a link to your virtual stall on their screens, you eliminate the emissions of physical travel to research your business. For more information, please see the videos and instruction manual on the homepage. Then register, set up your password, and create a trial ad. See it live, and then edit it until you are satisfied. We are happy to help at every step of the way. Contact details as under.
Subject: AgriWorldExpo.com June 2024 Newsletter.

Dado que tenemos capacidad limitada, solo podemos cargar volumen en línea con el volumen promedio desde octubre, que es de aproximadamente 30 toneladas por mes. ¿Podrías reenviar los pedidos conforme a lo que menciono arriba? TextBody: Liesbeth, I really ask you to help us to be uploaded earlier, really count on your help. Письмо было отправлено внешним отправителем. Не переходите по ссылкам и не открывайте вложения, пока не убедитесь, что это безопасно. ________________________________ Hello Valeria I managed to make the booking, it is AGR6313352. Unfortunately our planning for today is already full, so earliest loading time is 20:00h this evening. Please tell the driver that he should ask if he can be loaded sooner. If it is possible we will do so. I will send you the documents for your approval after loading.
Subject: SWL invioce 99189094

TextBody: Goedemorgen, ik deed zonet aanvraag rond de Uglies aardappelpartjes. W26 is helaas niet mogelijk. Michèle vind ook nergens communicatie hierover terug.. In W30 en W34 kunnen deze worden ingepland. Ik heb nu gevraagd om zeker W30 te voorzien. Echter geeft planning aan dat tijdens de vroege oogst het niet altijd evident is om Belgische aardappelen te voorzien. W30 is dus voorlopig wel onder voorbehoud. Gezien het beperkte volume in forecast en het feit dat dit artikel uniek is voor Iglo, heeft onze planning wel goede hoop dat dit goedkomt. Ik heb hierbij direct ook meegedeeld dat er rekening gehouden moet worden met bezoek. Kunnen jullie adviseren of het voor jullie OK zou zijn dat jullie volledige forecast (50ton) in te pakken indien mogelijk? Hoeveel moet er minimum geproduceerd worden en wanneer willen jullie deze ontvangen? Met vriendelijke groeten, Marlies Marlies De Ketele Technical Sales Officer Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 63
Subject: Uglies Aardappelpartjes - Eerste productie

TextBody: Hello Yorgo Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding the evaluation of the product. First of all I would like to come back to the difference in crispiness that you have experienced. This can be explained by 2 things: * Fluctuations in dry matter quantity. The amount of dry matter present in the fries corresponds with their crispiness. The higher the dry matter, the more the fries are experienced. There is a complete Quality Assurance system in place and the principles of HACCP are applied. This includes a full monitoring system on the production line. The finished products themselves are sampled every hour and examined for quality (incl. frying/texture). Full records of these and all the other checks are maintained. I checked our production and quality records and found out that the first lot was produced well within the predefined specifications. There were no remarks during the production run and the tasting. I noticed that at some points we were more close to the lower limit, but still within the predefined specifications, this can be an explanation for the difference in crispiness experience of two different tastings. * Cooking instructions : I have verified the cooking instructions on pack with our recommended cooking instructions and they are identical. It is important to respect the cooking time of 3-4 minutes and make sure that the oil of the fryer is definitely heated to 175°C before you start preparing the fries. Also make sure that you serve them shortly after they come out of the fryer and don’t keep them in the basket above the hot oil. This can make have an impact on the crispiness and make them soggy. Regarding the packaging I don’t see any deviations on the sharpness of the fries image on the pictures that you have send over. Maybe it’s because of the screen on my computer. I will ask for some foil samples to our drystore department in order to evaluate it properly. In the meantime I will also check with the printer if there are any possibilities in improvement of the image quality. I hope to have informed you sufficiently. Do not hesitate to contact me in case you would have any other questions.
Subject: Fry Day 01 Feedback

TextBody: Hello Yorgo Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding the evaluation of the product. First of all I would like to come back to the difference in crispiness that you have experienced. This can be explained by 2 things: * Fluctuations in dry matter quantity. The amount of dry matter present in the fries corresponds with their crispiness. The higher the dry matter, the more the fries are experienced. There is a complete Quality Assurance system in place and the principles of HACCP are applied. This includes a full monitoring system on the production line. The finished products themselves are sampled every hour and examined for quality (incl. frying/texture). Full records of these and all the other checks are maintained. I checked our production and quality records and found out that the first lot was produced well within the predefined specifications. There were no remarks during the production run and the tasting. I noticed that at some points we were more close to the lower limit, but still within the predefined specifications, this can be an explanation for the difference in crispiness experience of two different tastings. * Cooking instructions : I have verified the cooking instructions on pack with our recommended cooking instructions and they are identical. It is important to respect the cooking time of 3-4 minutes and make sure that the oil of the fryer is definitely heated to 175°C before you start preparing the fries. Also make sure that you serve them shortly after they come out of the fryer and don’t keep them in the basket above the hot oil. This can make have an impact on the crispiness and make them soggy. Regarding the packaging I don’t see any deviations on the sharpness of the fries image on the pictures that you have send over. Maybe it’s because of the screen on my computer. I will ask for some foil samples to our drystore department in order to evaluate it properly. In the meantime I will also check with the printer if there are any possibilities in improvement of the image quality. I hope to have informed you sufficiently. Do not hesitate to contact me in case you would have any other questions.
Subject: Fry Day 01 Feedback

TextBody: Dear Hashim, I have checked the tracking and unfortunately I have to make the same discovery. It seems like all containers from MSC MARGRIT have been offloaded in Abu Dhabi and will be going to Jebel Ali on the vessel MAERSK HAMBURG with ETA 09/06. We were not informed about this by the carrier or our forwarder. I have asked our forwarder to contact MSC urgently, because we understand this is creating problems on your end. Please accept our apologies for this delayed delivery into Jebel Ali, even though Agristo has no influence on the decisions made by the carrier once the containers are at sea. I will update you as soon as I have news.
Subject: Invoice no. 90600314 - FF Saphire 10mm -  shipment delay

TextBody: FDM2024 I 2 - 4 July 2024 I MITEC, Kuala Lumpur View this email in your browser<https://mailchi.mp/9a96301ce937/more-space-for-exhibitors-6368944?e=55bc31c2f3> [https://mcusercontent.com/b419646b3821f071b47d7817c/images/305169ab-66ab-9944-3ed4-ed1d16e4f20d.jpeg] Are you ready to explore KFood at FDM2024? With just less than a month left, now is the time to register. Dive into a vibrant marketplace featuring exhibitors from South Korea. TextBody: Dear Food Artisan, Only three weeks left to enter. Enter Agristo now and represent Belgium. Send us your questions. Entries close, Tuesday, 21 June 2024. [”Logo”/] If the content of this communication is not of interest to you, you may unsubscribe here.<https://list.aurorainttastechallenge.com/?p=unsubscribe&uid=2100b1a06b96e2efc32fd18536b023cb> View in browser<http://list.aurorainttastechallenge.com/?m=15&uid=2100b1a06b96e2efc32fd18536b023cb&p=view&pi=ViewBrowserPlugin> Food and Drinks Excellence Awarded [Food1 630]<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/> Aurora International Taste Challenge (AITC) 2024 At the AITC, experts award superior food and drinks to help consumers make informed choices. [Categories Rough 630] Join us in celebrating culinary excellence at the prestigious International Food and Drinks Awards. Submit your finest creations for impartial evaluation by our esteemed panel of judges. From delectable dishes and yummy snack food to tantalizing beverages, showcase the essence of your products on a global stage. The food and drinks classes are as follows (follow the link of a category to get more information): Drinks and beverages * All drinks, <https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/drinks/> including soft drinks, kombucha, kefir water, drinks to be prepared, both alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks of all kinds as well as bottled water.<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/drinks/> * Wine<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/wine/> * Spirits and Liqueurs<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/spirit-liqueur/> * Beer, Cider and Mead<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/beer-cider-mead/> * Coffee <https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/coffee/> - Roasters, importers and distributors can enter coffee beans as well as pre-ground coffee and pods. * Tea<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/tea/> Food products * Cereals and Snacks<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/snacks-cereal/> * Dairy products<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/dairy-products/> * Olives and olive oil (evoo)<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/olives-olive-oil/> * Other oils, flavoured or unflavoured<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/other-oil-flavoured-unflavoured/> * Pasta and noodles<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/pasta/> * Meat <https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/meat-awards/> - Charcuterie, sausages, dried and other meats * Convenience food<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/convenience-foods/> * Baked goods and confectionery<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/baked-goods-confectionary/> * Chocolate<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/chocolate/> * Snacks and cereal<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/snacks-cereal/> * Preserves, spreads, honey and syrups<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/preserves-honey-syrup/> Flavour enhancers * Dry Seasoning, including individual classes for salt, herbs and spices.<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/salt-herbs-spices-dukkah-mixtures/> * Condiments, dressings and sauces, including balsamic and soya sauce.<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/challenge-categories/condiments-sauces/> Entries are open Entry fee, R1750.00 excluding VAT per entry (approximately EUR95 or USD99 depending on the exchange rate). REGISTER<https://rtd.aurorainttastechallenge.com/index.php?section=register&go=entrant> ENTER IF REGISTERED<https://rtd.aurorainttastechallenge.com/index.php?section=login> Entries close 21 June 2024 Stickers will be available at R430.00 excluding VAT per 1000 (approximately USD25 or EUR25 depending on the exchange rate). Samples are to be delivered to the drop-off point in Stellenbosch, South Africa. [cid:634466f07831d1f53d88de5ae80b7d7c] The following are some of the most common questions we receive, and you can read more of the FAQs on our website and download the FAQ guide from the link below. How many samples are needed for drinks? * Each entry requires a minimum of 2 samples, totalling a minimum combined volume of 400 ml. These samples need to be in their ﬁnal bottled or packaged format. * For drinks that need to be prepared (need to have water, milk etc added), a minimum of two containers, with a minimum combined volume of 400ml is needed. How many samples are needed for other products? The quantity depends on the product (see website<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/#faqs>), but generally the rule of thumb is a minimum of 2 separate containers/packets with a minimum combined weight of 400 grams/ml is needed. After I paid for my entries, and my products have been awarded, do I have to pay for the artwork, or anything else? Award winners will receive award artwork at no additional charge and are allowed to use it on the awarded products, in digital and printed media and advertising. Stickers can be bought if they are required, but you do not have to order stickers. May we pay in EUR or USD? Once you have entered all your products, you can make an online payment in EUR or USD through PayPal. You can also pay in ZAR through Payfast. What counts as one entry? The shortest answer would be, one flavour/particular product = one entry. If products are different in taste, type, chemical composition, flavour etc., they are separate entries. GO TO FAQs<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/#faqs> VISIT THE WEBSITE<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com> EVENT VIDEO<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/2024-video/> Some of this year's judges [cid:d54f97167b6ad31a63423d98449e2384] [cid:14a4beaea8b51c16414adf6bb43d2661] [cid:6dab427222dd7f4e8766f49a7717c292] Jenny Morris Celebrity Chef Tiaan Langenegger Celebrity Chef Carianne Wilkinson Vice-principal at Silwood Kitchen Some of last year's Winners [An image of...] [An image of...] [An image of...] Top Hat Bakery, ZA Volensky Honey, Slovakia Akaka Falls Preserves, Hawaii [An image of...] [An image of...] [An image of...] Star Kombucha, Vietnam Sir Fruit Juice, ZA Swiss Kombucha Company, Switzerland [Why enter raw 630] Why should you enter the AITC? Products that are awarded will receive silver, gold and double gold awards. Producers will be able to display the awards on their products, in digital media and in printed format. Winners will also receive a digital award artwork kit containing many iterations of the logo, and stickers can also be purchased. [WholeBB] What are the advantages of being awarded? * An award shows that your product was evaluated and awarded by independent third-party chefs, sommeliers and food experts, affirming superior quality. * Awards are a symbol of quality to use in digital and print media – Artwork can be downloaded and used in different media. * You will receive a digital award certificate. If the same product is marketed under different brand names, you can receive additional certificates for those as well. * An award will serve as content for social media and PR campaigns. * An award will highlight the brand’s prestige and standing. * An award could just give you the edge you needed, making a buying decision so much easier. VISIT THE WEBSITE<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com> Besides the artwork that can be used on packaging and in digital and print media, stickers can also be acquired for R430.00 excluding VAT per 1000 (approximately USD25 or EUR25 depending on the exchange rate). The stickers measure 25 mm across. [cid:d17066a50da1fa37402d191d27850dcb] [Facebook-PNG]<https://www.facebook.com/AuroraChallenge> [Instagram-PNG]<https://www.instagram.com/auroratastechallenge/> For more information about this event and its unique features, please visit the website at www.aurorainttastechallenge.com<https://aurorainttastechallenge.com/>. If you have any other questions, you can email Sanet van Heerden at hello@aurorainttastechallenge.com<mailto:hello@aurorainttastechallenge.com?subject=Enquiry&body=Dear%20Sanet,%0A%0A> or contact her at +27 (0)84 446 0412.
Subject: Only 3 weeks left - Enter now

Dit kan betekenen dat in sommige gevallen een gebeurtenis verandering zowel negatief als positief kan zijn. Bekijk altijd de volledige details van elke gebeurtenis voordat u actie onderneemt. TextBody: Hi Lesley, See below. Hopefully this helps. SGS use a completely different method of analysis to the method our labs use. Exova use NMR. We insist that any lab we employ utilise the method of Soxhlet extraction after acid hydrolysis. The hydrolysis is necessary to analyse the total fat (free and bound fat). Unfortunately our experience over the last few years show the NMR method does not give a reliable result. It was always a method used commonly with milk powder which is a more homogeneous product but over the past few years appears to have been rolled out across other products such as our frozen potato products and is now commonly used in the UK. In fact we’ve had this exact same experience with another customer who was finding our products when tested weren’t in line with the nutrition in the spec/on pack. In this situation the results were as follows: - - Customer testing (NMR) = 4.9 - Spec/on pack claim = 9.7 - Same sample retested by customers lab but using Soxhlet method = 9.8 NB. For your interest I have attached a leaflet on NMR that does show results can come out lower but deemed to be not significant enough to worry about. Unfortunately we do not find this to be the case with our products. It also discusses how it is a preferred method as doesn’t require qualified staff and is a quicker method thus making it a much cheaper option, which explains a labs preference for using it.
Subject: Booker - fat levels in cooked chips

TextBody: Hallo Maarten, Wil je de order 62017 verzetten naar week 25? Wil je de order 62018 verzetten naar week 27? Wil je de order 62019 verzetten naar week 28? ​

Hi David, Simone, Kevin, Hope you are doing well and had a nice weekend with more sunshine than rainy Belgium. I have some good news to share with you. We were able to negotiate better transport rates to Kingston. The effect will be -0.01 €/kg on the final price of all products, with immediate effect for loadings starting from 1/6/2024. It’s not much, but at least we believe everything counts to be competitive and react. Next to this, we discussed the matter that you are facing strong competition at the end of the season. Although we are experiencing a lot of tension in the market, and potato prices only go up because of delayed planting, we can offer you an additional -0.01 €/kg discount on the Lydford Farms 10x10 fries until the end of our contract. This incentive is to support your position in the market and to further boost the launch of the new packaging with the transition to our new season. So to conclude, the prices will be revised as following starting from loadings 1/6/2024 until 30/9/2024: * Lydford Farms 10x10 fries => - 0.02 €/kg discount * All other references => - 0.01 €/kg discount Wish you a good week ahead.
Subject: Price until end of season

TextBody: Hello Aleksandra, As we spoke over the phone, this order can't be taken in earlier. The haulier informed me the following : Goods are now stored in the UK and the slot is booked for delivery.
